name: Cleansing And Softening Refillable Shower Oil With Almond Oil
categories: Bath & Body, Bath & Shower, Body Wash & Shower Gel
about: What it is: A body cleanser refill that transforms from a silky oil to milky lather upon touching water...Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily..Skincare Concerns: Dryness..Formulation: Liquid..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Sweet Almond Oil: Help soften and nourish skin with oil from almonds grown in Provence..- Grapeseed Oil: Rich in omega-6 and Omega 9 fatty acids, it nourishes and softens feel of skin...Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens and phthalates. It is also vegan...What Else You Need to Know: Now packaged in 100% recycled, second-life plastic and is 100% recyclable* bottle. Soften skin as you cleanse with a mouthwatering scent and decadent milky lather with water. This oil is an ideal base for shaving. *Depending on local recycling capabilities...Clinical Results:.In a consumer test on 39 volunteers (immediately after application):.- 87% found skin nourished.- 92% said skin is supple..In a consumer test on 33 volunteers (immediately after application):.- 85% said skin is softer.
ingredients: -Sweet Almond Oil: Nourishes and softens skin..-Grapeseed Oil: Is rich in nourishing, softening omega-6 and -9 fatty acids...Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Tipa-Laureth Sulfate, Laureth-3, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Parfum/Fragrance, Cocamide Mea, Propylene Glycol, Sorbitan Oleate, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergamot) Fruit Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Tocopherol, Aqua/Water, Limonene, Coumarin, Linalool.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Smooth over skin and create a delicate lather with water. .-Rinse thoroughly.

Both products are enriched with almond oil, which is known for its nourishing and softening properties. After using the shower oil, I apply the body milk concentrate, and the combination leaves my skin feeling silky smooth and deeply hydrated. This duo has become an essential part of my skincare routine, especially for keeping my skin soft and supple all day long.  If you're looking for a shower oil that not only cleanses but also leaves your skin feeling pampered and moisturized, I highly recommend trying the L'Occitane Cleansing and Softening Shower Oil. L'Occitane en Provence Almond Shower Oil is an exceptional bath product that elevates the everyday shower experience to a spa-like indulgence. One of its most notable features is its non-sticky formulation. Unlike many shower oils that leave a greasy residue, this one transforms into a soft, milky lather upon contact with water, which rinses off cleanly without any stickiness or annoyance.  The effectiveness of this shower oil lies in its luxurious texture and the way it gently cleanses the skin while providing deep nourishment. Its rich almond oil content ensures that your skin feels soft, hydrated, and beautifully scented with a delicate, sweet almond fragrance. This makes it an excellent choice for those who struggle with dry or sensitive skin, especially in challenging climates.  Another remarkable aspect of this product is how well it pairs with L'Occitane en Provence's Almond Milk C Concentrate. Using the shower oil first sets the stage for deeper hydration. After showering, when the skin is still slightly damp, applying the Almond Milk Concentrate locks in the moisture provided by the shower oil. This combination works synergistically to provide an intense, long-lasting hydration, leaving the skin feeling incredibly soft and smooth.  The almond shower oil is also noteworthy for its luxurious, pampering feel. The sensory experience of the almond scent and the silky texture of the oil adds a touch of luxury to your daily routine, making it a small but significant self-care ritual.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was honestly really surprised by this product. Regardless of the mixed reviews, I think this product really shines primarily as a shave oil rather than a cleansing oil. A little went a long way and it truly created such a smooth and silky surface to shave on. I saw so many people complaining about the scent, which I found to be extremely subtle & not overbearing at all so if you didn’t love the scent I definitely didn’t find that it lingered for a long time on the body. Also, it claimed to have an Earthy/woodsy scent and I think that’s a fair way to describe the undertone that you smell alongside the primary almond scent. I saw another reviewer comment on the fact that a lot of people hated how this lathered & how she had thought that was just a simple user error (-I agree & the application was actually my favorite part about this product). It does lather on “sticky” but in a good way haha. The more water that is added, the more the “stickiness” is broken up and becomes a smoother/milkier oil so I found it nice that it starts really thick that way you can kind of control how thick or thin you want it by getting more directly in the stream of water or less. The reason I gave this product 4 stars rather than 5, is because although it definitely made my shaving experience feel a lot more luxurious, I don’t know if for me personally I would want to spend the money on a product that doesn’t give very lasting or long-term results especially for this price point. My legs definitely felt “softer” as they claimed and really smooth but you could probably honestly get more out of an oil that is meant to stay on your skin once you’re out of the shower rather than just rinsed off.

I use this mainly to shave my legs, under arms, and bikini area. These areas of my body all now have tiny uncomfortable bumps.  Secondly, my skin has gotten very dried out. Overall, this cheap and damaging oil is just hiding behind a fancy label and the idea that oil will make your skin shiny in the moment. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is absolutely amazing!! The most important rule for this oil is to not use it in direct stream of water!!! So many people dislike it because they say it did nothing for them. WELL YOU HAVE TO USE IT CORRECTLY FIRST!! Yes, it will wash away instantly. You have to step out of direct water flow, then rub it on your body. You have only seconds to use as soon as it comes into contact with water. Leaves skin supple and extremely smooth and soft. Smells absolutely decadent. Works extremely well as a shaving oil, which I only use it for. I was lucky enough to buy the 16.9 oz bottle with the pump when they carried it a few years. Just found on the Loccitane website they send refills for the 16.9 oz bottle. Will be buying that very soon!! Never want to be without this product.

reviews.review_title: You will feel like an angel

reviews.review_text: I actually purchased this at nordstrom but i figured i should let the whole world know how great this stuff is. This is my new everyday. I had been using the bum bum cream but got bored after about 2 years with it, it was time for a change. I found this and bought it based on the smell. I have never used a shower oil before but figured i could mix it with my dr teals if things didn’t work out but i ended up loving it. my skin felt so moisturized right out of the shower.it doesn’t lather a ton but you don’t need it to. Also like i said if you need suds mix a little of your other body wash with it.   it left me sooo soft I could have skipped lotion if i wanted to. I bought the matching body milk with it and am also loving that. I feel like a billion dollars.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The smell...   Before I bought this shower oil I read many reviews. It would seem that half the reviews love the smell and the other half does not, unfortunately I’d have to agree with the latter half. I love the smell of almonds and yes at first this does have that iconic French almond tart scent, however, that quickly turns into something else entirely... Some say wet dog, and I don’t smell that as much as I smell a sorta plastic-like scent. Actually it’s very much the same sickly sweet smell of the rubber used for the scary Halloween masks one would try on at a Target or Walmart. Another person said it smelled of old cigars which I can definitely agree with. I wish I could attest to how well the product works... but it was recommended to me as a wet moisturizer so, with that said, I’m not using the product as intended. My final thought would be to listen to to negative reviews on this one, I wish I had.

reviews.review_text: I've loved this product since I purchased the small travel size, I've been back twice for the full-sized bottle...this is a beautifully scented product from almond oil and I use a small handful on each leg and when it hits my wet skin, it turns into a creamy, moisturizing, fine 'soapy' produce that makes shaving your legs 1000 times better than soap or shower gel!  I no longer have to spray my dry-skin legs down with Aquaphor when I get out of the shower.  I honestly can't imagine washing all my body parts with this but it's my hold grail for shaving my legs!  Rinses clean too!  Smells and scents the shower for an aromatherapy  take-me-away few moments during the morning rush!

reviews.review_text: This is worth every penny.  One bottle lasts me forever (aka 6 months-ish) since I don't use it every day.  I had super dry skin that it quite sensitive and this is a winner.  It feels like you're really pampering yourself and it's very soothing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I stayed in a hotel that had this oil and I loved the way my skin felt, so I purchased a full size bottle. I have been using this in the shower with a rough loofah and it's amazing for my skin. My entire body feels soft, and I used to have red bumps (KP) on my bicep area and literally buy using this weekly, those bumps have disappeared!   If you don't like fragrance, I don't know if i would recommend this because it does have a light almond scent. It doesn't bother me and it's worth noting you don't need much. I use two pumps and that's enough to lather up. I will be repurchasing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this so much. Smells great and makes skin less dry for sure. A tad expensive; I use it sparingly!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this specifically because we use sunscreen A LOT here in Colorado, and I needed an oil-based cleanser to get it off in the shower. Plain shower gel doesn't remove greasy sunscreen, and you still feel greasy when you get out of the shower, and you still smell like sunscreen. Yuck.   This oil works wonders. It doesn't lather, but it removes sunscreen easily from legs and arms. Kind of nice to add to my shaving cream for my legs as well.   The smell- it does smell like almond, but when you rinse it, you DO get a bit of that wet dog smell. It doesn't bother me terribly, and it doesn't stay with me, either, so I'm OK with it. If scents tend to stay with you you might want to rethink this oil, but I have dry skin, so scents tend to evaporate off my body pretty quickly. So the wet dog thing isn't enough of a bother for me to give up the cleaning power of this oil!

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is good stuff. Moisturizes without being overly greasy and doesn't make my tub slippery. I use this instead of shaving cream on my legs. Docking it a star because I'm not crazy about the scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff. Makes your skin feel so soft! My husband even asked me - Why have you been so soft lately? - this stuff is why!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Awesome lather, great for facial shaving and body wash, great overall!!! A must for me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A little goes a long way with this stuff so don’t be too concerned with the price. The smell is amazing. It makes a great alternative to shave cream but my favourite thing to do with this oil is use it after shaving. It’s luscious.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this stuff. I have been having lots of dry skin issues since moving and pretty much tried everything drugstore so I caved and got this. So glad I did. I use this in combination with skinfix glycolic scrub and my skin has never been better. No dryness, no itching, no issues shaving. I use the scrub before showering then when I go to wash my body with this I shave my legs with it. And I swear that combo is like magic because my skin feels so smooth after. My one con is it’s a bit pricey for how much you get. It’s much smaller than I thought it’d be. It’s been about a month and I’m about 2/3 through the bottle.

I was most looking forward to the almond scent. Lots of the reviews mentioned it and it's one of my favorite scents. I noticed no scent at all though. I was so disappointed. This product does its job as a body wash but the lack of scent left me wanting more.  Back to my search for the perfect body wash.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

They couldn’t have chosen a better scent for this cleansing oil.  Afterwards, I feel clean and refreshed. It does leave behind a subtle scent, which I love. (I keep sniffing my arm so I can smell the sweet almond.) My skin feels soft.  Will be using whenever I want to pamper myself, and will repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

I like to exfoliate with a scrub and then follow with this shower oil.  I really like it and highly recommend. (Your experience may differ.)

I love the experience of this in the shower after a long day, but it just doesn’t do enough for the price.

I don't get the great reviews on here.  They must be fake.  It doesn't smell so bad in the bottle but once you let that liquid out, prepare to smell like wet doggy!!! reviews.review_title: Good for winter skin, not a fan of the smell.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ive had some trouble finding a body cleanser that has ingredients and performance I'm happy with, and thought I'd give this a try. I'm not a big fan of the smell of this, and I  have yet to see this milky foam it advertises. There's some very minor lathering, but if you like your shower products to be sudsy at all this is not for you.  I am a fan of how it makes my skin feel, though. Between winter cold and radiators, my skin us usually very dry after a shower. But this stuff leaves it feeling really soft and smooth. I don't know how well it would hold up to summer sweat as far as cleaning goes yet, but it's just about perfect for the current weather.  I may add a drop or two of essential oil to improve the scent (i don't like the brand's shea smell either, so haven't tried that shower oil). But even if I don't, its relatively faint and doesn't linger on me, so it's not a deal breaker. I got the travel bottle to give this a try and will likely  order a regular size once it's gone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: I have had this on my loves list for over a year now. I don't know what took me so long to try it, maybe it's because I didn't think it was necessary. I finally purchased it recently and I've used it twice, and I definitely can see my self repurchasing this for a while. reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I had never tried a shower oil until I used this and I am obsessed with it now!  I love that it is so gentle on my sensitive skin, yet leaves my skin clean without any oily residues and leaves a beautiful scent!

Mehh. I've bought this 3 times (the largest size). I do like how it moisturizers your skin and the smell of it, which is why I keep buying it but I've come to the conclusion that it doesn't actually clean your body very well, especially if you had a really intense work out. Not sure if it's worth it just for the experience if I have to buy two different body washes every time I run out.

I purchased this because I have dry sensitive skin and wanted to not have to immediately put lotion on after the shower. I still needed lotion but it was def the most moisturizing body wash i've ever used. The scent was nice and light, and it didn't irritate my sensitive skin.

This stuff legit smells like wet dog. I cannot believed I spent money on this.  It definitely made my skin feel really soft and initially it smelt really good, however as soon as you mix it with water... the smell is terrible.
it leaves my skin soft and I looooove the smell
THE best for shaving your legs, leaves my skin smooth and moisturized. a little goes a long way. highly recommend

To be honest.  The goal is soft moisturized skin and the oil does for sure give you that.  The scent is very artificial for my liking and I do not like the way my skin smells after.  It does not lather very well either.  Unfortunate :(

This is the best bath/shower product I've come across. I use it a couple times a week. Love the mild, fresh almond scent, great for shaving and allows me to skip the moisturizer afterward. Skin feels clean, smells dreamy and is lightly hydrated.

reviews.review_title: Take the time to love this product!
reviews.review_text: I love this company, but I have to admit this product was an adjustment. At first I didn't care for the product. It felt like it melted away too fast, but I loved the smell and the way it made my skin feel, so I kept with it.   This isn't soap, so it is a lot like switching to a hair product that doesn't lather up. I does turn a milky white color when you emulsify it in your hands. It takes a small amount in each area, I use three small amounts per shower. It leaves your skin feeling nourished, and takes care of dry skin beautifully, and lets me skip the post-shower lotion. Its great for winter and summer, and I use it after swimming, or visiting the beach since that can be so drying to the skin.   It was totally worth the effort to adjust to a new product due to all the great benefits.
I use the oil to shave with. Amazing smell, leaves skin super soft and a little goes a long way.

I love L'Occitane's Almande line because the smell is so yummy like a luxurious sweet almond with a hint of floral. I never bought this shower oil because I assumed that it was just oil but when I tried a sample I was surprised to see that it lathers quite thickly and has a perfect amount of scent that is not overpowering.   I agree with previous poster who said they would buy this just so that they could lather up with this in the shower. It's a luxurious experience.   I prefer this over the body oil now especially for the price.   My skin is sensitive and I tend to get eczema when in contact with the wrong ingredients. This did not cause irritation for me.

It smells SO good, it's worth the price for that alone. But, it's also an amazing texture in the shower as it foams and leaves skin really soft. I don't use it as a soap because I don't want to waste it, so I clean myself with regular soap and then use this after right before I get out of the shower.

This smells so good. I don't think it moisturizes very well because once I rinse it off I don't feel the oil anymore like other body oils that you don't rinse off. Worth the money just for the brief happiness I get when I lather it on !

I got this product because a vlogger mentioned it in her favorites. At first, I did not think it was worth the hype mostly because the scent was a subtle almond and frankly did not feel it was anything special. I was also expecting the scent to be bolder almond scent. But the more I use it the more I fell in love with. The scent grew on me and it did not make my skin dry after showering. Because it's an oil, it offers a warm lather to the skin until it emulsifies when mixed with water. I am definitely repurchasing despite the price tag. It lasted about 1.5 months for me.

this is my favorite shower oil ever. smells amazing and perfect for when i'm feeling lazy and not wanting to put lotion on after showing because the oil keeps my skin feeling moisturizer long after my shower!

This is one of my Holy Grail products (and there are very few). I do love the smell of almonds, so that will vary person-to-person, but I love the way this oil smells... subtle and luxurious.   I have crazy-dry skin, and this stuff makes it so I don't even need lotion after I shower (NOTHING else does that)!! It's so rich and hydrating, and a little goes a long way. I love it so much I purchase it as gifts several times a year, and I've converted many family members to this luxurious shower oil.

I decided to try this shower oil when my usual go-to cleanser was out of stock.  I was a little hesitant because a number of the reviews mentioned an unpleasant scent, but I thankfully have not experienced the wet dog smell.  It is quite perfume-y, sweet but not overpowering.  It doesn't foam as much as I had hoped.  I like a lot of bubbles, and I find it's more of a creamy texture.  Like my other shower oil, I do like how moisturizing it feels, both in the shower and after, and that it rinses really clean.  Overall, it's a good product, but probably not something I would purchase regularly.
This is by far the best shower oil and is absolutely a necessity for me. Can't imagine taking a shower without this anymore

The scent is amazing. I really truly love it...The moisture in my skin was present after using this.   Downside: it really doesn't foam as it states. If you want a strong foam you will have to use a lot...and with the cost of this product, it's not cost effective. A little goes a long way but understand it does not provide the foam most of us are used to with other cleansing products. It is more oil based and acts like it in the shower. I will repurchase but for limited use or to treat myself.

reviews.review_title: Part of a value set-not bad for that reason
reviews.review_text: So a  little bit of background here...I have not used any other in shower oil besides this one and I got this as part of a value set around Christmas time. I may have previously reviewed this but I wanted to re-review it because I finished the bottle. Since I got this around Christmas time I got it in a value set with the almond lotion and it was a great price for the two of them however after using this entire bottle up I would not repurchase it unless it was in a gift set. It smells kinda of like almonds in that it is reminscent of the jergens almond/cherry scented lotion but less sweet more real smelling. It does lather up but I would not say that it is a great lather but there is a small amount of foam. It works best if you use it with a loofah or some kind of scrub device otherwise the foam is basically non-existent. This took me about 3 to 3 + 1/2m months to use up and I was getting sick of the lack of lather so I started to use it as a shaving oil and it worked really well for that purpose, my skin was never smoother and my shave lasted longer. So I gave it 4 stars because it worked so well as a shaving oil, but as a moisturizing in shower cleansing oil I didn't like it as well in winter/colder months I needed to use a lotion after I got out of the shower to have enough moisture so I wouldn't recommend it to those who need to use lotion after showering because this won't solve your problem or make your routine simpler.

I feel as though most people would either love or hate the scent. I like it, personally. Even though this is a shower oil, it is described as foaming, which it does not at all. I feel like I'm not getting as clean because of the lack of foam so I usually mix it with another shower gel. I think the price is a bit too high for what its worth. I'll use up my bottle but won't be repurchasing
I love this oil so much!!! Smells and feels amazing!!!

Felt great on the body and moisturized well, but the oil residue seeped into the grout of my shower floor, making it a much darker colour. No way to get the oil out, so now I have a patchy looking shower floor.

I purchased this because I heard great things about it. I did notice my skin felt softer and smoother, more than any other body wash I've used before, but every time I would rinse it off I would get a weird scent like a wet dog. That is the only thing that bothers me. It is only temporary and goes away once I apply my lotion. I'm very sensitive when it comes to smells and usually despise sweet scents but I was able to tolerate the scent of this. I did purchase the smallest size just to be on the safe side. I will most likely repurchase again since it did make skin really nice.

I bought it, very hyped because the L'occitane almond lotion is my number one favorite lotion of all time. I wanted to love this shower oil but I just can't make myself love it like I wanted to. It smells good, it is oily and makes the skin feel soft, but it takes a large amount to get it to lather and for the price per bottle compared with the amount you have to use each shower to get favored results I personally don't think it's worth it. I've already went back my old bodywash and sometimes just mix this in with that.
Maybe my expectations were too high but I really wanted this to be more moisturizing.  It definitely moisturizes more than a traditional shower gel, but for the price I expected a lot more.
I use this after I wash my body with actual soap. This smells very good and leaves your skin soft. It's good as a shaving lotion.

reviews.review_title: You will never use anything else
reviews.review_text: This literally feels like a soothing balm when you shower. It smells and feels amazing and you need very little of it. Worth every penny.
I absolutely can't live without. I must have it to shave my legs!!!!! It smells great.
Despite reading the reviews about it smelling like a wet dog , I still bought ! The only good thing about it is its really moisturizing.

This soap is nice and you can tell it's luxurious but I have been resisting the spend this much on soap, and I finally bought it as a treat to myself! I was sooooo disappointed. The fragrance is ok, but it's not as intoxicating as everyone makes it seem. And my shower is not as glamorous as I imagined. I really had this product propped on a pedestal and now it's just another shower gel/ oil in my tub. I will finish it but I will not repurchase

this is a nice oil,  but I can't handle the smell.   once it combines with water it smells like a wet dog... not exactly what I want to surround myself with right away in the morning.  won't repurchase.

I could not be happier with this product. I recently had open heart surgery so I had to be very careful of what I put on my skin, especially around the surgical site. I've had a difficult recovery so I don't use it as it says in the instructions. At incision site I just use my hands to wash then rinse immediately because it is an oil based product. I also have EXTREMELY dry skin, since using this product, the Almond, not the other types I have gotten so many compliments and my skin glows! I will be using this for a looong time to come!

I started using this for shaving my legs and I'll never turn back! It's hydrating and gives me the smoothest shave ever!  It gives a great lather that isn't easily washed away like shaving cream. Best of all, you only need a little bit to get the job done! Plus, it smells incredible!
This is the only body wash I'll use! Not only does it smell incredible but it makes my skin feel so soft! 10/10
Smells and feels so good. Skin felt great, not greasy (my skin is a little dry)

reviews.review_title: This smelled so familiar...and then it hit me
reviews.review_text: I wish they made this in a perfume. I received this in a beauty insider box and finally got around to trying it. The scent of this seemed so familiar. It's a very powdery yet slightly floral scent, perfect for every day work as I work in an emergency room where any strong fragrance is prohibited. I kept sniffing my wrist, sure that I had smelled this before. Finally tonight it clicked!  This smells exactly like the old scented Cabbage Patch preemie dolls. EXACTLY like it...but not in a bad way at all!  Maybe that's why I find this scent so calming and comforting, I was a Cabbage Patch doll hoarder back in the day. Can't wait to get the full size of the body oil!

I love this cleansing oil. I've noticed that since using it daily, my skin has become super soft and hydrated. The only downside is that the scent isn't my favorite. I don't find the scent unpleasant, it just takes a little while to get used to. Fortunately he scent doesn't linger too long so its not a big issue

I got this product as a deluxe sample & I was hesitant to use it - I am mildly acne-prone on my back and chest.  I love the way the product makes my skin feel & I love the smell.  So far no breakouts!  On the negative side it is a little runny.  I used a shower pouf which helped it lather, but it really pours out, so use caution.  Will likely purchase for the dry winter months
I purchased a variety box to try some new products.  This is one that I'm so happy to have tried. It softens without feeling greasy. It's light, but effective.  I would purchase again.
Leaves skin soft and smooth. I like this but wasn't wowed by the product.

I'm currently on accutane and it was making the backs of my hands and skin up to my elbow just crumbling away.  I use this probably 3 times a week and my skin is SO FREAKING SOFT! I just keep rubbing the backs of my arms. And it smells like heaven. And almonds. And clouds.  Basically, buy this. It's actually worth the money. Only downside, you do have to use a fair amount for your entire body. I would go ahead and get the big bottle.
This stuff smells so amazing, it lathers up well, and leaves your skin so moisturised! I cannot imagine the winter months without this!
I love this product it leaves your skin moisturized and the smell is incredible

reviews.review_title: Just what I was looking for....
reviews.review_text: I have been looking for a moisturizing shower oil for the summer months where I can skip slathering on lotion after my shower. This shower oil keeps my skin moisturized and soft to the touch.   I realize the scent is off-putting for some, but it genuinely smells like the signature scent in all of L'Occitane's products. So if you like their other products, you will enjoy this oil. I even added some drops of a pure, organic lavender oil to make the scent even stronger.   I use this with a charcoal sponge daily and will continue to purchase once I am out.

I purchased the travel size with a gift card on a whim trying to find a replacement for the natural (drying) bar soap I'd been using. The price is steep, hence only 4 not 5 stars. However I genuinely look forward to cleansing with this body oil now. It smells amazing, if you love almonds of course. It's great for dry or textured skin tones and doesn't strip essential moisture while cleansing. I have noticed you MUST use it with some type of loofah or even your hands over washcloths. It being an oil/milk mixture washcloths tend to just soak up the product as oppose to lather it.

This is the best shower product ever! It smells divine and leaves your skin so soft and supple! I love it for shaving too as it works better than any shave cream/lotion at preventing razor burn and leaves skin soft! I will use this product for the rest of my life

This product smells amazing, the almond scent is subtle and lovely. It leaves your skin feeling soft, however, it does not leave you feeling clean. I use it after my regular body wash for some added hydration. I also use it for shaving and I've noticed my skin is smoother and much less irritated.

I had a sample of this shower oil for awhile and did not use it.  I ran out of my previous shower gel and decided to try this one.  Wow!  My skin feels so good!  I wish it lathered up just a little more. I love the light scent and I love how soft my skin feels!  I went and bought the full size!

reviews.review_title: My Holy Grail for Seasonally Dry, Tight Skin
reviews.review_text: My lower legs and arms get so dry in the summer and winter that they get almost ashy. That fades into slightly less dry, tight skin on my upper legs and arms which then fades into dry-to-normal skin on my torso. Like an ombré of dry to normal skin, so if that's you too - you need to try this immediately.   It smells wonderful (sweet almond), lathers best with a shower poof, and applying directly with your hand before shaving legs changes your whole shave-game. Even with the seasonal dryness, I don't get itchy if I forget to moisturize after shaving. It feels like I already did.  If I forget the balm-to-oil to remove my eye makeup before I shower, I've used this and then followed with my usual face wash and gotten perfect results too.   This also doesn't strip my self-tanner. Since I'm pretty fair and social life is built around pools in the Texas summer, this is a big plus too.   I'm always trying new products and love to keep up with the different skincare, hair, and makeup trends, so it's rare to have a product that works so perfectly that it makes the repeat purchase list for me. There's maybe 4 items on that list, but this is one of them and has been for 5 years now during summers and winters. (Still try new things in Spring and Fall!)  Last thing - I also credit this stuff for keeping me stretch mark-free through 3 pregnancies which is how I found it in the first place. A Sephora cast member recommended it though I was looking for a different item, and I went for it. SO glad for this product.

Oh my gosh, no. Stop. Don't buy it. Remove it from your cart. Put your wallet away.  This stuff is terrible! My skin is on the dryer side and most soaps tend to strip it of whatever moisture it has. I was hoping this would help, but I was extremely disappointed.  The texture is my major issue with this. It's super liquid-like and doesn't foam up, so I don't even feel clean after using it. Because it's so watery, it's hard to rub it into your skin because it just drips everywhere.  All in all: • Doesn't moisturise • Doesn't lather • Horrible watery texture

Based on the many good reviews, I expected this to be good at moisturizing my skin.  It actually did the opposite.  After a few days use, the skin on my legs became scaly and dry.  Too bad because it does smell good.  Oh well, the search for my perfect shower oil continues.

This stuff is my holy grail for when my skin is dry. After using this, I don't even *need* lotion unless it's one of those extra dry days.   But guess what: if you just go to the L'Occitane website directly, you can get a 16.9 oz bottle with a 16.9 oz refill for $65. Why pay $41 for one when you can get two for $65?

I must not know how to use shower was correctly.  Lol. I have used this product three times so far, not impressed. Doesn't leave my skin soft. Doesn't leave my skin smelling nicely. Will continue to use product but unless it improves greatly, will not repurchase.
this oil makes ur skin so soft and supple.  It is a noticeable difference.  I also happen to really love the smell, but I guess that just depends on your taste.

Just as so many others remarked here- it smells fantastic in the bottle but the second you use it in the shower it smells awful- like an old man in my opinion. I didn't even get through half the sample size, I threw it out.

I work for L'occitane and I think it's safe to say this is my favourite product we sell. I use it pretty much every day and I recommend it to every customer. If you're skeptical about the price definitely buy it anyway. A little product goes a long way because the oil lathers quite nicely so the bottle lasts for quite a while. The Almond line also has the most amazing and delicious scent that isn't overpowering because it's not synthetic fragrance. Its especially good if you have really dry skin because it's not drying and will leave your skin so much more comfortable after you get out of the shower. It's such a luxurious product to use. Treat yourself and buy this, you won't regret it.
ReviewAmazing and delicious !

reviews.review_title: smells nice and keeps my skin soft
reviews.review_text: Bought for winter went my skin got dry. It did a great job keeping my skin soft

I can't use any other shower gels or products now. Took me a little time to get used to the smell. But was advised to open the cap and let it air for 12-24 hrs. It seems to do the trick. Love the soft natural after smell.

It smells great in the bottle, beautiful subtle almond scent, but when combined with my wet skin it smells like a wet dog, which doesn't make sense because that's not what my skin smells like, and no other products do that. It did leave my skin feeling soft and smooth, but it didn't moisturize enough to replace my usual post-shower moisturizer, so it's not enough to get over the smell.
Very nice body wash and can be used as a face wash. Leaves your skin supple and soft.

Initially i found the smell nice, but once it touches water the scent went from pleasant to smelling mildly of wet dog. I like the lightweight feel of the oil but i don't think id get this particular one again.
I have very dry skin and use this after my shower.
A perfect body wash!  Has a nice scent that isn't overpowering. I have also used it as a shaving gel and it leaves my legs super smooth!!
Love the light smell. Feels good on the skin.
love this product. Moisturizing and smells so good

reviews.review_title: I will never be without this❤️
reviews.review_text: I love the product. It is a bit pricey but very worth it. My skin is normally dry and even more so in the cold windy Canadian winter. I jump in the shower and wet my skin. Then I use the cleansing oil all over my body (except that area lol). It is so moisturizing and prevents my skin from feeling stripped or itchy. Smell is light and pleasant. I 100% recommend.  Also no oily residue left over in your shower/tub so that's an extra plus. Definitely buy this if you are on the fence!!!

LOVE LOVE LOVE! I use in the shower once a week and my skin smells and feels amazing! My whole bathroom smelled like almonds when I used this and the almond exfoliating paste. Love the smell and loved the way my skin felt afterwards.

reviews.review_title: Smells like a clean wet dog but feels good
reviews.review_text: I was looking for a body wash that wouldn't leave my skin feeling tight and dry after a shower. I was really excited when I discovered the cleansing oil. I bought the small size since I ordered online and didn't have a chance to smell it in person. When I smell the product in the bottle, it smells good, but as soon as I use it in the shower, it smells like a freshly washed dog. I do not recommend using this product on a loofah as it will waste a ton of product. I apply this product directly to my skin or use it to shave.
This product is a staple in my shower.  I love the formula.  This is perfect for shaving.  The smell is wonderful and is leaves skin feeling soft and not dry.  My more detailed review video is below.

reviews.review_title: One of my favorite body products!!!
reviews.review_text: This body oil is absolutely amazing!!! The whole almond collection from L'Occitane is flawless but this is a must!! In the shower it forms a very soft lather but I swear it leaves your skin feeling like absolute silk! The smell is so nice as well. I know the price point is a bit high but this is something to definitely use when you need a little pick me up or want to treat yourself! Something I will definitely keep around in my body care.

So I've tried this in a sample bottle and the full size and it seems that the sample bottle comes with a weird plastic/rancid smell. However, the actual smell is a warm but not sweet almond smell. It's light and doesn't last long enough to clash with whatever floral or fruity perfume you like. I love using this after I wash with my normal soap or shower gel for a little extra softness. On clean wet skin, I rub it all over then rinse. It's perfect in the summer if you want soft skin but want to skip the stickiness of lotion or in the fall/winter to make your lotion last longer. LOVE!
I use it for shaving and it works great.

I think this product works really great. It's moisturizing and does lather up when wet. I just personally am not a fan of the smell. I think most people would like this product especially with dry skin just not for me.

My skin all over my body gets really dry and cracked in the winter. This product is a life saver! It makes my skin so much softer. Even when I'm too lazy to put on lotion when I get out of the shower, I can feel the difference in how smooth my skin is. And the price is pretty reasonable for the amount of product you get. I love this.
Makes my skin SO soft.  Love everything about this product!!! Would totally recommend it to anyone.
My friend recommended and gave me set as a gift two years ago. Been using since then. Love it!!!

I was given this as a gift a year ago and now can't live without it. It does not leave a heavy scent that competes with my fragrances. I use it after my regular body wash and rinse off lightly to get the most from it's moisturizing benefits.

This is amazing. I have eczema and this works wonders paired with lotion, I was hesitant because of the bad reviews on the smell. Went to Sephora and smelled it and it smells fine. I'm usually pretty sensitive to bad smells and it's fine.

I used this as a shaving cream of sorts and found a huge difference in my skin. My skin wasn't irritated anymore after shaving, and were instead very soft. The only thing was I had to use a LOT at a time.

I really needed an oil to use in shower but using regular body oil makes the shower slippery. When I shave my skin gets dry and sensitive and I can't use cream on my legs, it burns affer I shave. So I had gotten this as a deluxe sample and decided to use it. And first off I love the smell, and it really does foam up like any other cleanser. But it's moisturizing and I can use it in place of my shaving cream. Oh and a little does go a long way.

I always tend to have dry skin and I'm the winter time my skin cracks and can be painful. I used this product  throughout this winter and have not had any issues with cracking skin. I know some people say the smell is bad but I actually like it. I find it really soothing and it's not too oily

I can't really describe the scent of this. Tackle box comes to mind. Like fishy-rubber. I don't find that it cleanses any better than other high-end cleansers, so to me it just wasn't worth it. I'm glad I only purchased the smallest bottle.

reviews.review_title: Good even as a face cleanser
reviews.review_text: I use this to wash my face in the shower and it is more effective than some foamy/soapy face cleanser! It leaves skin clean, smooth and hydrated!
The moisturizing quality is fantastic. However the smell is incredibly unpleasant (almost wet dog-like)

I got this as a deluxe sample and was NOT impressed.  It wasn't hydrating at all... gave it several shots and ended up just using the rest as bubble bath to use it up.  Wouldn't purchase the full size based on the sample.

I love using this as a shave lotion! It was amazing how soft my legs felt after using it. The scent is sweet and subtle.  I put a little in my hand first with a tiny bit of water to get it milky before I apply. That helps the product go further.  I wouldn't say it foams at all, but definitely becomes milky. I have awful water, though, so it's hard for anything to lather.
Can't find a reason not loving it. It smells awesome, hydrated my skin. Why I didn't find out this one earlier???

This product is absolutely in my must haves list for day to day grooming/bathing. I use it to shave and to wash and as a first level body moisturizer and follow it up with a thick body cream. The smell is amazing and it feels like heaven on your skin. I will never be without.
My husband is in love with this shower oil and uses it all the time - it smells great and his skin feels so soft. Another great product from L'Occitane!

I love this! It smells great, it really moisturizes your skin and it is absolutely the greatest for shaving your legs. I have not let myself run out of this since the first sample I tried. This is a true HG product.

I got two of the sample size holiday giftables of this. The more I read about it, I had to try it myself and I am SOOO GLAD I DID!! This is, by far, my new favorite shower product! My skin was so much soften after just one use and shaving with this stuff made shaving so much easier for me. My legs are ridiculously sensitive and it is almost painful to shave my upper thighs for some reason nowadays. I spread a little tiny bit of this on my leg, rubbed it over my entire leg and voila!!! Shaving was a breeze!! No pain whatsoever and my legs were super soft! The smell is great, too, very pleasant. It reminds me exactly, of the Jergens body lotion, the original scent. Do yourself a favor and get your hands on this stuff ladies and gentlemen!! Xoxo

This is wonderful. I buy the smallest bottle and it lasts forever because you only need a dot! It moisturizes you and the scent lingers. It smells better on your body than in the tube. I'm on my second bottle. I love it!
I think everyone that got the sample size got the wet dog Scent lol I used it as a bubble bath for my son and he didn't want to bathe in it lol   Smells like a wet dog and plastic.
I got a sample of it and I love it. Made my skin softer with one use. Best part is it heats up as well as turns into a body wash so it's very soothing. :)
The smell is nauseating.. product is eh.. save your money.

I looooove this product! It smells divine! I was skeptical about how it would apply in the shower and if I would need a lot of product to cleanse,  but you actually don't need more than a regular body wash and it lathers up so nice.

I used points to get a sample of this and was a little skeptical-- some oil based cleansers I have tried on my face didn't work out for me. I am so happy I gave this a chance! The night I tried it I loved it so much I ordered the larger size. The only complaint is that Sephora does not carry the largest size with the pump!
I truly love this product!  The scent is wonderful; light and feminine.  It doesn't take much, and has a nice, thick lather.  Not greasy, but very moisturizing.
This product leaves your skin feeling so good.  It is not oily. I especially like it for the winter months.  I am in my 60s.  I love the way it lather's and smells.
I have dry itchy skin in the winter. So I tried using this instead of soap and it solved the itch problem. Soothing without being oily or leaving a film. Love it and plan to use it year round.
I use it for a relaxing bath. Not super bubbly but I think that's why my skin feels so soft after - soapy bubbles are drying.
Lovely scent...just not foamy enough...more of an oil than true bubble bath!
I got this first as a reward. I loved it so much I bought the full size. The smell IS amazing, makes me take longer showers. Feel very moistured also. Especially in the harsh climate I live in.

This product makes my skin super soft and smells heavenly. I use it everyday and have the travel size. I think I'm on my 10th bottle. There is nothing better to shave your legs with either. I would award 10 stars if so could.

reviews.review_title: Smells Gross When Mixed With Water!
reviews.review_text: Smells amazing in the bottle but when I used it in the shower the smell reminded me of perm solution at first. Others described it as a wet dog, which I could see too! It was pretty moisturizing, but ewww, the smell. Will have to return this!

I got a 100 point perk and ended up purchasing the full size. I love this oil for shaving! It foams up just the right amount, is moisturizing and creates a great slip for shaving. It smells so amazing and it will last a long time. I very much recommend this product!!

I own most of the almond products from L'Occitane, and this particular product is probably my least favorite. It smells amazing like the rest of the range, but it just isn't hydrating enough for the price. The scent also barely lingers after I'm done showering. I have to use too much of it to even work up enough lather for my arms and it has a much thinner consistency than I thought it would, especially compared to the spray oil. I do not think I would repurchase this, unless the price was a bit lower; instead, I will just continue to repurchase the spray oil version of this product, as that has a much stronger scent and helps with my dry skin.

I love this thing. If you follow the directions and actually wait a few minutes it really does soften your skin. I don't mind the smell at all, it just has a faint almond mixed with soap scent, so I don't find it as bothersome as others say it is. You're not going to smell like almond oil if that's a concern. I didn't rate it five stars just because I wouldn't rely on this fully as a cleanser unless all you've done that day is lounge, and also because I personally thought it'd have more of a lotion effect. However, I put argan oil on after when I have the time and I feel like a dolphin who's been swimming for 23 years and just broke the waters surface. It's an incredible primer for moisturizer. So I do consider it a good investment because I enjoy being a human version of silk fabric.
Amazing smell and super smooth. Leaves skin extra soft. Good for shaving as well. Love this product!

This cleansing oil has saved my dry skin in harsh winters. I'm not a huge fan of the smell but it's a very neutral smell, not off-putting at all. It's also great if you're in a hurry as it makes your skin so soft you could get away with not applying body butter. The only downside is that for the price it runs out so quickly.

reviews.review_title: Leaves me soft and smelling nice all day
reviews.review_text: This has an amazing almond fragrance that actually lingers on the skin after getting out of the shower. It is moisturizing and silky in the shower. It's also a little thick if you don't apply a good amount of water while lathering, then it turns into a gentle, thin sudsy lather. I use it very sparingly, as it does run out pretty fast.
I was super impressed with the texture of the oil and how it changes into foam as soon as it touches water! Only downfall is that you need to use a lot of it.
If you have dry skin you will love this makes your skin sooo hydrated the scent is like nothing ive ever smelled before im obsessed

I love the smell and watching it turn into lotion. Applying it is fun and feels nice. But I had the hardest time getting it off my skin. It's like it kept getting stuck. No matter how much I scrubbed, my skin was slick, and when I got out of the shower, my skin was sticky. Honestly, I enjoy using it so much I'll probably finish the bottle but never buy it again.

reviews.review_title: Great for dry or problem skin
reviews.review_text: I bought the kit at Sephora and I have to say that I am in love. I have eczema and psoriasis and the dry colder months are the worst for me. When I bought it I was in northern Chicago visiting and I always seem to have a breakout while I am there. This stuff is my life saver. I did not have the wet dog smell that others are having. But, they could be having it from a ph imbalance or even a chemical imbalance. Those 2 issues can make the smell of the product turn to a different smell after using it. But for me, this stuff is going on my list to buy again.

I'll be starting my third bottle of this shower oil. Its an absolute must for me living through dry Canadian winters. I have no idea what people are talking about with the wet dog smell... I have never experienced this. I find it has a light pleasant smell that can be accompany any perfume, or enjoyed on its own.   I love buying it in the value kits as the rest of the products in the almond line are just as nice.
It does make my skin feel soft afterwards... I just feel like you have to use a lot in the shower, so I only use it once a week to make it last. Scent is nice, not over powering.

It smells amazing in the bottle, and I was excited to experience the moisturizing benefits. I used it and it smelled great but then there was this.. after smell that reminds me of wet dog. I couldn't figure out where the smell was coming from because the initial smell was definitely delicious almonds. I told my husband and he thought maybe the shower curtain had mildew or something. I went about a week without using it and today I tried it again, and the same smell! I don't know what's causing it, but it's awful! I logged into Sephora.com and I see other reviews that have the same comment. Maybe we have a bad batch. Gross!
Absorbs fast and smells delicious, but not overpowering. Skin feels soft, not oily.

This product is good, but the one from the Brazilian brand, Natura, is so much better. The scent is better and it's also much more hydrating. I got this as a sample and I don't plan on purchasing it after trying it out.

So I got this as a sample and I was very excited to try it. When smelled from the bottle it smells amazing, like almonds, but once you put on the sponge omg..horrible! Theres this after smell that smells like a wet dog (for real, not kidding) just like other ppl have mentioned. Save your money.

This is amazing for people with dry skin. I don't think I will buy anything else for the rest of my life. It smells very expensive too. Can't get enough of this stuff and goes well with any perfume I wear during the day.

I got this in a sephora favorites kit and my first impression upon using it in the shower was how well it covered all targeted areas that I used on. It isn't too thick to where it leaves a thick layer of oiliness on your skin. It soaks in nicely. DEFINITELY will be repurchasing this when I run out of the sample. :)
The smell is phenomenal! The product is somewhat pricy but the smell is worth it! Overall a very nice body cleanser.
Lovely product.  Great scent.  Softens even my dry skin.

My husband is not much of a product lover but when he tried this body wash on our tropical vacation, he was super impressed! It smells amazing, lathers well and has a warming sensation upon application. It leaves your skin smelling great and super hydrated. Baby soft skin even in the harshest of temperatures!

Very good. It leaves a sensation in the skin of very good moisturizing, the smell is not exactly almond, but anyway the smell is so delicious that when you bathe leaves the whole bathroom inundated with the fragrance.  My younger sister has some skin problems and uses it to keep the skin moisturized. It works very well. The change is noticeable after a few days of using it.  This liquid oil soap is very good, I just wish it came in a bigger bottle. The bottle runs out too fast.

reviews.review_title: You get what you pay for
reviews.review_text: I debated giving this five stars but since it doesn't lather on my shower poof very well I decided to give it four. Honestly though since it's mostly natural I'd be shocked if it lathered well in the first place. Anyways...  Smell is not bad. Doesn't smell like almond extract but has a very light perfumy smell that lingers on the skin but doesn't trail with you all day. It has a very runny consistency and does not lather well with a loofah or shower poof. I found the best thing to do was put it directly on my hands and rub on my body, then get my poof wet and scrub away. That seemed to work well. If you've never used a shower oil before, be prepared to feel like you didn't get totally clean. You won't have that squeaky clean feeling but in truth, unless you're filthy, the warm water running on your body cleans you enough. In fact, when I used this the first time my skin was so hydrated when coming out of the shower that I hated it and felt like I didn't get clean at all. But after you towel dry you realize that you are totally clean and it doesn't leave a filmy residue and your skin is not red, itchy, or taught from the warmth of the shower. It takes some getting used to. The skin on my arms and legs is pretty dry and I did feel like I still needed to put lotion and a body oil on to feel fully moisturized. However, I think if you have normal skin then this could be enough for some people. Overall, not bad. It does exactly what it claims to which is more than most brands. You get what you pay for.

This is a classic example of trying to fit two benefits into one product and then none is fully delivered. This product does not lather well and does not moisturize well either. I still have to follow on with a body lotion. A better way to a well moisturized skin would be to buy a good body wash and find your favorite body oil to apply after shower. Two stars go to a nice fragrance and nice bottle.

I bought this after using a sample of it because I fell in love with the scent. However, I've learned that for $25, the bottle goes way too quickly. I have to use a ton of it to cover my whole body. It's nice for shaving and it feels moisturizing, but it doesn't lather up well on a loofa when I want to scrub my body. I love the scent of this but it's just not worth the price.

I have dry skin. Bumps all over my arms and itchy skin in the winter. After using this shower oil for a couple of weeks, I noticed that my skin felt so soft and smooth. The arm bumps were beginning to disappear and I don't even need a separate moisturizer anymore.   I love this stuff and will never be without it again. I have two of the large pump bottles and also two refill bags waiting in the wings--I love it that much!  As other reviewers have stated, the product does have a funky smell to it. It smells like wet dog to me. Very disappointing that it doesn't actually smell like almonds. I suppose no one would be interested in a Wet Dog Shower Oil. They should definitely continue to work on the smell of this product. It won't stop me from buying, but I would enjoy it so much more if the smell were improved.

I have very dry, post-menopausal skin. I live in AZ and now that summer is over, our humidity is down to nothing. These two factors combined make it difficult to get clean and not turn my skin into sandpaper.  At this time of the year I switch from body lotion to body butters and oils. And still my skin was drying out after a few hours post shower. Enter this shower oil!  It cleans well without stripping my skin. It leaves my skin so soft and my butters and oils seem to sink in better and last longer.  As a testament to how good it is....I don't like the smell. At all. But the effect is so good I will continue to use it as long as they make it.

I use this primarily as shave cream and it works so much better than the average shave gel/foam. It really softens your skin, which I love. I like the scent, pretty and unique but not overpowering. Will definitely repurchase in a larger size when this runs out. Love L'Occitane.
I've been in love with this shower gel for donky years now! When i feel down, i take a shower with this, it brings me to another realm!
I don't use it to cleanse but I apply it to my legs post shave in the shower. A must for dry skin. Almond smelling goodness with no oily residue.

This shower oil has a very interesting consistency. It feels like a viscous oil when you first pour it on your hands/loofah, but then produces a very rich moisturizing lather.   The only downside to this product imo (which could be a positive for some) is that the shower oil smells very unisex, almost manly. I typically prefer sweeter and more floral scented shower gels.

I love the smell of the shower oil and supple oil which I could use every day if the price wasn't a factor. The smell is so enticing! I use the shower oil to shave my legs which feel so soft and moisturized after my shower. I might treat myself at the upcoming 20% off sale.
I love the smell of this and a little bit goes a long way. Makes my skin soft

I can't get past the scent, and it definitely does not smell like almonds. It reminds me of how my dolls smelled as a child, a weird sweet plastic-y smell. I'm glad I only purchased the small bottle. I also didn't notice any moisturizing benefits.

If you love the smell of almonds (think about almond pastries you smell around the holidays in December) then you will love the scent of this! Not only that, but this cleanser works really really well.  Just apply to your (damp/wet) body with your hands, work it in, and it creates a really pleasant milky lather which washes away very easily.  No oily residue! I followed with the matching almond body lotion and i feel so soft now, almost velvety even! And the smell isn't overpowering, I just smell clean and yummy!

i use this every night and it is amazing its perfect for dry skin and gets rid of acne with no harsh chemicals that dry your face out. plus you smell really good afterwards. would recommend this to anyone!
Great all around product worth a shot.
This is wonderful! My skin is so soft and silky after I shower and it stays that way all day long! Nice, light scent. I will absolutely purchase again!

My skin becomes extremely dry after the shower and I have tried a million products, even the ones that claim to be lotion in the shower. This is the only one that not only leaves me moisturized right after the shower, but also got rid of the tiny bumps on my arm! This should be on your auto replenish...

i had previously said this was a ok product. Now i have found a better way to use it because i was not happy using it as just a shower oil. I now use it just to shave with. since i have really dry sensitive skin shaving is not always pleasant, but with this, this has really helped the process a lot. i use a nice coat and shave with this now and it helps protect my skin and the razor now just glides. after my skin it nice and soft and no longer irritates me. i will repurchase again for that use only.

reviews.review_title: Does what's promised but smells weird
reviews.review_text: Normally I love anything almond and this brand is great.  However, using this in the shower it has a very weird/off after smell.  It smells good in the bottle but when used in the shower I just couldn't get past the smell.  Ended up returning it.

This product is the best body cleansing product I have ever used! A little goes a long way, you can shave with it, it smells like heaven, it doesn't bother my sensitive skin, and it  makes your skin so smooth and hydrated!
Love this product! I keep buying this over and over. Doesn't feel sticky and oily but it keeps my dry skin hydrated.

This product is amazing!! It is totally worth the price too! Since it starts as an oil and changes into a soft lather, a little goes a long way! It is wonderful for shaving and bathing! Leaves your skin feeling super soft and smells delish! My fiance is always all over me when I step out the shower smelling like sweet almonds from this stuff!! I highly recommend it to anyone. I have sensitive skin and it does not clog my pores or break me out! Try the little bottle first, but trust me, you'll be back for the big one once it runs out!!
This is awesome for dry skin and also for shaving.  I also buy this for my sister. After she tried it she cannot be without it for her dry skin.
Great for dry skin  Love that you use in shower - no lotion needed afterwards

I actually received a sample of L'OCCITANE'S Almond Shower Oil and fell in love immediately.  That was 2 years ago.  I will go out of my way to find this product and normally go to Sephora to pick it up instead of ordering it online.  It leaves my skin soft, doesn't leave it feeling oily and the smell it soft. I layer the Almond product line. (either the after shower oil or body cream/lotion or all if I'm going out).  It does have a wonderful smell that always has people asking me the name of my perfume and where they can find it.
Love how it makes my skin feel and look and will keep buying
It gives a refreshing touch and scent to the body
Expensive product. Loved the light scent but dried my skin. I can use coconut oil for a fraction of the cost.

I tried the small size and liked it enough to repurchase. It's very moisturizing and lightly foaming. Smell isn't anything to write home about but I didn't buy it for the fragrance -- and another oil I tried at the same time really stank.

L'Occitane really nails the luxurious-feeling skin game, and this product fits right in. I actually prefer the rub the oil directly on my skin to add to the decadence. I also use this for shaving too and it works very very well.  The smell is lovely and gentle. Not fake at all.   It's a wonderful addition to my shower routine, and makes an incredible gift!

Received a trial size and while I am not really crazy about it on the body, it has been a godsend for removing makeup and deep cleansing my face in the shower. Rinses off completely (no washcloth required) leaving no residue and my skin incredibly soft, and so far I have had no breakouts.  A surprise keeper of a product.

First off - this smells amazing! I know using this is in the shower will give me an extra luxurious shower experience. I found that using this as a shaving oil also makes your legs sooo silky smooth and wonderful. It's a bit pricey, but a nice little luxurious treat for the body.

I have fairly sensitive skin, and this shower oil is wonderful. I've only used it for a week, and my skin is so much happier. No more dry skin, but it gets the excess oil off too. The scent is a little strong, but it doesn't linger, and I'm really sensitive to scents. Also, a little goes a long way, so it won't get used up in a heartbeat!
This is a great in shower oil for shaving my legs. Leaves my skin smelling good and soft.

This is one of my must have body-beauty-product. I love to use it after i wash with soap, to soften and hydrate the skin. Love to use it once or twice a week or whenever I like to have a spa experience :) Highly recommended for special days with your live one !

I had high hopes for this product but unfortunately it is a let down, it barely lathers up unless you put a ton on your sponge and even then the suds are minimal. This product is too pricy to have to use so much at once, and it still doesn't leave me feeling as clean as cheaper alternatives

This has replaced my shaving cream and my body wash. It makes my skin so silky smooth. I do get really bad eczema on my arms, however, and this did irritate it so I just don't use it on my arms anymore. I wouldn't mind if the fragrance wasn't as potent, but nonetheless, I will still continue to buy this product as I feel it is more moisturizing than a body wash.

I liked the thickness of this oil and how easily it came out of the bottle. The smell is definitely almond, so not offensive but not really what I'd want to smell like either, but the smell didn't last on me so it didn't really matter. It foams extremely quickly and rinses very cleanly but it didn't pack enough moisture to help my skin. I was dried out before I got dressed.

I love this shower oil! It really does what it says in my opinion. It softens my skin a ton and I love the smell. When used with a loofah it foams up nicely, and you can use it to shave as well. Would recommend to everyone! Especially those with dry skin.

I love, love this shower oil makes my skin so soft, I also use the regular body oil since I only had a sample of the regular oil, I use my coconut oil after a shower wonderful have even told my sisters and friends about the l'occitane oil
Awesome stuff and great for shaving❤️ Lasts for a long time and makes my skin so soft
Smells nice but really doesn't later up much. You need to use lots. It does soften your skin but there are much better products out there.
I love this stuff. Also works wonders for shaving which I had heard about on you tube! Wonderful stuff!!!
Bought the small size of this to give it a try and I'm glad I did. It wasn't what a expected but I do use it for shaving.

I received a 2.5oz bottle of this shower oil in one of my beauty box subscriptions. The fragrance is really unpleasant (I also thought of wet dog, that so many other reviewers on here mentioned), and it lingers on your skin after you come out of the shower. The oil doesn't really lather, or wash anything off, for that matter. It also left my body puff feeling oily to the touch after use. All of these are really the absolute last things I would want to see from a body wash, and I see no point to this product. After one use I threw out the bottle.

I use this stuff for shaving, not washing, and it is amazing! A tiny bit goes a long way and leaves your skin feeling super smooth and hydrated. It also does not build up residue on the razor so it doesn't get worn down as quickly. It also creates a very slight lather so you can see where you've shaved for those visual people such as myself! The scent is amazing as well, its subtle and soothing.

I absolutely love this stuff. It smells wonderful and it feels great on the skin. I also use it for shaving and it works better than many shave gels. One caveat, I got a small bottle to take on a trip and found that I had to put it in a plastic bag because it the bottle did not hold up well to travel.
I've ordered this several times.  The suds shower off workout smell, and yet oil leaves skin moisturized.  Not too oily - doesn't cause breakouts.  Like the scent as well - not too overpowering.

reviews.review_title: Wanted to join the hype, but....
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to get this in the mail due to the ravvvve reviews and loving almond scents, but this just didn't do it for me. I am fine with the (lack of) lather, and I enjoy the smell (even thought it doesn't scream almonds at all...it's more of a flowery almond if that makes sense?). Still, the lather kind of dissolves immediately once you put it on your skin, leaving you with just a dry oil feeling that didn't leave me feeling very clean or moisturized. Maybe this product works best with a loofah or washcloth? Don't like it enough to repurchase :(
i use it right before i am done showering, and it makes my skin really soft and hydrated. no need to moisturize afterwards. i didnt really notice the smell.

I know I am not in the majority at all but I didn't really like this, you guys. The scent is a typical almond scent, it smells alright. But I like to have my bath products strongly scented so after I take a shower, I noticeably smell like that product. This also, for me, didn't lather too much and I understand that this is an oil, so it really won't lather, but I prefer a good lather to feel really clean. I also had to use a lot of this product in order to feel fully cleansed. It was alright, but I really wouldn't repurchase. I'm actually using this on my 4 year old daughter during her bath time. She's got sensitive skin and it doesn't irritate her or make her itchy. It works well on her so I'll use it up to avoid wasting but like I said, i tend to prefer other characteristics of soap so I won't repurchase.
Smells amazing and feels great on my skin. By far my favorite shower oil I've tried.

This shower oil is the answer to my wishes for a product that will leave me feeling clean but not covered in an oil slick.  My back gets especially dry but this product alleviates that problem entirely.  Here's a secret! I use a regular kitchen sponge, one side is sponge and the other scrubby.  The sponge side is for my torso and the scrubby side is for my legs and arms, the areas that need more exfoliating.  The shower oil is perfect for keeping my skin soft while exfoliating and is not overly foamy or frothy like some products are.  I feel quite certain you'll love this product.
I Absolutely love the way this makes my skin feel!
I use this exclusively for shaving. I love the close shave I get and the lovely scent. Don't use as a body wash because it doesn't lather well.

I have used this product for a couple of years now and love it. It lathers nicely and lightly, smells great, is not oily (a big concern in the shower!) and leaves my skin soft. it is expensive, but you only need a little. I would give it 5 starts if it was less expensive.

reviews.review_title: The only body wash I use now
reviews.review_text: I love this body wash! It's moisturizing without being greasy and doesn't irritate my skin at all. I also feel strongly about purchasing products that do not test on animals and this one doesn't so extra bonus! I literally won't use anything else anymore.

this is my favorite soap ever. I've purchased it so many times after receiving a sample last year. The smell of this shower oil is so calming, not over powering but sweet. I love it. Also it really moisturizes my skin!

I got a small bottle of this in a VIB Points Perk. I was a bit leery because as much as I love almonds, I really dislike that bitter almond extract smell.  But this, like the body oil spray, has the beautiful, soothing, gentle smell of almond blossoms.  The oil itself is bliss to use.  In summer, I often don't need body lotion after my shower because this is so moisturizng and hydrating.  While I like a foaming body wash for after the gym or on my feet when they are grubby from a day of walking around or gardening in sandals, for all the rest of me, this body oil is perfect and offers all the cleansing I need on those areas that don't get sweaty or grimy.  I will repurchase the full size, for sure.

I got a sample size of this and had to purchase the full sized version. It smells delicious and leaves my skin really moisturized-I didn't even need a lotion after the shower. It also lathers beautifully. Definitely will repurchase again!
This product is amazing! You want be disappointed. It smells divine and last on the skin. What more can you ask for?!

I've been using this shower oil for a few months, and it is now one of my forever products. I never want to be without it.   I use it after shaving my legs, I smooth a few drops on my arms and hands and knees...you name it. It helps keep my skin soft and supple, with no oily residue or greasy feeling left behind. It does have a rather distinct scent to it, but I like it - sweet and almond-y without being overpowering. Honestly, I recommend this oil to everyone I know. Get the sample size and you'll soon discover how lovely this it really is.

I got this in the Sephora travel bag and it's ok. I use this when I shave my legs, and they end up being really soft. I'm not a huge fan of the smell, wish it was a true almond smell. I still have this in my shower, and it's a smaller size, so it's not something I obviously reach for or it would be gone.

definitely felt my skin was not as dry after using this product at the end of my shower.  I like it for the summer when I don't like to put thick or oily moisturizers on but still want to keep my skin from getting dry.  Got the sample size in the sephora travel kit which lasted me for about a week (more if not using every day) and will buy a larger size now :)

I tried this product and didn't notice any significant changes in skin texture or softness. It has a unique smell but it didn't smell bad to me.  I didn't dislike the product but I'm not in love with it either. It didn't do anything noticeable.

reviews.review_title: a must have for women of all ages
reviews.review_text: Whether you are 21 or 61 you need this. It's just that good. Makes your skin feel new (and younger), and the scent is soft yet fabulous. Gets you clean but keeps your skin supple. Good for year round.

A friend of mine turned me into this product and it's changed my life. It's a great multi purpose cleansing oil. It is able to double as both a cleansing oil and shaving oil. The smell is amazing and it makes my skin so soft. It's definitely a staple in my beauty routine.
Used as a shave gel for my sensitive skin
Excellent body wash-very moisturizing, and you only need to use a few stops at a time so one bottle can go a long way
Absolutely love this product, my skin is so soft and when I use it in a bubble bath, the scent is just amazing!

I adore L'Occitane's almond scent and, equally as important, my husband adores it on me. This shower oil is gentle and keeps my skin moisturized. The scent left behind is soft fresh and doesn't clash with my perfumes. When I first tried it, I was concerned about residue in my shower but I've never had a problem, and I've been using this product for years.

I don't know what the deal is with this scent. When I used it in the shower it honestly smelled like a wet animal. It had an almond scent at the start, but quickly turned into a funky wet fur scent that made me want to gag.

I received this shower oil in the new Sephora Travel Bag. I love almond oil but this product missed the mark. It has some additional fragrance, like a musk, that I'm not crazy about. And the shower gel won't lather in my loofa. I use a ton of product and add lots of water but by the time I reach my legs, it's all gone and I'm rubbing a dry loofa on my skin. Won't be purchasing a full size.

I used to be very hesitant with anything oils, so when my friend showed this to me, I was immediately turned off and was not interested in it.  Fast forward to a couple years later, I fell in love with facial oils and cleansing oils. So I decided to try this shower oil and completely loved it within first use! The smell is so pleasant and it really helps nourish and soften your skin!  A little bit goes a long way, you just lather it with some water and cleanse all over. After rinsing, you are not left feeling so clean that you feel dry. Your skin is left feeling clean and really soft!
This shower oil is so dreamy perfect for dry skin or during winter season. It make your skin so soft after you came out from the shower. It doesn't make your skin oily.

reviews.review_title: Love everything but the scent is horrible
reviews.review_text: I have the most sensitive, dry skin so using this product was one of the best things I've done to my body. I don't have body hair so I can't relate to using it as a shave-oil, but I can definitely say that it's a good shower oil for my daily shower body-massage regimen. It washes off pretty easily but I'm surprised that it keeps my skin so hydrated. This might be one of the first body oil/wash product that didn't irritate/over-dry my skin. BUT THE SCENT!!!! I love almond, clean, fresh non-floral/non-fruity scents so I ordered this online. But boy, did it sting my olfactory bulbs!!!! It took me almost 2 weeks to get used to the scent whenever I showered, and even after 4 months, I'm feeling nauseous from the smell.

I received the smaller size of this shower oil in my Allure beauty box and it's already almost gone.
