I use it for shaving cream and I honestly cannot imagine using anything else to shave with , it's so softening and it absorbs into my skin so well (especially freshly shaven legs!) It's scent is a nice neutral almond-y scent and I would recommend this to anyone especially as a shaving cream!!:)
PRO - Super soft skin - Delicious and luxurious scent  CON - I ran out. Try it, you'll love it!

reviews.review_title: good, but not for that price
reviews.review_text: I'm addicted to watching beauty videos on YouTube, and because this gets so much hype, I've been dying to try it. I got the sample size, and I'm a little underwhelmed. It's super nice and makes my skin really soft, but the smell kind of reminds me of a rubber duck if you know what I mean. Again, it's nice, but I wouldn't spend that much money on it.

I absolutely love this product!  My skin feels so soft and moisturized after using it.  Especially nice in the dry winter months! I use it with a loofah and for an oil it actually lathers and foams pretty well so you don't need to use too much.  The only reason this is getting a four is because I wish they had more scents in the shower oil format.
This shower oil is amazing! It makes your skin feel super smooth and healthy.
I use this to shave my legs and I love the way it leaves my legs feeling. Great product I will continue to repurchase it.

the skin on my face is oily but the skin on my body is dry so this product is great for me! it doesn't strip the skin at all. it leaves skin fairly soft but doesn't removed any intense dry patches (like dry elbows). i like to use this with my exfoliating gloves to remove the dead skin and hydrate at the same time. it doesn't lather up too much but that's not very important to me. i recommend applying a body butter or lotion after using this to keep the skin hydrated for longer. also it smells great and i'm sensitive to fragrance so that's a plus.

It is expensive but I really like it since my skin doesn't react well to heavily fragranced soapy shower gels - I instantly break out in little red bumps.  This shower oil, however, works really well. Smell is not strong and doesn't get old. I usually get a large bottle with a pump, not sure why Sephora doesn't offer it on a regular basis.
This smell is so great and it's thick. Ie you can put it on while in the shower and the water doesn't wash it off like most and it's wonderful to use to shave legs.
This is the only product that's hasn't dried my skin to irritation. Its perfect!!
Love this delicious, soft, body oil.  Definitely worth the money.  Left my skin soft and supple.  Is also now a staple in my shower.  Love it!
My skin has never felt this smooth and looked so good after shaving! This is now a staple in my shower!

Love love love this product! Leaves my skin super silky even going into the next day. Light almond scent, but I love how almond paste smells, so I might be biased on the scent. I combine it with the almond body oil after my shower. I'm on my third large bottle.

This stuff smells good and works well as a shaving oil, most shaving creams do nothing for my skin and I always have razor burn. This oil makes shaving easier and much less painful for me. The price is a little high for something I just use for shaving but buying this and using a promo code and getting 3 samples makes it a bit more worthwhile.
This smells so wonderful and makes my skin so soft after showering.

reviews.review_title: Smells like a French Country side Spa
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff. No it didn't foam up like soap but that's because it's an oil. It makes my skin so soft and I can't get enough of the smell. Multi time buyer of this product
Smells amazing and makes my skin so soft!

Love the scent but this doesn't lather up all! Also doesn't make skin softer than any other average moisturizing wash.  If you want soft skin with an almond scent skip this product and just buy the lotion.
I've been feeling up my leg for the last half hour. Crazy smooth, like I never grow hair on my legs. Never will use anything else to shave with. Going to go touch my legs some more.
It smells amazing! It has a slight lather, so i only use it on my arms and legs and my skin feels great after!
Incredible! I have severely dry and dehydrated skin and this stuff has saved my life! Worth every penny!

reviews.review_title: leaves my skin soft and smelling great
reviews.review_text: I use this when shaving for extra hydration.

I have very dry skin that can get flaky a little after the shower. This shower oil really helps. It doesn't feel dry at all. While it doesn't lather so much (some people may not like it), it cleans pretty well. Great feelings after the shower if you like the scent (the almond scent is not subtle).

Sometimes after a long, hard day when you want to be pampered, this is exactly what you need. I have been looking for some kind of soap for my nightly showers that are pleasant smelling but not too overpowering, i think this is the one. It is oily-ish and that only adds to its appeal. Very silky. The price, though, is the only unpleasant factor here. But then, it's a quality product and a little goes a long way

I use this every day and my skin is def. more hydrated. In the past, using soap left my skin itching and dry but this certainly helps. It does not have a very strong smell which is great because then it does not interfere with my perfume.
Really enjoyed using this oil, it leaves your skin feeling soft and the almond smell lingers but not so strongly. A nice treat!

I love this product no doubt. Shipping could of Ben packed better. I lost about 2oz of it because the snap kid was slightly open. I live in Hawaii but this is with Rouge membership shipping. Disappointed with the lack of security but I still love this product.

Like stated in the title, i bought this because of the good reviews here. A bit disappointed. I didn't return only because it's too much hassle, and I already opened and used it bebore I knew it's not what I expected. I would recommend getting a small sample before you buy it. To me the smell stinks; I only use it after I come back from gym. I use a lot each time; just wAnted to finish it off.

My skin gets really dry and sometimes i would even get rashes throughout winter season, this product however saves me! I can feel the difference from the first time using it.  I believe that there is a matching body lotion that comes together with it, but for me this works best with L'occitane's Shea body butter. t
I use this to shave my legs.  I really, really like it for this purpose b/c I don't really care for regular shave cream.
This is my second order of the Cleansing and Softening Shower Oil with Almond Oil. I love it! The scent is really nice & it leaves my skin very soft.
Definitely a little pricey but leaves your skin extremely soft and is AMAZING for shaving. Definitely try to pick it up during the sales!

reviews.review_title: Amazing product, but WAYYYY over priced!
reviews.review_text: I use this when I shave and it makes my skin so soft. Unfotunately I find it to be over priced for everyday use. I bought this during the VIB sale with 15% off and I still don't know if I would repurchase it even at the marked down price. But if your looking for a luxurious shower cleanser, this is the one to try!
Almond shower oil is absolutely the best for shaving, much better than any regular shaving gel. You are able to get really close and smooth shave. Smell is great too.

This stuff leaves your skin nice and soft. I use it for shaving, its pretty awesome. Buy the small one, give it a try, that's what I did before buying the big one. I buy these when they have the 15% or 20% sale!

I love how soft this is for my skin. I get eczema in the colder months and this shower gel is perfect for my sensitive skin. I have always enjoyed L'Occitane's products, but this is probably my favorite.  The scent is very captivating, hence one of the reasons I can't go without it. Between the smell and the texture benefits this provides, this is the only soap I use.

I got this as a free sample at L'Occitane years ago and I immediately fell in love. While I like it as a shower oil, this is my go to when shaving my armpits. I have incredibly sensitive skin and shaving gels and creams often irritate my armpits. This is not the case with this product. It is soft on my skin and lathers to the right consistency for shaving. While I don't use it on my legs, it's perfect for my armpits.   It also doesn't hurt that it smells fantastic. It's not a strong scent, but a soft one that makes showering with this product incredibly enjoyable.   I would recommend this product to literally anyone.

This body wash is great after a long day. It smells amazing I don't care what anyone says it feels amazing its not foaming like an oil but never have i felt so clean and moisturized and I love the fact that the ingredients is more natural. If all the above is what you looking for in a body wash this is for you.

is this cleansing oil a necessity? definitely not. do you need it? yes! i feel like this is something you need to try at least once. it comes out as a gel and smooths over the skin like an oil. it smells heavenly and feels great on the skin. i dont know that it's the best cleanser i've used but the experience is just so nice, it feels like an indulgence
I really don't understand the hype on this product. It feels nice but the smell is not good. Smells like old oil to me. Not sure if I got a bad one but it smells very bad to me.

I really, really love this stuff. I would not think of it as a shower gel AT ALL and wouldn't use it with a loofah or you may be disappointed. (Not to mention possibly waste quite a bit) It isn't a foamy body wash like most are use to, but it packs a mighty moisturizing punch! I have terribly dry skin on my body, mostly my legs and feet but combo skin on my face. This winter I had terrible dry patches on my legs that was itchy and made my olive skin look flaky. I tried so many body scrubs and butters that I was disappointed with I actually started making my own bath and body products. I was using a sugar scrub in the shower then when I got out I used a thick body butter, still the next day my skin would feel dry again. I thought I would try this oil because it looked interesting and had good reviews.       The way I applied this was after I used my regular body wash with a loofah I poured a couple of drops onto each section of my body and rubbed it in with my hands. I apied as the very last step before I actually got out of the shower. I actually turned off my water to rub this in so it could soak into my skin and wouldn't rinse off immediately. Then I used a body butter bar that I made for the shower (with beeswax or candelilla wax, grape seed, sweet almond, jojoba and fractionated cocunut oil plus Shea and kokum butters, see Natures Garden on YouTube for a great recipe and video) and rubbed the butter bar over the shower oil. It is basically like a heavy duty lotion bar with butters and waxes to seal in moisture. I then turned back on the shower to a lukewarm temp so that some of the oils and butters wouldnt all be washed away. After I got out I patted dry and didn't use ANY lotion or body butter on my body which is extremely rare. My skin felt so silky smooth and even the next day my skin was smooth and moisturized and didn't feel or look dry at all. I am really so impressed by this, i havent found anything so effective that lasts. It is more expensive than what I usually pay for bath products, but a drop or two for each section of your body is all you need. I bought the small travel bottle to see if it would work for me and I have used many times and only used about 25%. I will definitely be buying the bigger bottle. It has helped my skin tremendously. You will love it as long as you are looking for a moisturizer and not a body wash.
I had difficulty getting it to lather, best used with a loofa, also had a grandma smell to it, other than that, it did make my skin feel great after use and I'd probably buy this again.
I received a small sample of this product in a beauty box, and fell in love with it. It smells amazing, and it leaves my skin smooth. Definitely purchasing a full size bottle!

A little of this product goes a long way. One quarter sized dollop is enough for your legs and stomach area. Once you mix with water, it lathers. The lather is minimal, but enough. This product is highly moisturizing, and makes your skin feel unbelievably soft afterwards. I like to double-up and use the Supple Skin Oil by L'Occitane for an extra layer of scent and sealing in moisture.   The scent of this softening shower oil is dreamy - it is subtle, and not overpowering. Each time I use it, my boyfriend comments on how wonderful I smell.
This shower oil from L'Occitane leaves your skin feeling soft and smelling great. Love it !!
Not really cleaner, more of a moisturers. I use my regular shower gel than I use this product and pat myself dry.
My skin is dry, and I am constantly lathering lotion on. I thought this would solve my problem by trapping moisture in, but I broke out instead. Smells lovely though.

I saw amazing reviews and decided to pick this up. When I opened the top to smell it I wasn't crazy about it but it smells so much better when you actually use it. Been having terrible dry skin and this was so soothing. Gives a decent lather. I love it! My skin is so happy today. Not itchy dry and flaky like usual.
Love this bodywash! I got it thinking it might not live up to the hype, but it definietly did! I have sensitive skin due to  eczema and I don't get a reaction to it.

reviews.review_title: Takes a lot to impress me...
reviews.review_text: ... and this did.  Lovely smell, moisturizes great and doesn't leave a sticky feel.  I have tried many in-shower moisturizers and this takes the cake.

I am really obsessed with these products! I loved the lotion so much that I purchased the bath oil and now want the body oil. I love the scent, it's like no other, and I love how it keeps my skin soft. Even the next night, my husband says he can smell the scent on the bedsheets and it reminds him of me. The scent is not overpowering at all. Love love love this stuff!!

I was recommended this in store, and what a great buy to prevent dry skin. I use this daily in the shower with a loofah, and while it doesn't lather as much as other products, I use the amount I need anyway regardless of not having as much lather. I bought the regular bottle and have found that I'm about halfway through it after 2 months of use. And I rarely bother with any moisturizer except for hands during the winter. This is one of my must haves all the time, as during the winter, my skin used to get really bad.

while my face is combination, my body is on the drier side and i don't use body lotion...so i always purchase this in the winter time so my skin doesn't get too dry. it doesn't lather up much so i put a little on the palm of my hand and step away from the shower head and then put it on my skin. it works well if you want to give yourself a quick massage as well as double as a shaving balm/cream.
Essential for shaving! I only wish the brand didn't test on animals.

I love this oil. Although, it's not very lathering, it's a great cleanser. I have very dry skin and this is perfect for it. I also use the Supple Skin Oil just before I step out of the bath/shower, then gently pat myself dry. Both products smell heavenly. Definitely worth the splurge.
This produce is so hyped up. It smells amazing and is super moisturizing, BUT it doesn't lather. At all. So you end up having to use a ton of it..
I have extremely dry skin and this shower oil has relieved the dryness and flaking after one use.

Was hoping for more out of this product because it smells so AMAZING! Doesn't lather like a body soap at all but does do a nice job as a shave oil if you're into spending this much for a shave oil. I've resorted to washing with a different soap and then applying some of this oil in order to smell like it once I get out of the shower. Wouldn't buy again.
Spa at home! Love it. Great for shaving also.
As a shower gel it's alright. But to use for shaving is absolutely amazing, something I that would not have occurred to me if I hadn't read other reviews. Will totally repurchase!

Great for shaving and dry skin. Not crazy about the scent it's a bit strong when showering but it doesn't make skin smell bad. Love the way my skin feels after and don't have to moisturize after shower.
This product smells great and is refreshing while doing a great job of hydrating your skin.
In cold dry winters this is a must have...I can not get enough of this...I use it every other time I shower...and it SMELLS so good!!!

This has replaced my coconut oil, shave creams and shave gels. I am in love with the scent, and I love how my razor just glides when I shave now. I also have very dry skin in the winter months, and this is a great cleanser when I need something a little more gentle. i have purchased all 3 sizes and am partial to the 8.4 oz size because it sits on my shower ledge easier than the pump bottle. Will continue to repurchase!
This feel really nice on the skin, but i am not sure I would repurchase. I find that coconut oil will work just as well!

I bought this small size for when I'm traveling.  It's tough on my skin to be in different cities with different water compounds.  Using the hotel soap was not keeping my skin moisturized well enough, so I wanted something I could use as a consistent beauty routine, without the messy soap dilemma.  Overall, I'm very happy with the results... soft skin, not tight feeling, very hydrating.  Unfortunately, there is really no scent, which was disappointing as others raved about the scent.  Also, not foaming, as described.   Rather just rubs on and rinses off.

This feels amazing on my skin! Don't be discouraged by the fact that it is oil.... A little goes a long way and it lathers nicely. It smells wonderful and I have never had a closer shave! I recommend the pump if possible... It is much easier to dispense the right amount.

I love the smell. It is nicely moisturizing. It does not lather - but this is not important to me. It works very nicely with my perfume (Jo Malone, orange blossom). I've been using the sample size but I'll get the larger size next time.

reviews.review_title: got a sample and now need a fullsizs
reviews.review_text: This is amazing. My skin feels wonderful and the scent is AMAZING I'm hooked now!
This oil works very well, but the sweet almond smell is overpowering--and I love almond skincare bath products.

reviews.review_title: Don't let the name scare you off
reviews.review_text: Seriously, don't let the name scare you. Yes, it's a shower oil but it doesn't leave you oily. It goes on an oil, but once you start lathering it into your skin, it turns into a milk. It feels SO nice, smells amazing and rinses off easily. I have combination skin, but I promise this doesn't make you more oily. I feel much more hydrated and softer. L'Occitane really amazes me.

This stuff is amazing. The smell is intoxicating (I layer the almond milk concentrate over it). It's an oil, but provides a light lather so you still feel like you're getting clean. Leaves my skin so soft and beautifully scented. At first, I thought $50 was a lot to pay for a body wash. Don't get me wrong, I still think it's a lot to spend, but I think it is so worth it. I've gone through 2 of these 16.9oz bottles already and don't plan on switching to any other. BTW, Sephora has this for $9 less than the Loccitane store so get it here!!!

I got a small sample of this in my reward kit and really like it! Delighted to see its only $24! I will definitely be purchasing full size once my small bottle runs out. It feels great on the skin and smells nice too

I love everything about this shower oil! The scent is very lovely, it is not overpowering or lacking in any way. My skin always feels super soft after I use it. Although it doesn't do anything for the dry patches on my skin, my lotion makes up for that. I can definitely feel a difference in my skin in terms of softness.
I love how silky my body is when using this oil. I out it on wet skin and gently dry.
I love this...the smell the way it make my skin feel. Make shaving a breeze. Excellent purchase.

I love this product. It smells amazing and moisturizes without being greasy, which I absolutely hate. I was worried about it leaving me greasy because of the oil, but that is not the case at all. It foams up and washes off easily. I especially love to use it for shaving my legs for extra moisture, and I highly recommend it for those with sensitive skin like me.
Smells great! Oil that lathers great in the shower!
This is an oil that really hydrates the skin, when I use it during my shower I don't have to put lotion on after. The smell is strong but soft at the same time. I love this!

This is the best shower oil EVER. It smells fantastic and leaves your skin soft with no residue. Great to shave your legs with. I use this product everyday and have probably purchased about 20 bottles for myself, friends and family.
It makes your skin soft, but it doesn't lather at all even with a loofa.

This is the best, and most luxurious cleanser I've ever had! I didn't like how my cleansers were drying out my skin so I figured I's try an oil-based cleanser. I love it! I used to moisturise with oil after showering and now I hardly feel the need to. This does lather, but I've found it doesn't lather very well with a loofah. I just use my hands to lather that up and that does the trick. Also, the light almond scent is heavenly!
so silky soft and smells heavenly; I love all the entire l'occitane almond collection

I am really enjoying this shower oil. It softens the skin so well especially during these cold, dry winters where I live. I've noticed a tremendous difference in the texture of my skin from using this versus a shower gel. I love the feeling of it and the subtle smell of almond. It isn't too overpowering. But, this doesn't take the place of lotion. You will still need to use lotion afterwards. It's not even marketed as a replacement for lotion, it still foams up. I have been following this up with the Nivea in shower lotion. I put it on right after I rinse off the shower oil. I have been using them together for a month. They work together perfectly.

I haven't tried this product for myself, but I bought this for my grandma for Christmas and she called me JUST to ask where I got this and where she can get more! She's very picky with her products, and I was nervous to give this to her, but she absolutely loves it. This is definitely a product for all ages.
This is perfection. It smells wonderful, it leaves your skin extremely soft and hydrated. I LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE it

I am on a seemingly endless search for something that works like a facial cleansing oil that makes it so if I skip lotion after my shower because I'm late as usual, I won't be an itchy mess all day. I had high hopes, but if you have super dry skin, this doesn't quite do it nearly as well as some other drugstore moisturizing bath soaps. Also- I wanted it to smell more almond-y.
love love this. it smells Divine and feels gorgeous on the skin. I feel so luxurious every time I use it. Love this line!
This is perfection, the best shower oil I have ever tried. Totally non-greasy. Scent is like HEAVEN!!! Perfect soft almond smell yet doesn't compete with my perfume!!

reviews.review_title: I love L'Occitane body cleansing oil
reviews.review_text: I started using this over 5 years ago. It's a wonderful gentle body cleanser. It doesn't usually foam up, it usually just gets a bit milky, but I have gotten some bubbles from it a few times. It's one of my favorite products for shaving. I recommend trying it.

reviews.review_title: try a small size and fall in love
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this stuff. I got it originally in a gift size set of L'Occitane products, and while I would normally purchase a shower wash from target or something, I'm buying the 16.9oz. The smell is incredible, and so is the feeling on your skin. It's the last thing I use in the shower after a loofa/scrub so it absorbs. You can notice the difference when you dry off. Your skin really feels smoother. Not sure about the long-terms effects, but it was such a great feeling in and out of the shower that I couldn't help myself. And I'm a sucker for a pump bottle.

I absolutely love this shower oil. I use a shower oil from Sabon and it is nothing like this. This is an actual oil. It lathers up if you use it with a bath lily. On your hands and it wont be as creamy. You feel hydrated in the shower and out. I follow with the supple skin oil and the smell is amazing. The combination is pricey but, you don't use much and the scent is well worth it!
This is the only stuff I have used to shave my armpits that does not leave them irritated, and it smells great!

There's not much lather to this shower oil, but the scent is absolutely to die for and helps soften my skin. It's so luxurious! I have my nightly shower, light candles for ambience and music for relaxation. This oil cleanser has an almond scent that lingers. The small try- it out version is $12 and worth it vs spending $25 not knowing if it'll be for you. I say give it a go!
If I use this too frequently I break out,but it is the best thing I have ever used for shaving. Love it

I use a foot cream by L'Occitane and it works so well that I figured I'd try this. The scent is heaven if you like Almond scents. I was confused at first when it stated it would lather, it lathers really nice! And with living in NC during the winter where its 20 degrees outside, this works so well. It leaves my skin which is already severely dry due to pregnancy moisturized. no itching or anything. I don't even use lotion after I shower anymore. I recommend this to everyone!

I absolutely love this shower oil. My skin is dry and Our San Francisco Winter has been really cold! This oil is very moisturizing and does leaves my skin soooo soft! The scent is pure bliss. A very nice treat for the skin! I do find that I need to use quite a bit to get the lather that I prefer but all in all a fabulous oil!
Pretty nice scent, but the best is that it leaves your skin really hydrated, even if it's winter and you live in the desert. I would love if this formulation came in other scents.

I really enjoy the feel and smell of loss of time o I really enjoy the feel and smell of this product those products . Perfect for a bubble bath or just squirted on your pouf or whatever at lathers up nicely. I recommend probably get it again

Not a life changing product. Probably won't be buying again. It smells nice, and it feels good on the skin. However, I my skin was still itchy and dry after using. I liked using it better for shaving than anything else. Does not lather like stated in the description.

I was excited to try this because of the great reviews on the site and raving reviews from skin blogs but I'm disappointed. It smells nice but the lather is very minimal. Unless you lather your skin with your hands and not a loofah or pouf, you won't see much lather. I'll keep it to shave with but I prefer a product that has a lot of lather which my good old Philosophy standby has.
I thought this stuff kind of smelled like wet dog. It made my skin soft (oily), but I had to wash with a different soap to get the stink off. I ended up returning it.
I like this product but it is not a good value in this size. It is available in larger sizes and also in a refill big size. It has. Very faint scent.
For me personally, this was way too irritating. It didn't help my skin feel better and I felt that I had to use a ton to get the desired lather

I've been using this product for a while now and much like everyone else I love to use it for shaving. The smell is great and doesn't linger afterwards, but my favourite would have to be how moisturizing it is. This also makes a great gift for any skincare lover!!

Currently about half way through my first bottle. I really love it for shaving, it makes my skin really soft and doesn't irritate my sensitive skin. I wasn't a big fan of the smell at first, but I have grown to like it. I tried using it as a body wash and personally didn't really like it. It doesn't work into a lather as much as I thought it would and I have to use a lot of product. I feel like if I hadn't initially used it as a body wash I would have way more product left, because I barely have to use any when it comes to shaving. Will probably repurchase.

I only use this for shaving oil, but it's awesome! You don't need a lot so it is going to last forever. It lathers at first, but then turns into a body wash consistency so if you are using it for shaving oil try not to tub it in too much. It provides enough oil and lather to have a very smooth, moisturizing shave, but without getting your shower all oily, which is a huge plus. Aside from the great texture, the smell is my favorite part. It has a very light, but slightly perfumed almond oil smell. It's not overpowering though, which surprised me since all the other L'Occitane products I've tried have a very strong perfume smell.

I simply love that scent, it’s heaven in a bottle! This shower oil is hydrating and leaves a subtle sweet scent to your skin. I tried it once as a shaving oil but won’t do it again: my legs were dry afterward (but I have very dry legs and it’s winter…). Even though it’s hydrating, I need to put on a cream or lotion after shower during winter or I’ll have flaky skin, that’s the only reason why I took out one star.
No lather, smells alright. Very watery almost.
use this to shave!!! your skin will be so soft afterwards and not irritated. makes shaving almost enjoyable, and will make your life a lot easier. can't live without this oil!

Love this shower oil, particularly in the winter. It has a subtle almond scent. I was skeptical that the oil would lather but it does. I don't need to apply lotion after using this. Only gave it 4 stars because I find it a bit pricey.
It's good for dry skin and skin does appear softer and more supple after use, however it has a not so pleasant (too floral) a scent and doesn't produce rich lather

I was a bits skeptical about this product due to its price. But it totally worth it if you have really dry skin. It does transform my skin smoother, softer and glowy. In addition, you don't need that much compared to shower gel. This bottle last a long way.

This is a must! First got it as a sample. Fell in love with it and can't live without it ever since. It lathers awesome so you are cleansing and moisturizing at the same time. The smell is absolutely wonderful. I have very dry skin specially in the winter so it's the best product ever! The only thing I wish was that SEPHORA would sell the big size with the pump AND the refill bags which make it very nice due to the huge savings. So, once I finish my bottle, I will be buying the pump version as well as the refill bag from the l'occitane shop themselves. This product is a must in every shower. Makes me feel so pampered.

I recently bought the holiday duo (with the full size oil and lotion) because I loved this so much. It has such a great scent that I would make everyone smell it. I was very unsure of this when I bought it because I've never used a shower oil before but this is really great! It lathers really well and it makes my skin feel so soft. I could probably go without lotion after using this product, that's how moisturizing it is.
I like the way this feels on my skin, not too greasy. I gave it 4 stars instead of 5, because I had a very hard time opening the top every time I used it.
This feels great even with my sensitive skin, leaves me feeling silky smooth.
It is very nice , makes your skin is soft I like it
This shower oil is so softening. Goes on smoothly and rinses great. Love the smell. Received as sample and have bought ever since.

reviews.review_title: softens dry skin in the shower
reviews.review_text: Great shower oil - it lathers as you apply it, so you're cleansing and moisturizing at the same time. Though I still use lotion in addition to this shower oil; some people whose skin is not as dry can just use this shower oil without any additional lotion application. It has a very light, delicate scent - does not smell like almonds at all.
Feels very nice on the skin

I rarely take the time out to write reviews but this product compels me to! It's truly is magic in a bottle. First off, the sweet almond scent is heaven in a bottle--for that alone, I would purchase. Yet, that's not even the best part about the product. I've always suffered from dry skin so when it came to shaving, I'd step out of the shower and profusely apply lotion to get rid of the itching (always happened to me after shaving and I could never find an appropriate solution.) Well, I just found one! It's so moisturizing, I could skip the lotion all together after the shower. If you're hesitant, I promise you you won't regret buying it--even for the steep price. It's worth every penny! May this product never be discontinued - I will purchase forever!
I received this as a sample from the Sephora store. I was hoping for a luxurious feel. It barely lathers. I gave it two stars because it has a great smell.

I been having skin irritation and rashes on my legs and I have tried everything from lotions to other skincare products and washes and NOTHING, I mean nothing has worked so I decided to give this a try and I been using it for at least 3 weeks now as a shaving base and my legs no longer have the rash and my skin is smoother, I would recommend this product to anyone having the same issues...this really helped me out this is a big staple in my life!

I was excited to get this cleanser because of the positive reviews and normally I love almond scented things. However, when I tried it, I didn't feel like it was cleansing or moisturizing at all and it smelled awful. I agree with recent reviews that compared it to a weird chemical or burnt plastic- that's exactly what it smelled like to me as well. It's possible that this was a bad batch, but based on my experience, I recommend staying away for this product.

So excited to try this and smell the almond. I was not wowed by the smell. The lid is extremely hard to open especially as your hands are slippery. I need to insert my finger nail to open it every time.

It was an interesting product to try, and I liked the feeling it left after I got out of the shower, but to me it smells like some weird chemical...like boxed hair dye or something. I got the travel size, and will use it up with the body oil(which smells better...fancier) but probably wouldn't purchase the full size. Its a fun luxury thing but I dont think its neccessary for every day
I really really wanted to like this shower oil. It came out kind of thick and sticky and smelled like burnt plastic. It immediately went into the garbage. Too bad!
I do not like the shower oil at all. I think it smells like a wet dog. It is so horrible. I love LOVE the lotion and the oil spray, but the oil wash is horrible.

I bought the travel size and took it on a business trip. It just seemed wasteful, honestly, especially considering how expensive it was. I didn't find it particularly moisturizing. Maybe I was using it correctly, but it seemed to take much more for a single shower than it should and I never got a good lather out of it. It's cool that other people love it and all, to each their own, just not my thing I guess.

This smells absolutely wonderful, and it makes my skin feel so smooth and clean... It's really gentle too! I get the most perfect shave from this gel, no irritation, just endless smoothness and sweet almond scented skin.  I dislike how expensive it is since I use it every day, but this is a product I pay to keep on hand all year. I'm already on my third bottle. It doesn't really lather well--so if you're looking for something that bubbles or goes well on a loofa, this isn't it.  But if you're looking for something that makes your skin feel soft, clean, smell good without being abrasive to sensitive noses, and you can even shave without regrets with, then buy this!

Honestly, I feel fabulous when I use this. The first time I used it, it's a real 'wtf' moment while you try to figure out how it works but once you rub your hands together and it warms up and lathers, oh man! I love that the scent lingers but it's not a punch in the face and I love that my body feels moisturized a day later. Love, love, love!

This stuff is great! I got it in the Christmas duo pack that they had this year and i'm in love. I prefer to use it when i'm shaving, than as a body wash. It tuns to a nice lather when in contact with water and helps the razor glide very smooth. I love the scent, but it doesn't stay, only when in the shower. If i want to keep the scent that day, i follow up with the milk veil. I bought others to give friends for Christmas.

My mom gave this to me as part of the Absolutely Irresistible gift box and this stuff is insane. I have no issue creating a lather by rubbing my hands together with a small amount of water. I have very sensitive skin and have had no problems with this product. My boyfriend lovesit just as much as I do and has already requested we switch to just this in our shower.

reviews.review_title: smells great, but goes by fast
reviews.review_text: So I was really excited about this product because it seems luxurious. However I found that you had to directly apply it to your body them use a washcloth (I don't use loofas bc of bacteria) to get any type of lather. It has a light scent that doesn't linger. It's more of and in-shower experience. But It is Moisturizing.

This shower oil turns into a lather when comes in contact with water, it is soft, smooth and smells so good! It doesn't rub on well unless you have plenty of water. It works great for shaving too. I do like this, but the bottle is small and doesn't last that long. I wish it wasn't so expensive, so for now, I use it interchangeably with regular body wash.

I'm in love! My skin gets really dry and itchy so I decided to try this shower oil. And I'm glad I tried it coz I love it! I use it for my 3 yr old boy too coz he's got dry sensitive skin. I think a little goes a long way.

This a GENIUS product. It is said to be a cleanser, but I use this after using a regular body wash with a loofah. I apply this with my hands and let it sit for a minute before washing off. I've used many body washes that claim to be moisturizing, but I've always had trouble getting rid of the dry flaky layer on my shins without having to use lotion. This is the only in-shower product that has ever taken care of that for me. Body lotion is optional after using this.
I LOVE this. I use this to shave. A little goes a long way. I have dry skin, and I don't even need to add lotion to my legs regularly because of this.

I bought this from the VIB sale and decided to try it out because I read such great reviews. However, the first time I tried it my skin got completely irritated by the oil. I had to return it :( very disappointed purchase ...
Excellent combination of shower cleanser and hydrating oil. Great to use after exfoliation leaving the skin very smooth and hydrated, but not greas.

Had been eyeing up this product for a while before purchasing in back in January. Absolutely fell in love with this product. For those worried about using an 'oil' in the shower, don't. The product turns to a milky cleanser when met with your wet skin. It's hydrating and smell delightful. It's a decadent product that makes my shower feel luxurious.
Love love love this.. smells so good. I follow up with the spray oil after. I plan on getting the milk concentrate for an even longer lasting scent, as well as moisture. Makes me feel sexy.

This stuff is seriously amazing!! It leaves my skin feeling so smooth and smells fantastic. I almost didn't need moisturizer after showering. The almond smell may be a little strong for some people but I really enjoyed it. I first used this product while house sitting for a friend and I bought it as soon as I returned home!! Definitely worth the money!
Smells Amazing! Has a rich lathering effect, doesnt leave any residue just leaves your skin feeling super soft!
Creamy, doesn't dry my skin, and the sense of the warm almond is mmmmmm
If you want to paper yourself this is what you need.

i love l'occitane's products! it's a super rich shower oil that is quite moisturizing, so i tend to use it in the colder months. it has a nice soft smell that isn't necessarily accurate almond, but it smells nice and isn't too overpowering. one of my favorites from l'occitane.
Hydrates my skin! Love it especially in the winter time if you have dry skin!
Love this stuff. Best shaving gel ever as well

I can't even begin to describe how amazing this is. It's an oil you use in the shower, and as you rub it into your skin in foams in a milky, not-overly-sudsy cleanser for your body. It's absolutely brilliant for my eczema plagued skin. It's made all the difference in the world for me and I can't recommend it enough.
Absolutely love the smell of this shower oil! It lathers just a little when you rub it on your skin and then after it rinses away your skin feels and smells great!

i doubt many will believe this, considering this product is rated so high, but... it is a wonderful product, but it smells icky. normally, i think smell is one of those things that is personal preference. in this case, not so much. Thankfully i received this as a gift with another purchase.

This product is absolutely the golden elixir to hygiene, been using this product for the past three years and not only does it mositurizes your skin (so you don't get that dry feeling afterwards), it washes it and honestly, I've been using it as a shaving cream as well. For me, I found regular shaving cream gives my skin red rashes, but this stuff doesn't, so all around is so versatile and perfect especially for traveling for all your shower needs. I would definitely recommend this to anyone, men included. Plus, I love the soft small of almond!

Oh my sweet lord, this is amazing! I got the small size to try, and have just ordered two large ones because I love it so much. It has a nice, rich lather, leaves my dry, sensitive skin soft, and it smells positively divine. I want to just sniff that bottle all day long!!! Definitely will repurchase once it's gone.....again.

OH MY GOD!! If you never try this before and still thinking about try it or not i would say go ahead!! You will regret not trying it out. I have extremely dry skin on my body and my skin is very sensitive as well. After just ONE time of use and i'm already amazed by this magical shower oil. And I would definitely keep buying it. Although it is expensive for a shower oil but it worth every single penny in my opinion. GO TRY IT!!!
I love the way this oil cleanses my skin and leaves it feeling soft and moisturizers. It smells great too.

This was an impulse buy for me as I was walking out to the counter. First bought the small one, but I loved the smell so much that I had to return it the very same moment and go grab the bigger one. Leathers beautifully and has such a sweet soft smell to it.

I tried this for the first time today. I found that it's best to use a regular cleanser first as opposed to using this as any type of cleanser, then use the oil after. It had a light lather and made my skin very soft. I only wish it came in a bigger bottle. I may purchase again but not sure yet.

This is the first ever cleansing body oil I've tried and it is wonderful. It lathers quite nicely, I feel clean and it leaves my skin very soft that I could skip lotion when it is hot out. I usually end up slathering it on so I can see myself going though this quite fast. My big BUT about this...the smell reminds me of cooking oil (and not in a good way). I'm not repurchasing this.
I bought the sample at the checkout line and I fell in love. I use this for shaving and it works perfectly. Love the scent, only con is that it's expensive and it doesn't lasts that long.
I really like this. It doesn't lather up as much as I'd like it to. I seem to be going through it super quickly.

This shower oil has a delicious smell and feels so luxurious on my skin! I like that this oil actually lathers up a bit unlike other shower oils I've tried in the past. Leaves my skin feeling soft and with a nice light scent!
I don't find this any more moisturizing or softening than a drugstore body wash. I really don't like how it smells - reminds me of wet dog. Not worth the money.

I find that I go through shaving cream way too quickly and it actually dries out my skin. This shower oil is a great alternative. If you factor in the how many cans of shaving cream to this bottle of oil..I'm probably spending the same price overall or maybe even less. It allows me to get a real nice, close shave and leaves me so soft. I just ran out after having it for 3 months. I don't think I'll shave with anything else!

while this shower oil is very moisturizing I felt that it didn't lather as much as I wanted it too. I didn't feel clean when I got out of the shower, I think I will try and use it for shaving my legs which is what a lot of reviews here say to do. But for washing, I wasn't that impressed, and with this price I was expecting to be BLOWN away which I was not.
Smells so good. I don't know if I have to use this everyday to stop dry skin. But it feels good and smells nice!!! Love it!!!
I use this just to shave my legs. It is the best. You need the SMALLEST amount. Just makes my razor glide over my skin. It leaves my skin feeling so soft and hydrated as well.

Background: I've always been trying to find a good shower gel/oil. I've read really good reviews so I decided to give this a try and have been using it for over a month. My regimen: I use it daily, sometimes followed by body lotion. What's good is that even when I omit the body lotion, my skin is not over dry (in the Summer months). I haven't used this in Fall or Winter, so we'll have to see then. Results: This shower oil is pretty viscous with oil consistency and doesn't lather up into big foam. The smell is very nice and sweet, but it doesn't last on my skin as long as I'd hoped. My skin seems hydrated (but not to the point that you can forget the body lotion). I like it overall, but depending on how good it does comparing to other shower gels I've used, I might decide to try something else next time.

reviews.review_title: Not financially sustainable forus poor peoeple
reviews.review_text: While checking out at Sephora, as per usual, I impulsively grabbed this. I had heard KatheenLights raving about it, and most products she recommends work for me, so I tried it!  Unfortunately, I really, REALLY loved it. It smells divine, it's nourishing on dry skin and it really does make for a great shower experience. BUT it just goes way too fast! I went through a sample size it about a week. AND. I tried to use very discreet amounts, but it's definitely not one of those a little goes a long way products whatsoever. Which SUCKS because I loved this product so much! But I would literally need to spend like $40 a month on this, and that's after hiding it from my husband so he doesn't use it cause it's so amazing and lush and expensive. =(  If you want to spend the money, go for it! But I honestly rather invest in the supple oil which smells the same and will probably last me much longer.

So I never ever EVER write reviews. But....L'Occitane Almond Shower Oil has changed my life... I suffer from a particularly hard to treat version of dermatitis, which I have had no meaningful reprieve from even under the care of multiple Dermatologists. I've tried mild and strong steroids, UV therapy, Cetaphil, you name it. Yesterday was my first time not being itchy after a bath or shower for YEARS! This morning my eczema was noticeably reduced, and so I used it in my bath tonight, and also to shave, and ALSO as a shampoo (I know, I was desperate ok!), and I am SOSOSO impressed on all fronts. I forgot what smooth, calm, not flaky skin felt like. So for everyone I know suffering from eczema or just dry skin and normal body washes aren't cutting it, I HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!!!! Also, in case anyone is worried about it, I do also feel very clean and there is no oily residue.

The smell is absolutely delicious and I wish it lingered on my skin. However my workplace demands scent-free so it worked out. More importantly, my dry legs look and feel amazing after 2 weeks of use. I see a noticeable change in the day when they used to be flaky and are now smooth. It feels really light and I felt that it all washed off a little too well but my skin is looking supple. I'm sold! I don't think I'll switch to another product for a long time.

This product is great for moisturising in-shower, and also lathers up really well, but in my opinion, the smell kind of ruins the purchase. I wouldn't pay the price of this again for a product that doesn't smell good.

L'Occitane's Cleansing And Softening Shower Oil With Almond Oil is (currently) one of my favorite bath products. It smells delicious, lathers pretty well, and leaves me feeling utterly moisturized. The only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 is because you have to be careful choosing a bathing utencil. If you pick one too thick and it won't lather up or you'll have to use too much to get good lather. Aside from that, this product is perfect!

I have very dry and sensitive skin on my body, and Im also lazy with applying lotion after I shower, making the issue worse. I find because its a cleansing oil its super hydrating without all the sulfates that irritate the skin. My skin is so hydrated and moisturized that I find I don’t need lotion after I dry off from my shower.

awesome smell if you love almond!! it milks up and you can shave your legs with it and it is 100x better than shaving gels from the drugstore! i prefer to buy it at the l'occitane store cause they give you more samples ;)
Really disliked this shower oil. Don't know if it was my batch, but mine smells like gross plastic. Bought it over 6 months ago and haven't used more than a drop...too late to return.

This stuff is liquid gold. I'm one of those people that HAS to put on lotion right after I shower, but with this stuff its not even necessary. It makes me skin so soft and it really does leave a light sweet scent on my skin that's not overwhelming. I will be buying this stuff forever!

I purchased this for travel, but after using it I was amazed by the way my skin felt. My skin is really dry, and this made it softer than it's been in years. Yes. Years. I love this so much! Wonderful to shave with.
Gave me terrible red bumps all over my legs. Also the smell was not what I was expecting at all.

This product smells great, at times it smells like hair dye but that is probably just me. However, it leaves my skin feeling really soft. I even got compliments on how my hands feel thanks to this product! I love taking the travel size bottle with me whenever I travel!

This is absolutely gorgeous! It seems divine and moisturizes my tight, itchy skin. The price is horrible but I love it. I mix a little grapeseed oil in mine to make it more moisturizing and extend it's life.
This product is the right combo of oily and soapy to be used as a shave creme. Beautiful.

This seems like an oily at first but it lathers when mixed with water. (And it feels like it warms up as it lathers!) I use this to shave my legs all the time.... I don't care for the almond smell but I'm seriously hooked on this product. It has all the benefits of a soap and moisturiser in one.

Kathleen Lights recommended this so of course I had to try it! Saw the sample size in the check out line at Sephora so I picked it up. Not going to lie, I was hesitant about this product only because it is an oil, I do have oily skin and I've never been a fan of oils. It does start out as an oil but once you add water, it turns into a milky cleanser. Smells amazing and doesn't leave an oily residue at all. The scent stays on your body for a good amount of time as well. Obsessed with this product and will definitely be repurchasing it over and over! Try it out! You won't regret it!
Love this especially for shaving. Leaves skin smooth and is such an amazing shower oil, especially since my skin is dry. No more shave creams that dry out my skin.
i tried this in the store and all the swatched products just melted off. i bought it and now i love it, and the smell, yum!
Amazing!! Made my skin so soft!

This is amazing! I have insanely dry skin and other body washes dried my skin out even more! What happened to the size with the pump? I bought the other size to fill up my big one. Other then that this stuff is amazing! Highly recommend!
I cannot stand the smell. It's is not musky/manly or sweet. Something is so off about it I cannot stand it, has a hint of wet dog to it.
I love the smell of this and it leaves my skin feeling so soft. Great for shaving
The fragrance and later is great but after repetitive use, I broke out.

I love this gel for shaving. It leaves my legs so soft and smooth. I am someone who has extremely sensitive skin that nicks, razor burns and dries tight so easily. This seems to mitigate that a great deal. Love it and will continue to use!

I got a sample size of this in the Weekend En Provence Almond Discovery Kit and fell in love. Two weekends ago I was lucky enough to go to L'Occitane and purchase the 500 ml bottle with the pump. It is absolutely to die for! I use it to shave my legs and as a body conditioner. After I have cleansed with my shower gel I massage this into my skin and let it sit for as long as I can wait. It leaves your skin feeling so soft. It's expensive so it's a once a week treat. Wish they made a perfume that smelled like this. I could bathe in the almond scent!

Let me just say you need this in your life. Shave your legs with this. You will never want to use a shaving cream again. Ever. It's the best thing ever. I wish they made a fragrance/EDT within the Amande line, I would be forever grateful. Leaves your skin the softest. Totally worth the price!!

I bought this so excited to use it, when it arrived it was open and spilled all over other products. I smelled it and the smell was too strong. Most people love the scent, but it bothered me. I tried some and it did not lather up like everyone said, I put some on my sponge and it just did nit lather like I a used to, I will be exchanging this.

This shower oil leaves my super dry skin so soft and smooth. I exfoliate to get rid of dead skin and then massage this into the dry areas on my skin (ankles,elbows and for some inexplicable reason, my outer calves). I have the driest skin ever and this helps so much.
Everything about this is wonderful. I hope that they never stop making it (I will need to stock up if they do). Smells great. Feels great.

I just purchased a second bottle of this after using the one before to the very end. The scent is unbelievable an unlike any other shower product I've used before. The oil-to-foam texture feels so nice on the body and amazing for shaving. The adorable packaging also is a bonus to an already great product!
This stuff is absolutely awesome to moisturize in the shower and shave with.. but it is so expensive! Love it but cannot see myself dishing out the money on this :(
this is such a luxurious, long lasting, richly moisturizing product. i almost feel like it's one of those moisturizers that you apply in the shower.

I got a sample size of this is in a limited edition basket I bought while on vacation. I had purchased for the other products but put the basket near my bathtub. Well I decided to try it during bubble bath to wash body and was totally blown away by the amazing scent and how it lathers. It's not too girly a scent either - totally unique and when I was getting into bed the hubby was drinking in how good I smelled. Can't wait to get the full size!

reviews.review_title: Not much lather - best as a shaving cream
reviews.review_text: This shower oil smells amazing and is luxurious and skin softening. But it doesn't lather well, and for it to work as as a cleanser you need to use a lot of (pretty expensive) product per shower. It is great for shaving though. The small size is perfect for travel and I bring it with me as a travel-size shave oil.

I absolutely love this! I've received this as a sample a few times and finally decided to buy the big bottle of it! I am so happy I did. I use this to shave. It goes on like an oil and softens the hair and skin perfectly for shaving. After I shave, it lathers up really nicely and rinses clean. Love. Love. Love.

So I was really excited to try this product by the way it smelled. Delicious scent, but it didn't lather the way I would have preferred. Yes it does make your skin feel incredibly soft, but I'm probably going to go through it fast in order for the lather to be where I like it. At the price point, I can't drop that much as often as I would have to repurchase.
Smells and feels amazing. It's SO expensive for a shower oil, but I feel it's so worth it. Every woman(or man) should experience this oil.

This is heaven in a bottle, after Sephora discontinued Soap & Glory I went looking in for a body wash that could top my previous body wash, and I was not disappointed, this is the BEST body wash I've ever used. It leaves my skin super silky and hydrated. There is no doubt about it, you all have to try this!!!
Perfect for shaving and smells great. The smell isn't overwhelming which is really nice.
This leaves my skin feeling SO soft, seriously I've never tried anything like it. I wouldn't say it is a cleanser, I use it after body wash as an in-shower moisturizer or to shave.
I order this shower gel online and I was not really sure because I didn't smell it, But I don't regret at all! The smell is SO good and it's leave my skin so soft! Also it's perfect for shaving!!
This showers oil leaves my skin feeling great and it is fantastic for shaving!!
small amount goes along way. love the way the oil turns into thick bubbles that give a very fresh and clean result
Purchased the travel size in hope it would smell like other almond scents, but it smelled terrible.
I love this shower oil! Leaves my skin so moisturized, with the most amazing almond scent!

I purchased the travel size of this product and loved it. It did not foam that much, but the scent was delightful. I just purchased the 8,4 oz size and it seems different. It foams more and the scent is stronger. It also was more moisturizing . I do not understand how the same product can be so different in another size bottle. Other than that, I would repurchase the travel size, only because of the scent, which I liked better.

I purchased just the travel size of this product. Pro: it smells great. Cons: the price, I find it to be too liquidit and it doesn't lather that much. I don't think I would repurchase this mainly because I don't think its worth the price.
This is a great product, it softens skin and smells great. I use it to shave and to wash my body. I wish it lathered more though!
This product is a must. I originally tried it in a Sephora favorites gift set and now I'n hooked. I use it to shave my legs and keep my skin hydrated. Plus, it smells amazing! HG status!

I enjoy using this as a replacement for shaving cream. I love that I don't need lotion after showering and going without the panic mode I previously experienced after leaving the house realizing I had forgotten to slather up with lotion! :) Not sure I'd use this solely as a soap but I'll give it time to decide. Side note: As any oil-based product, it will make your bathtub slippery, so keep that in mind and be careful!
Smells and feels so good. Great size for travel and stocking stuffers.

This product is one of my favorites! It is a little pricey, but a little product goes a long way. The smell is light and leaves skin feeling and looking great! So easy to use and you can skip the lotion after your shower!
worth every penny! it goes on like a luxurious oil and lathers into a foamy milk when the water hits it. it smells absolutely amazing. your skin will drink this all up!
Worth every penny. It's the only body wash I will use
I use this instead of shaving cream. My skin LOVES this stuff.

I always liked this brand. When I purchased some skin care from sephora online,I got this freebie a miniature almond oil. At first I thought that it was a body oil you apply right after shower then I realized it wasn't cuz it create bubbles. Lol. I fell in love with the product right then and there. The scent is amazing and I love how it feels on my skin. Love it:)

It's a cool concept and smells very good and I do like it... However I noticed that I needed to use a lot to get it to lather up good and didn't notice any difference in how my skin felt. It does smell wonderful though!!
Used this product today and as I was showering, it created a foamy lather and the smell was amazing! It left my skin feeling soft and moisturized!

Smells soooo good and leaves my skin super soft. The oils have really moisturised my body and has softened up rough spots like elbows. New fave! Doesn't have a rich lather so I think its best to use it with a gentle wash cloth instead of a loofah.
I hate the scent and it think its overrated. Definitely will not purchase again

Bought this on a whimfor my mom wound up using it in shower and ended up LOVING how my skin felt!! Gives a nice soft feel like after an exfoliating scrub! Def need to purchase one for myself hopefully comes in other scents also!
I truly enjoy this body wash oil. It leaves my skin silky smooth. I will definitely repurchase.
Yes, I love this and it smells amazing but it probably isn't worth the price. But hey, I'm still going to buy it because it's luxurious!
The feeling of this product on my skin is amazing, and I LOVE the smell. Only down fall is I have not noticed a difference in my skin from it.

I bought the mini size for a week-long vacation in Mexico and ending up using almost the entire bottle in just that week. You just have to use a ton of this oil to get it to lather--it just does not want to foam up at all. The scent is lovely, it is very moisturizing and most luxurious. But it just doesn't end up being a good value because you have to use so much of it. It's great stuff, it was a good week, but I wouldn't buy this again. I would certainly recommend buying the mini to see if you like it and it's right for you before you buy the full size.
Love this shower oil! Smell is wonderful..very luxurious feeling! I will be keeping a bottle in my shower always!

reviews.review_title: Shouldn't have fallen for the hype...
reviews.review_text: My skin is incredibly dry, so when so many people were raving about this shower oil I decided to try the travel size. It smells wonderful, but I feel like I have to use a lot of it per application as it doesn't lather easily. And it doesn't moisturize my skin any better than any other body shower, in fact my skin seemed drier than the last body wash I had used. It's decent for use while shaving, but a little expensive if that's all your looking to use it for. I'd suggest buying the travel version to see if you like it 1st before investing in the full size.
I love this... the smell.. the softness... the lack of burning (esp. after shaving) :)

I was super excited to try this. It's OK at best. Doesn't do anything great I didn't find it hydrating and my skin isn't even dry. Smell isn't the best either. Will use the remaining product for shaving my legs but will not repurchase.
Not sure how good this cleans because i use exfoliating soap, but it moisturizes the skin very well, it has a great lather and a great almond scent. Leaves skin feeling very soft.

I received the oil as a 100 point perk at some point and doubted it would work, however I am now stocking up and use this everyday when I shave my legs. Leaves my skin to hydrated and makes shaving a breeze.

A great product that leaves you lightly scented and moisturizer. Also it does not leave your tub like a slip and slide. I've repurchased time and time again. I stock up especially during VIB sale. Like a spa experience at home.

Great body wash if you want a lasting all day fragrance but if you have moderate to extremely dry skin, you will have to apply a secondary moisturizer. I will use the remaining product but I will not repurchase.
The smell is amaaaazing!! A little definitely goes a long way! I love that it doesn't leave my skin feeling oily, but soft and luxurious!! Would DEFINITELY purchase again and again. Well worth the $$

My skin used to itch and burn after showering because it was so dry, regardless of in shower lotions, washes, gels, etc. I use this now for both my shower gel AND my shaving cream and my skin is silkier and does not itch! I also no longer get razor burns! I LOVE it!

You have to love the smell of almonds to enjoy this cleanser. If you do, you will be in heaven. It's a perfect cleanser for folks with dry skin or who do not want to over cleanse. Plus, it's great for men & women. The scent is great but will not interfere with your post bath fragrances. Plus, it rinses clean so no shower slipping! Only got 4 stars because it is a bit pricey.

I gave in to all the hype and finally ordered this. I am so disappointed. I am not sure how this product got all these great reviews and hype, there must be an awesome marketing team behind this. The smell is awful, nothing like almonds at all. To me it smells like kitchen cleaner and rancid oil. It did not soften my skin at all. One of the worst fail products I have ordered in a long time. Would never recommend this to anyone.

After showering, my skin used to itch like crazy because it would get so dry. Now I use this in the shower, I don't even need to moisturize after bathing, and my skin does not itch at all. Can be used as a shaving cream. I don't particularly like the scent, but the benefits outweigh the negatives.

It's a little expensive but you only need a little. It lasts forever. Smells delicious and it completely hydrates. I have bought it several times and I even got a travel size for my gym bag. I highly recommend this cleansing oil.
It smells good. That's all. It doesn't moisturize that great. It's an impulse buy.
Feels soooo good, and the smell is great! The smell stays on my skin even after the shower. Can be used a a shaving oil and a bath oil too! But now I can't go back to any other products...
This seriously smells like a wet dog when it comes in contact with water. I didn't notice my skin feeling any softer. Do not recommend and it is going back!
This is a very nice shower oil. It smells divine and doesn't leave you feeling greasy. Just silky and soft.
This cleansing oil is so soft on the skin and isn't too foamy.
I bought this off a recommendation from youtuber kathleenlights and I'm so glad I did. If has become a must have in my shower. Definitely worth the money and it smells just like almonds.
Like nothing i have used before. It is an oil but as soon as you begin to rub it on your skin it lathers up. The smell as well is AMAZING. It leaves your skin feeling soft and hydrated.

Totally moisturizing. Very sudsy. The L'Occitane rep in the store recommended I get a bath puff so it lasts longer. EXCELLENT advice. It's expensive, but kind of doubles as moisturizer, and I had putting on lotion after a shower, so that's how I'm justifying the cost.
This smells like a baby's bottom lathered in almond cake. My FAVORITE luxury bath item. Can't even deal with it. my skin is never dry after using this in the shower.
This is wonderful in the shower or the tub. Leaves skin soft and smooth, not overpowering smell

I got a tiny sample of this with my 100 perks points which saved me 9 bucks then getting the 2oz bottle which is kind of crazy though. After trying it out for the first time I liked that it isn't greasy or oily feeling on my body. I'm not that crazy about the scent because it smells like straight up almonds. I wish there was a rose scent as like in a collection of scents in the line which would be fantastic. And it doesn't lather like a regular shower gel but I just use it towards in the end of my shower so it can be soft and smooth Or to shave.
I usually like a heavy foam in my body wash. This shower oil does not do that at all. My skin was soft and I do like the scent. I need the bubbles though.
This stuff rocks - I use it as a shower wash and shave oil. Great for both and smells like an almond cookie. What's not to love? xo

I love this product. It is so moisturizing and smells amazing. It still continues moisturizing your skin even when you get out of the shower. The scent does not really linger but smells slightly florally. It also gets sudsy when rubbed into wet skin so it is great for cleansing your body with.

I really wanted to love this product but it wasn't worth the hype. I'm glad I bought the travel size to try instead of going straight for the big bottle.You have to use a lot of this product just to get a lather/foam and the scent was nothing like almonds. Very disappointed. It was however hydrating, I guess that's the only pro. But for the price I can find something else that will smell good, hydrate, moisturize, and lather up well.

I just want to shout from the rooftops how much I love this! It moisturizes so well that I don't have to use as much lotion and leaves my skin so soft and smooth. And the smell!!!! I can't get enough. I've already purchased a back up for myself and gifted my Mom and sisters. Everyone needs this!!!

This shower oil smells good enough to eat! I love that the scent lingers when you get out of the shower too! Unfortunately though I couldn't give it 5 stars because I thought for being a shower oil it wasn't overly moisturizing. It left my skin feeling a little dry which was disappointing.

First: the smell that this oil leaves behind on the skin is heavenly. My skin doesn't feel at all dried out, in fact it helps it to feel rich and smooth. My one fault I could find, is that there isnt much of a lather...somewhat, but not a lot. That being said- it could be the mesh loofah I use, which I am switching out for a reusable cloth one. I am hoping that will hold the oil better and allow me to optimize my use. I find myself using quite a bit of the oil to achieve covering my whole body. I am also aware that this is an oil, not a soap, and may just work differently than the body washes I am used to. Also I know that the chemical put into soaps and shampoos to activate a lather is very harmful and drying for your skin, so I definitely prefer to be on the safe side and not harm my skin or my health. Overall I think this is a good product and I plan on purchasing it again and exploring what else there is in the L'Occitane line as well as what other shower oils have to offer.
This stuff is great- it smells good and softens your skin while it cleanses. I don't know how I ever cleansed my skin with soap- oil cleansers FTW! (Josie Moran argan oil cleanser is amazing too :) )

reviews.review_title: Keeping me soft all winter long!
reviews.review_text: Every winter I get hot spots -- dry, itchy, flaky areas that drive me nuts from the NY dryness. Not this year! Love this stuff!! Light, gentle fragrance, soft cleansing -- even used it for shaving!

This is by far one of my favorite sephora buys...ever. The oil itself is smooth and silky, bubbles delicately if used as a bath, and doesn't leave me feeling greasy or slippery. It's a deeply conditioning moisturizer that rinses off like a soap when you're done lathering. I've never broken out- I just feel baby soft and smooth. I love using this when I shave my legs. In fact it's my favorite part of shaving. I cannot recommend this highly enough.
This product is amazing. It goes on smooth, not greasy and last a long time. My skin loves it!

I purchased this after seeing Kathleenlights on YouTube talk about this product and I'm in absolute love with This product it does its job ! I was a little scared using this due to the fact I have very sensitive skin but it doesn't irritate me what so ever! Definitely recommend this product
I love, love, love this!!! It is moisturizing but not greasy. It smells great but isnt over powering or lingering (do not want it to mess with the smell of my perfume). A must try!!!
Lathers easily...a little goes a long way. The scent is divine and the oil does not leave a ring around the tub.

reviews.review_title: Very similar to Eucerin's calming body wash
reviews.review_text: This product doesn't really foam up but it is lovely! I have really dry skin and this is a great product for that. Don't be scared off by the almond oil, it doesn't have that sweet fakey almond scent. Eucerin has a similar product that I have used in the past but wanted to try this. I will stick to Eucerin skin calming body wash. It is very comparable and half the price.
The smell is great, the feel is great, but it left my skin red, flaky, and stinging. I have sensitive, dry skin, so I would not recommend this to others with similar skin types.

This stuff is the best for shaving. You need a dime-sized amount to slather your whole body. After the shower, you feel as soft as a baby. You will feel like an 18th century French princess.  The only bad part about this product is the packaging; the pump will jam about halfway through usage.

I hate the smell of almond extract and I thought there would be NO WAY I would like an almond-scented body wash. HOWEVER, this shower oil DOES NOT smell like raw, alcohol-y almond. It smells like a light but savory almond pastry, and even an almond-hater like me loves it. I don't think it was very softening, or at all, so that is why it's a 4/5.
It seems as if it took a lot of product to cover my body. It smells and feels great, but I just purchased it and am almost halfway through the bottle.
I have dry, sensitive skin and this shower oil has been a real skin saver for me. An added bonus is that it does not make the shower slippery. It has a light pleasant scent.
Love this body wash!! Smells so good and leaves your skin feeling super soft. Went throw my first bottle quick.. Going too keep buying it!
I can't say I'm in love with product. But I like it... It's smells amazing and does 3/10 on moisturizing my body.

this stuff smells so wonderful and works so well. i used it for soap in the depths of winter when my hands were burning and cracked from regular soap. their regular liquid soap is amazing for frequent use.

I ordered this because of Kathleenlights on Youtube! She said that she loves shaving her legs with this and I do too. I also really like it for the backs of my arms when they get those little bumps. Only negative is that I wish it were cheaper.
Love the way it makes my skin feel, but I do believe the scent is more faint than it used to be. Still, I love this cleanser.

I'm not sure why, but I love the smell of this. It's definitely a weird plastic-y smell, and one that I'm not sure most people would typically like. I've been using it for the past month or so and I haven't really seen a difference in the dryness of my skin. I have pretty dry skin all over my body, especially in the colder months. I find that you have to use a lot of this just to get a decent lather that covers my whole body (I use a loofah with it). All in all, I don't think I'll be buying this again. It hasn't dried my skin, but it hasn't really moisturized it either. For how expensive and unimpressive it is, I'll stick with a cheaper body wash that does the same thing.

reviews.review_title: once you get used to the smell...
reviews.review_text: ... you can really see the benefits of this product. I saw a drastic improvement of my grossly dry skin this winter and I have this to thank!

reviews.review_title: What almond smell? Bleah, save your money honey!
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to like this shower gel but so completely disappointed. I tried it based off a YouTuber review. First it smells like plastic, yup plastic!!! What? The smell of a brand new shower curtain to be honest. Yuk!!!! It's not creamy nor does it feel like real oil. Sorry this product is too gimmicky. Wasted 300 points, oh well. Moving on.

This shower oil actually feels really nice on the skin. I have really dry itchy skin, especially in the winter, and I find that it moisturizes well. However, I can't get past the smell. A lot of people seem to like it, but I think it smells very synthetic and like chemicals. I also wish it lathered better, but being an oil I didn't really expect it to.

You can't go wrong with L'Occitane products...they just KNOW what works. I love the scent and the fact that the product turns from a thick oil into a lather in seconds. The scent is great but doesn't last as long as I'd hoped throughout the day.

This product is very unique and fun to use, it goes on as an oil and then thickens up. Once you add more water it begins to foam up. It smells good in the bottle but it kind of smells like PlayDough when you lather lol. This product makes my skin soft but it doesn't feel amazingly hydrated or moisturized to be honest. Im not sure if I will repurchase or not...

This smells really great, but it doesn't really hydrate all that much. It's a bit expensive for just a shower gel that isn't all that hydrating. We have really cold winters, so this didn't really cut it. Glad I didn't buy the full size, just the travel size (which lasted, by the way, forever)

I heard the best reviews on this stuff, and I was envisioning the sweet smells of almonds, and amaretto. I currently have the Rituals sweet almond shower gel foam. It smells great, but I thought this would be even better. It literally smells like plastic, plastic toys. I cannot make out an almond smell. It lathered up a little but I did not feel clean. I will say that its great for shaving. It does provide moisture but the smell is so bad that I have to thoroughly wash my hands after use.
Wasn't quite as wow smelling or super softening as I expected but it's still a nice trade off from soap.

I can't. This stuff is that good. I love the smell, it makes my skin moisturized and I love the lather. A little goes a long way. I also use this to shave with and it's amazing. My new luxury bath oil

reviews.review_title: The only product I shave with.
reviews.review_text: I've used this shower oil for a few years now. I don't use it to clean my body, I prefer thicker, creamier body washes and this doesn't lather up the way I like. But for shaving, this is HG status. I scrub my body with my favorite body wash and Salux cloth, and then shave last with this. Because it's a cleansing oil, it rinses clean unlike shaving creams and foams, making it perfect for shaving after washing.  I have never gotten a closer and smoother shave with ANYTHING else I've ever used. I have tried a couple of other products after discovering this, but have always gone back and will never use anything else. A little bit goes a long way, too. I usually use less than a dime sized amount that sufficiently lathers one full leg. Once rinsed off, it leaves your skin incredibly soft.  I will say, the very first time I used this, the smell was very off-putting. I'm not sure if the fragrance has been toned down over the years, but the fragrance is now much softer.
