Or perhaps I'm just desensitized to it, I don't know. Either way, the end result makes it worth it.
This caught my eye online and gave it a try. So glad I did. This is amazing! The smell isn't overpowering. The soap/oil consistency is really unique. Going back for more.

This amazingly,luxurious shower oil is a decadent treat that transforms dry skin while offering an authentic spa-like experience. Our family has used the Loccitane Verbena soap for years and this almond oil is now a must have in our shower as well. I use the soap for basic cleansing and the almond oil on my extra dry arms and legs. The perfect combo.

The smell of this is divine! That being said there's not much else to it. It's great for shaving my legs but as a cleanser it just doesn't cut it. I also noticed during winter time when my skin is drier I can't use this or else my skin gets even drier.
This product is EHHHHH! I personally did not like the smell at all. Didnt feel too clean after using it so I do use it to shave now. Wouldn't purchase again.

This is a dangerous product to buy, since you will never be satisfied with any other type of shower oil. I use this instead of shaving cream, and you cannot get a closer shave. Moreover, this scent is DIVINE. I literally have the best time in the shower every time I use it.

One of, if not, the BEST cleansing oil out. I used to be against cleansing oils, I felt they didn't do their job, but THIS does its job and MORE. After a shower I feel clean and my skin has definitely seen an improvement. The weather has been so harsh on my skin, this shower oil has definitely saved me.
and doesn't leave your body feeling greasy. It moisturizing but not greasy

reviews.review_title: Leaves skin hydrated but not oily
reviews.review_text: This is the only oil-based soap that I use that doesn't make me break out... and I don't have to use moisturizer afterwards either! Great for shaving. There is a faint almond scent which I like. I do not smell anything weird in this product as was mentioned in other reviews. I do have soft water so maybe that's the difference. Great for shaving, too.
This shower oil is so luxurious feeling and smells so, so good. After you are done showering and open the door, everyone will smell it too!

I used to use soap to shave my legs in the shower, and I would cut myself to ribbons, so I switched to oil. Using vitamin E or coconut oil worked better, but left my razor all clogged up with disgusting gunk. I tried this stuff, and it's perfect! It gives me a smooth shave and leaves my skin feeling soft like oil does, but it rinses cleanly out of my razor and doesn't leave the bottom of the shower slick. It also smells nice, like almonds.
I love the subtle fragrance and the rich lather. Be sure to apply additional water as it really helps with the lather!

I always want a shower oil and i could never find a perfect one so i saw a review on this product and i had to get it. On the day i got it i tried it and i am in Love with it. I honestly am blown by How incredible it is....
This is the only thing I use in the shower. Words can't properly express how magnificent this product is. I do wish Sophia would offer the larger sizes in store.
Makes your skin very soft without making it oily. Love it!
I'm very sensitive to soaps and getting dry skin. I use this instead (not every day) and my skin is much better. I also use to to shave.

This is great for a few different reasons. 1. The scent is nice but not overpowering, it doesn't compete with anything else you may layer on after a shower. 2. It leaves my skin softer than any other cleanser. 3. My skin is sensitive and it doesn't bother it at all. I got the travel size to give it a try and now will be getting the full size for sure!
I use this to shave instead of a shaving cream or gel and I love it. I've noticed my skin feels softer and I get a closer shave when I use it. I would definitely recommend this product.
I received this as a gift from my MIL and used it up SO QUICKLY because I loved using it so much! saving up my pennies for the value size because I NEED it.
nice body wash but to me, it smells like plastic toys

I love this and use this every shower. My skin feels incredibly s soft after use and also smells amazing. Got this to combat my winter dry skin and am more than satisfied- my skin isn't this soft during the spring when I don't have dry skin. At this point, I am pretty sure I will not be going back to regular shower gels. I have recommended this to pretty much everyone.

I use this every shower, I event take it with me when I travel! It works well at moisturizing the body. It works amazingly as a shaving cream! The scent and foam of this product is so luxurious and lovely! This is something I definitely repurchase as soon as i am out of it!

This product smells so good!! I wish I could use an entire bottle each time i shower because i absolutely love it! this lathers well, and really leaves your skin soft and smelling so good! my boyfriend always say i smell good when i shower with this. Definitely a new favorite of mine

reviews.review_title: Great Scent and Cleans Well Too
reviews.review_text: I'm not a big fan of body cleansers (old fashioned bar of soap is my method of choice) but L'Occitane Shower Oil with Almond has changed me for good. This lathers well - and like I said in the review title - it has a wonderful scent. As an added plus, it leaves my super dry skin felling soft. I'm now a believer and will use this gel as my cleanser of choice.

I have been using this for 2 years now, and no matter how many times I try other products, I always come back to this one. First off, the smell is beautiful, I love the way it leaves a light scent on my skin and stays for the entire day. Second, I use this as my body wash, for shaving, and for extra hydration on dry spots like feet, elbows, knees etc. I highly recommend this item, it lasts a long time form, and just feels like a spa treatment every time I use it! The price is a bit high, but to me it's absolutely worth it, I get complements all the time even during winter, about how smooth and glowing my skin looks. Try the smaller bottle to see if this is right for you, it is an investment worth making.
This product is too expensive and my skin is not better after using it. It is hard to rinse out.
i especially use this after i shave my legs and i feel i don't have to put lotion on after the shower. its does a great job moisturizing my skin

I love this stuff! The scent is amazing, and it makes my skin feel so good. It's not a lathery body wash, rather an oil that emulsifies a bit. I love it when I am in a hurry because you just drop some in your hand, rub-a-dub-dub and rinse.
The product has a very light scent, hardly any lather and was not as moisturizing as I expected it to be. All in all a waste of money I think.

reviews.review_title: Much better than a shower gel!
reviews.review_text: I love that this product cleanses and hydrates in one step. Shower gels, even the most hydrating ones, always leave my skin feeling tight and itchy. This never does that, it is the only shower cleanser I've used where I don't have to use lotion, cream, or oil afterwards. I've used a regular body oil in the shower before and this is much better because it spreads easier and it rinses clean- no greasy residue. It also smells very good, but not too strong and the scent doesn't stay on your skin.  Since it is so pricy, I save it for when my skin is especially dry or when I know I won't have enough time to moisturize after getting out of the shower. If this product was just a little cheaper, I'd give it 5 stars for sure. I am not against spending a lot on skincare, but not when I go through the product as quickly as I go through this.

I was excited to try this after reading all told the positive reviews. Totally agree this is a great shaving oil. Makes my skin feel super soft and silky. I only wish it smelled better. The scent is a little more rosemary than almond for my taste.
Bought a small bottle for Christmas. Alredy after the first use skin felt really smooth.. never stoped using the product since.

I'm in love with this shower oil! It's a bit pricey but I love L'Occitane products but I will probably buy the refill anyways. The smell is light and has a nice lather and leaves my skin silky soft. The supple skin oil and milk veil pairs nicely with it too.

Don't let the name shower oil turn you away. This is a wonderful item for winter showers. I doesn't lather much but it does leave skin feeling soft and moisturized. The fragrance is pleasant and not overwhelming. I bought a travel size to try but will be buying the larger one when it runs out.

reviews.review_title: Never loved a product so much
reviews.review_text: Seriously. My legs are the worst. I've never found anything that is soothing, moisturizing enough, and good for shaving and BAM.... $8 in a random buy and I'm hooked. No more dry, irritated legs, and next day prickles.

reviews.review_title: Can't live comfortably soft without it!!
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this product - I was skeptical about washing with an oil product, but once I tried this one, I have never let myself shower without it! I stock up on refills (cheaper than buying a new dispenser bottle every time). Love the soft fragrance that does not conflict with any of my perfume products, and am amazed at how it improves my skin softness and tone. Add the body lotion and you'll be in soft and smooth hog-heaven! It does not lather up FYI but you feel very clean after using it.
I have been using this in place of a shaving cream for years and i'll never use anything else!
Scent is ok, but LOVE how it leaves my skin. Your skin will feel silky soft after using this product!

Funny, i actually used this back in high school but stopped after going away to college (probs bc i was broke). It's been a decade+ but i bought it again mostly because of the nostalgia, and i'm so glad i did.  The shower oil feels so luxurious and i love the smell. its such a warm, earthy scent. It really does help moisturise although i actually put on a different dry oil on afterwards so it's hard to say how much it's bringing to the table. I don't use it on my face bc i have acne and oily skin and i'm nervous about applying this oil mixture on anything but my body.  Regardless, i'm glad i brought this back as part of my winter routine.
I love this stuff. Smells great. Makes my skin smooth and soft. Kind of pricey for its size, but nonetheless a great product.
Feels smooth going on and then you feel soft too and it lasts.
This smells good. Not as oily as I would lie but it works well.
I love this item. It makes your skin feel so soft.

I can't justify the price tag given the ingredients. This is an okay product for the general consumer but if you like products to lean more on the natural side stay away from this..don't let the almond oil blindside ya.

I was unsure about trying this product out but now I think that it does a beautiful job. The smell of almonds is not over powering and the product doesn't lather up too much. I like the Ren face cleansing balm so I decided to try this cleansing oil. I love the way that it makes my skin feel beautiful and clean afterwards. I would recommend this product for a nice night out where you just want to quickly freshen up. I have very dry skin so I need a lotion afterwards but you may not.
Smells good, makes some lather, and leaves skin feeling soft.

I first got a sample of this from the 500 point l'occitane reward back in December. I took it with me on a trip where it was going to be very cold. I loved it the moment I poured it into my hand. It smells divine, I don't have to use lotion afterwards, and it makes shaving a dream. I have since bought the larger bottle and truly consider it a HG product for me.
This is my all time favorite shower oil. Beautiful light scent...so refreshing...leave my dry skin soft. Scent is not overpowering. I also use the L'Occitane spray almond oil.

I first tried this as a sample and was hooked and have recently purchased the full size. I have dry skin, and it gets even worse in the winter. I use a body wash on certain areas and finish my shower with this all over. For me it doesn't lather as I don't use an excessive amount, I would say the 1oz trial size would last me about a month. It still feels wonderful and after I rinse it off and pat dry I can get away with not moisturizing my whole body if I am in a rush, which I would not be able to do without this.  I love the scent of this. I do not like the smell of almond extract, and am sensitive to fragrances, but this scent is lovely and subtle, and for me it is a nice treat to go to bed smelling like this lovely oil.  If you are looking for something that has a lather I would not recommend this, you would need to use quite a bit and that would be expensive. For those with dry skin I would definitely recommend this as a gentle wash for most of your body. I will definitely continue to use in the winter months.
Great smell, great sensation... love it!!

reviews.review_title: Very moisturizing but I don't like the scent
reviews.review_text: Everything about this shower gel is ideal for my skin. The texture is lovely, and it's extremely hydrating. A little also goes a long way, but I just don't enjoy the scent. If it smelled more of marzipan or almond, then I'd be buying it up by the case load. Unfortunately the smell prevents me from making this a regular item in my shower routine.

I used to get razor burn almost every single time I would shave my legs, and I would end up with dry skin because it hurt too much to put lotion on after shaving. This stuff is amazing- it is wonderful to shave with, and makes the razor glide so smoothly. I haven't had razor burn since, and it lasts a very long time (I only use it for shaving, and I honestly only shave about once a week if that). It leaves skin smooth and smells amazing. I still follow up with a lotion after, but a few times I have been lazy and my skin didn't feel dry at all. It makes my legs and underarms so soft. I also tend to get very dry armpits, which is annoying to deal with because you can't really moisturize them when you're wearing deodorant all of the time- shaving with this takes care of that problem.

This shower gel is really moisturizing, like really. Hours after showering I can still feel the suppleness of my skin and smell that lovely almond scent. One weird thing is that it smells funky when I'm actually washing with it, but that just may be my hard water or something. I love it.

Before the Skin Wonderland kit this holiday, I had always associated L'Occitane with hand creams. However, I have completely fallen in love with their Cleansing And Softening Shower Oil With Almond Oil.  The scent is soft, and feminine. It does not overpower, and layers well with a host of fragrance options (including the L'Occitane Skin Oil that has the same scent).  Normally, come winter, my skin is irritable, and patchily dry. However, after integrating this into my shower routine, my dryness is greatly lessened. I continue to see improvements as the weeks wear on. It is also useful for shaving too.  My only qualm is that this is much more expensive that I would like. There is a larger size, which is cheaper per ounce. However, i don't think I will splurge for this except for in the colder months.
Truly beautiful product. I love absolutely everything about it and it's amazing for dry skin. Definite repurchase!

My hands get dry and cracked every winter. Last year, I shellacked them with Vaseline and wore gloves to bed every night. On a whim, I picked this baby up from the impulse buy section while waiting in line to check out. I use a few drops on my hands each night and wake up like I've just had a manicure. My hands are soft and moisturized every morning.

reviews.review_title: addicted to this amazing cleansing oil
reviews.review_text: this oil is amazing - where has it been all my life - it sells so good - some might think it is strong, but it doesn't follow you after the shower - it leaves a nice clean and soft texture to your skin - it is worth the price and a nice luxury. It has a lovely lather and is good for my sensitive skin.
Light and fresh, smells amazing. My favorite shower oil. Keeps skin moisturized.
Absolutely wonderful for the shower. Foams, smells great, and leaves my skin soft. Using alot less moisturizer this winter!
Best shower gel ever!! Never will buy shaving cream again!! Works as shaving cream and cleanser, can't say enough

I was hoping for a great alternative to applying lotion during the winter time because I hate that sticky feeling, but this wasn't the one hit wonder. I've used it for a few weeks and haven't really seen any improvements nor has my skin felt moisturizer. I also don't think this scent is very attractive, but to each their own.
I love this body wash, it smells fantastic
I loveeeee the smell of this and it goes on really soft on your skin. My only problem with it is that the smell don't last very long for the price.

reviews.review_title: Best Shaving Oil and Body Wash Ever!
reviews.review_text: Love this stuff and smell is so worm and pleasant! It's not suppose to lather, lather usually means that there is sodium sodium laureth sulfate main ingredient, which is basically like dishwashing liquid on your skin. This stuff does a great job preventing nicks and cuts when you shave and also gives you the softest most moisturized skin, no lotions needed after!

I heard rave reviews about this product, but after trying it, I don't see that it does much. The smell is weird to me, not at all like almond, but more like pet shampoo. It's not anything special, and doesn't do anything for my skin. It's just okay.

reviews.review_title: One of the Best from L'Occitane
reviews.review_text: One of my favorite products to use when I'm taking a shower. The smell is divine perfection! You don't need alot when using this oil in the shower
Not worth the hype. Plus the smell is kinda funky. I'm glad I bought the small bottle

It's a nice body wash... But the smell! I'm almost wondering if I got a bad batch because of all the splendid raves about this. And I normally love almond scents. But this is awful. In the bottle it seems lovely, but once it gets wet and foams it just smells rancid. I have to stop breathing when I use it. Otherwise it works as a lovely body wash. Definitely won't buy the full size after this experience though.

without a doubt this is the best shower oil I've ever encountered. It foams up much more then any other brand I've tried. The scent is lfresh and really like almonds lasting all day. Also it makes the best shaving product, close, smooth, no nicks, cuts or best of all breakouts! The tub isn't slippery with goop when done either. If they sold it by the barrel I would buy it! yes, it might be a bit pricy but is indeed worth it!

I am liking this oil, especially for shaving! Some previous reviews said it wouldn't foam up, but that has not need a problem for me. My only reason for 4 starts instead of 5 is the fragrance. It smells more like vanilla than almond to me, and I don't like vanilla scents in general.

This is the best shower oil I've ever encountered. It foams up much more then any other brand I've tried. The scent is light and enhances my perfume (E&J Black) and it makes the best shaving product, close, smooth, no nicks, cuts or best of all breakouts! The tub isn't slippery with goop when done either. I will be re-ordering this by the barrell.
It is a very very good shower gel, makes my skin so smooth.
Perfect for cold weather, leaves my skin so soft. Will definitely re-purchase and give as gifts.

reviews.review_title: Perfect for Shaving--Bring Back the Large Size!
reviews.review_text: I get eczema during the winter, and always get super dry, itchy legs after shaving. This shower oil lathers nicely and leaves legs smooth and hydrated. You don't have to use a lot, but the largest size is a much better value. Please keep it in stock!

I bought a small bottle of this shower oil which came with a almond body oil. They both smell incredible! My only complaint is that I can't get the shower oil to really lather up a lot. I use the body oil after my shower and it leaves you smelling great all day and is not overpowering.

I dislike oils and heavy lotions but my skin desperately needs it. I had a sample of this, tried it, fell in love and purchased more. It's amazing. Light weight, non-oily but very moisturizing. Use it like a body wash. And it smells so nice. I'm a fan for life! Try the smaller size and get ready to fall in love! Then invest in the bigger ones. Your skin will thank you!

I love this productI sampled it first and totally fell in LOVE! It's fantastic for my dry skin in winter as I'm not wild about lots of greasy body lotion. Mild fragrance but not a slimy after feel it actually lathers a little and leaves me feeling clean wash after wash with no build up on my skin. I do switch to philosophy wash in summer but only because I love the margarita wash.
Received a sample and I am now hooked. Leaves skin soft and smooth. The scent is light and pleasant.

reviews.review_title: Cleansing And Softening Shower Oil With Almond Oil
reviews.review_text: Satisfied. Love the fragrance and silky feel!

this shower oil makes my skin feel amazing. I love how it smalls and feels. If you just use your hands to rub it on it wont foam as much, so if you want a foamy oil use a loofah. I do wish it was a bit cheaper and or come in a lot bigger bottle. But once I got this sample was hooked.

reviews.review_title: great as moisturizing wash and shaving cream
reviews.review_text: Love this...great moisturizing wash, love how it emulsifies  love this most as a shaving oil which is what i use it form most often.
Excellent shower oil. Take warm shower, step out and immediately put this on. It's heaven!!!

I love anything almond scented so I wanted to try this shower oil out. I don't think it smells exactly like almond, but the smell is very clean and refreshing. I'm big on getting a good lather and this one doesn't lather that much compared to regular body washes which was disappointing. It would be a decent lather in the beginning but fade really quickly. If it lathered more I would definitely repurchase, but not with the current formula. My skin was smooth after use but not enough to overlook the lack of lather.

Smells delicious, and the turning into foamy awesomeness part is cool but that's all I enjoyed. I didn't notice any extra hydration, the smell didn't linger after the shower, I'll stick to my normal shower gel that's cheaper and works better.

I will continue to repurchase this. It's amazing in so many ways. It smells amazing, lathers well, hydrates your skin, can be used for shaving, and it's awesome for lazy girls/working girls who don't have time to moisturize after they get out of the shower because your skin already feels super hydrated and happy. It's so addictive because it's just that great.
I am a huge fan. I use this to shave my legs, and they have never been smoother. The smell is great. I follow with their lotion and oil and my skin looks and feels amazing.
the smell of this stuff makes me gag!!!  not romantic, actually leaves my skin dry and dont feel clean at all!
Not too oily-smells wonderful- a divine skin treat.
the perfect treat in the shower to fight off dry skin, especially in the winter. it smells great, it cleans well and leaves the skin soft and hydrated.
luxuriously moisturizing with a beautiful scent....and YES, it will lather if you use with a shower sponge of some type; also amazing to shave legs!
Makes your skin so soft, use this if I wanna feel special...hope sephora Canada carries the bigger one...
A shower always wakes you up and yet relaxes you at the same time. This L'Occitane Shower Oil with Almond makes your shower even more delightful and soothing...and the fragrance is lovely.

As a member over the over 50 club, my skin has changed a lot over the years, dryness being a particular problem in the winter. I like this product because it is very moisturizing. The fact that it doesn't lather a lot is not an issue for me. It still cleans very well, and truth be told, I don't need a lot of suds to be clean. I find that a couple of quarter size dollops is ample to cleanse my entire body. For shaving, I use a little more.

I love the smell and haven't been able to find anything else like it. I find myself having to use a lot though because it doesn't lather well. I won't be repurchasing because although I'm obsessed with the scent, I can't justify the price when I have to use so much.

This is great stuff. I use it to wash my skin and also as a shaving gel--just a tiny bit is enough for a whole leg. It smells great, not too strong, and it's great for dry skin because it's so rich and moisturizing. You only need a small amount, so the bottle lasts forever. One of my must-have products.

I got the tiny sample and I hadn't really noticed the lather bit in the description. I don't care that it doesn't seem to lather much. More lather usually=more drying to the skin. I have itchy skin esp as the weather gets cold but when I use this I don't have the constant urge to moisturize so I'm not scratching up a storm in public. The problem is that it smells funny and I couldn't put my finger on it at first but I think it smells kinda plastic-y. Since the Sephora reviews seem to be mixed on the smell, I wonder if whatever ingredient creates the scent gets old quickly? Anyway, I really really wish I could find a shower oil like this that doesn't smell funny. I may see if I can smell a few bottles in the store...

I like this bc it is a softening wash that still has some suds. Wash and moisturize at the same time without a heavy oil or heavily scented body wash. Follow up with shea butter body cream to seal it all in!

I have received a sample of this shower oil and I had absolutely loved it, so I bought a bottle. It is very nice, but it doesn't foam up very much, so it is not very easy to use it with a scrubbing pad. It works fine with those colored loofahs. I like the smell, but I will check for some similar gel that foams up easier. Not sure how much it does in terms of moisturizer, because I use the almond oil after. But if you like to get spoiled and you really enjoy your shower then it is a good product to have.
This shower oil turning into a moisturizing foam in the shower. It leaves your skin silky and works great for shaving. I've been through quite a few bottles...

I'm reading the reviews and am wondering if I'm using this wrong. I need to use a lot to get it to lather and since it's oil it drips when I put a lot on my hands, so I feel like I'm wasting a lot of product. And even with a lot of product, it didn't really lather for me, more like it turned to a milky cleanser - which is ok. I like oils and like when they turn milky when they come in contact with water - but I expected a little more lather based on the description that says it turns 'foamy' Also, I found the smell a bit too strong. It wasn't bad and I got used to it but when I originally tried it, I was surprised at the strong scent.

The best thing for my skin right now for this very dry winter!! It smells like almond sugar Christmas cookies. I love that the oil isn't thin. It sticks and emulsifies into this milky silky goodness! Best ever!

This shower oil is pure heaven. It lathers up nicely (and almost gives a warm sensation) when in contact with water. After it washes off, your skin is so hydrated and plump and smooth. When I dry off from my shower my skin still feels like heaven. And especially once I add the almond oil on top, wow. My boyfriend loves the scent and the feeling. Amazing product.
I sampled this before purchasing and I absolutely love this! it feels so luxurious on my skin and smells so delicious. a little goes a long way too, so you don't need a lot.

I love this cleaning oil so much. It makes my skin so soft and the smell isn't too harsh. I don't tend to use this all over, but mainly as a shave gel. It doesn't clog my razor or leave razor burn. The price for the size is also great,
This is a bit pricey but it truly feels indulgent in the shower. Such a Beautiful splurge!! If you want to pamper yourself, give it a shot.
This is one of the best washes I've tried. It has a light lather to it. I use this for shaving and it makes my legs feel so soft and smooth
I enjoy this cleanser. It's moisturizing, scented, and has a nice lather too it, despite it being an oil.

reviews.review_title: stinks and does not foam well
reviews.review_text: I thought I would treat my bf to a relaxing bath with this as a body wash. You need to use A LOT of it to work into the rich lather that everyone's talking about. And ewww it does not smell like almonds. The scent is so off-putting I had to take it back. Definitely smell it before you buy it.
Received a deluxe sample of this from the party prep bag. This shower oil is sensual, smells enticing ! skin is left supple and soft. will be purchasing the full size!
I love this product! It starts a an oil in your have but TRANSFORMS into the most luxurious, moistorizing, and rich cleansing wash. I use it as a shaving oil! The smell is divine!
I like this and it smells wonderful.
I love the entire almond line fromn L'Occitane. I use this oil as a shaving cream. Add water and it turns into a lather that leaves your skin smooth, post-shave. Definite recommendation.

I love oil for my skin! Inlike this product but i dont feel that clean feeling well i dont feel it! Maybe because is not soapy so i just shower with my normal shower get thn i apply this using my hands and is good. The smell Is not really good! Is just like a blah smell but if u are lazy for lotion this s the deal!

I'm not really a fan of L'Occitane products, and I especially detest their lotions, but I received this in my Skin Wonderland kit. The. scent. is. DIVINE. I enjoy the consistency and my skin seems to enjoy this too. I did try to shave my legs with it, as another reviewer suggested, but found that I could not get as close of a shave with it as I do with my regular can of men's shave cream. There is a lingering, very light scent afterward that is very comforting and pleasant, and I noticed that my skin did not itch or feel as tight after using this as it normally does after a shower. I moisturize religiously and therefore rarely have issues with dry skin (even in winter) and I didn't have to apply quite as much lotion after showering with this. This isn't expensive at all, and I am definitely considering re-purchasing after my sample has run out. I just wish it came in a different bottle; L'Occitane's pop-top bottles are difficult to open without breaking a nail!

This is the best product I've ever used to shave my legs. It leaves your legs and body soft and silky. This will be a staple in my shower routine. I will never shave without this stuff again, it's amazing. The smell is a bonus. I follow with the supple skin oil after my shower and my skin has never been softer.

reviews.review_title: Oil Lovers, THE SEARCH IS OVER!
reviews.review_text: If you're like me, someone who loves to pamper as much as you love bath time, this is the right product for you. After a long, steamy bath, I apply it all over and I let it dry for about a minute. You can literally wear a silk robe without damaging it. Plus, the scent is very subtle. Will be buying this product for as long as I can.
Lisa Eldrige recommenced this in one of her IG pics. I like it for the Summer, but in Winter I still need a good body moisturizer. Good for shaving. Scent lingers.

Works well. I find I use much less if I pour a bit into my hand and lather that way. Smells quite nice, but changes a bit in my hard water. Not sure I love that smell. Either way, even though during colder months I use body oil after shower, this is gentle and doesn't strip my skin of moisture.
Our new house has hard water so I was looking for a shower oil to keep my skin moist. I love this shower oil and it smells terrific.

I liked the smell of this but found it weak in the lathering department unless you used a lot. I didn't find it foamy at all like it claims. I felt I had to use twice as much as I normally would with other shower gels just to get a rich lather. And with it being already somewhat pricey, I didn't really feel it was worth it. I felt it was moisturizing when you used a lot, but not so much that I would buy this again.
The smell is terrible and it doesn't foam at all.

This is my favourite scent of all time! It's a lovely almond vanilla marzipan scent. I found it doesn't really lather, which is great in the winter (and for dry skin), and it is highly moisturizing. It leaves your skin feeling silky, soft and lightly scented. I suggest using this product with your hands instead of a loofah or shower pouf as the product doesn't lather much.

This shower oil is wonderful and quite possibly one of the best things i've ever bought from sephora. If you like feeling soft and smelling wonderful after your showers you definitely need this. I was a bit skeptical about buying this at first but after i did i realized i'm definitely going to need about 3 more bottles because i use it all the time now. This is my new favorite brand at sephora. You should also consider buying some of the other products from this company. I recently bought a gift set for myself that also included this product. the hand creams from this company are wonderful. This product however lathers wonderfully in the shower and is easy to use. my only complaint is that for 25 dollars this product goes very quickly because of the small amount thats in it. I bought this a week ago from the date of this review and already 1/4 of it has been used. Overall, this brand is just wonderful and you should try it out if you like almond scents

I received a sample of this and loved it. I have now ordered it twice and my skin is not as dry as it used to be. The smell is subtle, fresh and it lathers up nicely when it interacts with water. I buy this for gifts when I want a special indulging treat for someone. Very moisturizing.

I have incredibly dry skin, I have tried so many products so when I found this I was thrilled!! It's so unique and it leaves my skin feeling soft and moisturized. I love the subtle scent!! I can not live without this product! It works great to shave with as well! I also have found it works great on my toddlers skin and hair!!! She has extremely dry skin as well. I also use the supple skin oil! This is a must try if you suffer from dry skin
It doesn't make my skin dry and it leaves your skin feel fully hydrated. Smells heavenly! Will repurchase

I really love this product. It's smells lovely, rinses off cleanly and leaves my skin hydrated. It's absolutely amazing how it goes from an oil to a foaming cleanser. The tiny bottles are only, like, 8 bucks. Do yourself a favor and try it out!
This was just oily and I had to use a lot just to streatch through a shower. I did know it wouldn't lather.I will not Purchase this item again.
I always prefer cleansing my skin with oil - particularly oils that lather when mixed with water. This cleansing oil leaves my dry, scaly skin moist and soft.

This is a great product. I got the eco bag from l'occitane themselves (unfortunately it leaked out and was too lazy to return) and it was amazing. It really lathers well. It softens amazingly. Works really well in tandem with the supple firming oil too. Can last a long time too.

I have just tried the Cleansing and Softening Shower Oil for the first time and I am amazed how your skin feels so soft and moisturized. I felt that my skin did not need to be moisturized after using this shower oil. I wish I have tried this little luxury before, especially during winter months.

This oil is the best. I use it instead of shaving cream when I shave my legs and it works wonderfully. It leaves my skin incredibly smooth and soft. Sometimes I don't even need to put on lotion once I get out of the shower because it moisturizes my skin so well.
I love this cleanser. It's great for winter time and you can use it to shave your legs too. It's a bit indulgent, but once you get it-life changing!
An oil that smells so good and it lathers! Perfection.
This product is wonderful! My skin is much softer and the very mild yummy fragrance is relaxing. It does not lather much but a little dabble on a washcloth is plenty.
This body wash is a luxury and works very well as a shaving oil. It's a nice indulgence.
this smells so good. its a nice light fragrance. Must use with a loofah sponge because it will lather so much (don't use a wash cloth, it just soaks up the oil.) My boyfriend loves this scent!!!!

reviews.review_title: Very Pleased with this shower oil!
reviews.review_text: This was the first time I'd ever used a shower oil and didn't know what to expect. I was pleased with the fine foam it produced for cleansing and love the way my skin feels after I've dried off. There is no oily residue. I'm hooked and don't want to use shower gel again!
You will leave your shower clean, soft, silky, and smelling heavenly. It's kind of an intoxicating fragrance. It does foam but don't expect big suds. But you will be clean and your skin will glow.
The smell is breathtaking, leaves my skin so soft and smelling great. Definitely will continue to use.
This oil is fabulous. Leaves your skin soft with a slight almond scent. I love it!
I like it very much, but I doubt I will be repurchasing. I have since found a very moisturizing body wash I can make at home. Overall it's great for dry skin though.
I LOVE what this did for my skin, but the scent just smells like plastic baby dolls. I cannot stand it.
I love shaving with this... amazing how soft and moisturized my legs are afterwards! It's very luxurious feeling... lathers up nicely and smells great, I love taking a shower with this.
Smells wonderful, froths up nicely when paired with water to produce soft, lightly moisturized skin. A winter must have!

I love this shower oil - just a slight amount of foam produced with it but feels so great on your skin -- I use it as the last thing at the end of a shower or to shave with - lovely fragrance and feels so luxurious on the skin.
This stuff is awesome, leaves your skin feeling so soft and smooth and oh and then there's the fact that it smells just delicious! Am I exaggerating? Go try it, you'll see!
Luxurious, smells great. Makes your skin really soft

I adore the scent that this has! It makes my skin very smooth and moisturized. It feels very luxurious; and at that price tag, it better feel that luxurious. This was an impulse buy that I don't plan on buying again because of the price, but I definitely am savoring what I bought.
I'm 57 and have very dry skin. this is the best body wash I have used in a long time. And the smell is wonderful and light

reviews.review_title: Haven't found a shower product better than this!
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for years! Great moisturizing cleanser. Smells great and is great for shaving. I add some to my bath for a moisturizing experience! Love this product

I am halpy I bought the smaller size version of this to try. After first few uses I was not wowed by this product. I found no significant increase in the hydration of my skin after use. I only received feedback from my BF that my skin felt super oily and sticky much longer after taking a shower than normal. Wasn't worth the price and won't be re-purchasing.

reviews.review_title: So Good, My Husband Uses It.
reviews.review_text: I tried this several years ago looking to find something for my husband's dry skin. Something that wouldn't offend his masculinity.  This fits the bill. Rich and thick, I use it for shaving as well. The scent is light and not overpowering. Pricey, but what can you do? You get what you pay for.

Love this cleansing body oil for the shower. It is extremely hydrating and even when washed away, leaves your skin smooth and soft. Has a wonderful light scent of almonds, foams as you apply and can be used for shaving. Follow with the almond body oil from same brand and your skin will love you all day long!!!

I can't even begin to tell you how much I love this shower oil. It does take some time getting used to especially if you're used to using shower gels because this is not a sudsy formula. What I will say about this is that after using this the first time, my skin was EXTREMELY soft. The scent is not heavy so it will not interfere with your lotion or if you wear any fragrance. Would definitely purchase again!

Not that this product needed another glowing review but I use this mostly for shaving. Typically I have slight razor burn minutes after drying off out of the shower when I shave my legs with any product but this. It's amazing- I don't even need lotion right away if at all if I don't use hot hot water. The smell is divine and it's also perfect for exfoliating with a clairsonic. Get this, the pump bottle is the most convenient. .
Saved my chronic dry skin after surgery! Can't recommend enough. Best stuff for dry scars and patches

I bought this after hearing so much hype about using this to shave your legs. Apparently it was supposed to be so moisturizing, you didn't need to moisturize afterwards. I was hesitant being the kind of person who always needs to moisturize right after because my legs get itchy (dry). This shower oil blew my mind away. Not only did I get a close shave; my legs were EXTREMELY soft and hydrated. I only applied a bit of moisturizer on my knees really because I'm so used to applying some afterwards. B-E-A-U-T-I-F-U-L. I'm going to get the biggest size once it's back on stock!
My skin feels amazing after using this shower oil. The smell is light and fresh. I also used it to shave after seeing previous reviewers rave about it and agree wholeheartedly!

reviews.review_title: L'Occitane Shower Oil with Almond Oil
reviews.review_text: L'Occitane products typically are very good. I enjoy getting the shower oil and the softening oil for after shower. The Shower Oil is a little difficult to get used to using because it doesn't foam up as most soaps do; however, it does a great job of cleansing and it leaves you with a wonderful light fragrance after the shower.
Such a great product! It has a super soft, lightly bubbly lather and leaves a great sweet scent. Definitely buying again!
I love this product and will continue to buy. It makes my skin feel like silk...shaving with it is grand too.
I purchased a travel size of this to try it. It is the most amazing bath oil ever. The scent is amazing and love the feeling on my skin.

reviews.review_title: the best all around body wash
reviews.review_text: it moisturizes, cleans, and smooths skin every time. And the smell - oh the smell!! It's heaven. I've tried like 30 different body washes from sephora waiting until i struck gold with the perfect one, and this was unquestionably it. Been using it for 2 years now and don't plan on stopping. I live in colorado where it is incredibly dry and this gives me just the amount of moisture i need without being heavy or clogging pores at all.

It doesn't lather much at all so I find myself cleansing my skin first and then using this after. It feels really nice on the skin and smells very natural which I love. Just wish it gave me more of clean feeling by getting a little more sudsy. Overall, pretty good product.
It smells amazing and lathers so well! Perfect for shaving!

Love! I do a conditioning day once a week or when I return from a weekend at the lake (I also do one prior). This makes my skin super soft and smells great. It's awesome for the price and lasts a long time if you use it on occasion. I prefer a sudsy soap, for everyday use, and after I'll go over the suds with this or mix the oil and soap for a thicker shave lather.

I really liked the Almond Oil - supple skin oil from L'Occitane; however, this shower gel is not particularly hydrating (I was hopeful that using this would take the place of needing to use body lotion after showering - it did not). It smells amazing but the scent does not last very long on your skin. I would buy this again in the future if it cost about $10 less.

This product is really one of a kind. it comes out of the bottle as a thick oil but once rubbed into your skin it turns into a rich creamy lather that will spread. I think it is lightly scented and leaves your skin feeling clean but moisturized and supple. If you want a cheaper version with similar results try L'OCCITANE's Shea Butter Extra Gentle Soap  It really is one of the most Luxurious shower gels i have ever tried and yes it works great for shaving! I feel like the bottle i have will last me a long time. I would recommend it to anyone and i think ill throw it into gift bags for christmas because i think everyone should try this!
I love this product. I love oils so when I saw this in the trial size I bought it. Went home tried it a couple times
This feels and smells like luxury! The subtle almond scent is amazing and it leaves your skin feeling great!
Smells amazing! Love how this makes my skin look and feel! I am now on my second bottle and will continue to use this product.
This is not as good as I was hoping. It is lightly moisturizing but the smell is a bit of a turn-off. Plus it doesn't foam very well so you have to use too much.
Nice soft smell and really moisturizes skin. Wonderful product.

I have used a few products by L'Occitane and loved them. That's why I tried this shower oil. I use it for shaving because it is soft and moisturizing to the point I don't get razor bumps. I almost don't need moisturizer when I get out of the shower. I still use it (L'Occitane Body Lotion) but my skin is definitely softer with this oil than after I use regular shower gel.

reviews.review_title: Never using soap or aerosol shave gel again!
reviews.review_text: OMG. I bought a travel size bottle of this after falling in love with the smell of L'Occitane's Almond Supple Skin oil (it's the same scent) and ended up purchasing the full-sized bottle within a week. In my opinion, the smell is divine, so much so that I don't even wear my signature perfume that much anymore!  I have very dry skin on top of a pretty common condition called keratosis pilaris, which causes tiny rough bumps to show up on occasion on my arms and legs, especially when the weather is super hot or cold. Of course I can't give medical advice and nothing cures everything, but subjectively, I've seen a major improvement in the month I've been using this to shower, which is more than I can say for other products. In conjunction with dry brushing and using the Supple Skin Oil, this stuff has made my skin look better than I have seen it in a long time!  Also, after reading some other reviewers' opinions, I decided to try using it in place of shaving cream when I shave my legs and underarms, and I have to say that it has given me a closer, smoother shave than anything I have used before, didn't dry my legs out, and didn't clog up my razor like some of the other natural types of shaving cream do.  If you're on the fence, go for it! You'll be so glad you did! If the price tag stresses you out, be advised that you need very little product each time you use it; I've used less than 1/4 of my bottle in 3 weeks and still have most of a travel-sized bottle as well.

I have always had terrible razor burn and have spent hundreds of dollars trying to solve the problem. One day, I went into L'Occitane and asked if they had a solution and she showed me this. I was reluctant to spend that much again, but I just purchased my 3rd bottle. I use it after I shave and it immediately gets rid of the irritation. Using it only when I shave, one bottle lasts me close to 9 months. I hope they never discontinue this product!
I bought the travel size to use after my nightly swims but will be switching to this shower oil for my daily showers as well once my current body wash is finished!
Great body wash smells amazing makes my skin very soft

And then some!  Yes, this product might seem a bit expensive for a body wash, but let me tell you: IT IS WORTH IT.  First off: a little goes a long way. Pour a bit on your moistened loofah and rub a bit with your hand: it creates a light, scented lather that leaves your skin feeling clean, soft and supple and not at all greasy. The delicious smell lingers on your skin long after showering: another plus! If you pair this with the Milk Almond Cream and the Almond Supple Oil you will notice a significant change in your skin within days!  Take this from a girl with dry skin problems. Not anymore! Highly recommended!

I really liked this cleanser. It smells very good,and does everything it says.. cleansing and softening, it works great with shaving. It's a oil but it's not greasy. You only need to use a little bit too.I love the almond scent.

I soooo need this in the 16.9oz size. I mean when is it coming back?? This shower oil is so lovely. It smells wonderful in the shower and is absolutely great for shaving underarms and legs. It's even better when you layer it with the body oil after your shower. My skin has never been softer. The scent is divine and doesn't conflict with perfumes.

This oil was pleasantly surprising. I bought the small bottle not sure if I would like it, but after a few uses I am hooked. I was surprised by the fact that this functions more like an extremely smooth body wash than an oil; although it comes out like an oil in your hand, when applied and rubbed to the body, it turns into a subtly gel/cream consistency, making it much easier to adhere to the skin. I wouldn't say it lathers per say, but it definitely could function as a body wash, although I use it after cleansing with normal soap. The scent is not overwhelmingly sweet as I worried it would be, more of a soft marzipan undertone. It leaves the skin feeling like butter, and although the price point is a little high for the bottle, I think this would me a luxurious gift, and doubles as body wash and moisturizer,which helps to justify the price.

This oil feels soooo good. It's not drying like some soaps and gives a brilliant smooth finish after shaving. I wasn't able to forego moisturising afterwards - maybe because it's so dry in CA. As such, I am not sure that I would repurchase, plus it's quite expensive. But it's a nice treat and would make a lovely Mother's Day present or gift for someone who deserves pampering.

One of my favorite bath products. The amazing almond fragrance and luxurious oil formula makes this a bath time treat.  Since this is an oil based cleanser, it doesn't foam as well as traditional shower gels. But, the product cleanses and hydrates exceptionally well. It rinses cleanly while leaving skin with a touch of softness. Unfortunately, the almond fragrance doesn't linger on your skin.

reviews.review_title: Nice but maybe not a repeat
reviews.review_text: I love the concept here, moisturize in the shower with this shower oil. This is a somewhat thick very fragrant shower oil. While I like this, I don't like it enough and will go back to my slightly less thick, unscented version from Eucerin for half the price.

After i shave I put this on and it makes my legs soft and not irritated from shaving only bad this if the smells isn't to good but it's stand able but it the scent dosnt last so it's okay! Overall it's worth the money u don't need a lot it's pretty thick, will continue to purchase..also have there lotion and it's amazing to:)

I love this cleanser. While it doesn't foam up as much as traditional shower gels, if you put it on a poof or in your hands and work it into a lather before you put it on your body it will suds up a bit. The scent is nice and light and the best part is that it leaves your skin feeling hydrated. It doesn't make your shower floor slippery either.
Not only is this a fabulous body cleanser it softens and moisturizes the skin but does not leave it feeling oily. Love this shower cleanser.
This is a good shower oil but not worth the price. I need to use so much to get a lather that I'm going through it way too fast.

This product is too expensive for me to consider as just a body wash. I can't justify the price per ounce to use as a soap alternative in the shower.  That being said, it's an amazing add to my shaving routine. My legs and underarms have never been smoother.  My underarms used to have pretty noticeable bumps when I shaved regularly, but after using this Shower Oil exclusively as my shaving cream, I no longer have any bumps.  I only need a tiny bit to create enough of a slick surface to shave with, the small bottle I got will last for a long time, even this summer when I shave every day.  The smell is a nice bonus, but not noticeable at all once I got out of the shower.

I use this oil instead of shaving cream. It smells wonderful and leaves my skin feeling super smooth. A little goes a long way for shaving. The only drawback is that it leaves a film on the tub, hence the loss of one star.

This shower oil is perfect for someone who wants a luxurious feel to their shower time. It is not super lathery which is great if you have dry skin. it feels very moisturizing to the skin and has a light but clear almond scent.

I have not tried it as yet, but I have a sister who loves it. She cannot tolerate fragrance and still can use it in the bath or shower. So I plan to try it too. Hope others will too. This is from a good company.

At first I wasn't sure about this- it doesn't lather on my loofa, so I couldn't tell if anything was happening. However, the lack of lather is a plus, because it means my skin isn't being dried out by a bunch of detergents. This leaves my skin so silky soft! I love it!
Yet another great sample that got me hooked expensive but so luxurious makes skin soo soft dont forget to buy the after shower oil from the same brand

After converting to an oil cleanser (shiseido) figured why not give my body the same treatment. I love how this smells, moisturizes, and feels luxurious. I buy the 32oz and even use it exclusively to shave. This size sells out frequently.
I'm a Massage Therapist so I know how skin should feel when touched! This gets the job done! AMAZAING product. I will buy it again! :)

I love this oil-based cleanser. It doesn't dry out my skin like regular soap or even some lotion cleansers do. Unless it's winter, I don't even have to put on lotion afterwards. I have pretty dry skin all over, and this is fantastic for me. It stops the itching.  It does not leave an oily feeling afterwards - only soft skin. It also does not leave oil in the bottom of the tub.  It smells like sweet almond when you're washing, but the scent fades quickly after you dry off so you won't blow people away.

I absolutely love this cleansing shower oil and can't find an alternative product that comes close to comparison. I have tried finding a cheaper replacement and have even tried making my own body wash/oil, but I keep coming back to this. The smell is divine - almond sweetness that is not too strong. It doubles as a shave gel and makes my legs feel like silk. It is very moisturizing and does have a slight lather. I have stopped using a pouf with this because it seems I have to use a lot more product to get the pouf to lather - this product is so expensive that I don't want to waste a single drop.

This has replaced my favorite soaps that I used for my dry, eczema-prone skin. Not only does this shower oil moisturizes and conditions my skin, it will soothe any existing irritation. A little goes a long way so you may want to watch yourself because the smell and feel is addicting.
It was a free sample and I loved it. I went and bought a big bottle for the shower with a pump. I use it daily.... love, love, love it!

Decided to finally use my points on myself for once and got the L'Occitane 500 point perk an fell in love with it almost instantly. This shower oil is not only soothing and awesome but has a nice soft scent and doesn't react with my sensitive skin!

At the recommendation of the esthetician at my store, I tried this for help shaving my legs. It smells like heaven, softens your skin, and is great for shaving. I now use this not only when I shave, but everyday.

reviews.review_title: Best Body Wash for Dry Skin
reviews.review_text: During the winter and in harsh climates, nothing is better than this shower oil. The smell is divine, and it is also perfect for shaving.

I got my mother-in-law a set that included this oil last year. She called me a week or two later, and couldn't stop talking about how much she liked the oil. I've since gotten her some more, and she's very happy!
Honestly not worth it at all. This doesn't even lather up. I still need moisturizer after the shower. The only good thing is that the scent is very very nice, but doesn't last after washing.
I just love how this product hydrate my skin and how practical it is.
I've been using the same bottle of this for shaving (not as a body wash) for about six months now. It smells amazing, makes my skin super soft, and only uses a little bit of product.

I bought this because I love the almond supple skin oil by L'Occitane so I thought the more I have that smells like that, the better! I don't really use this for cleansing, however. I usually use my body wash first so that I feel clean and then after I rinse it off, I apply this all over so that my skin is extra baby soft and smells amazing. I love how soft your skin stays even after you rinse it off. This is especially great for winter months (although I will continue to use it year round). I definitely plan on buying more once I am out.

I bought this online on a whim before a vacation last year, based off of the good reviews it had. I IMMEDIATELY fell in love with the product. It smells SO good (very fresh, clean) and you can tell it's a good quality product. Some complain that it doesn't lather, but oils don't lather, so don't expect it. Just make sure your skin is wet when you apply the shower oil, and it will spread easily. I recommend getting the Supple Skin Oil as well, as these compliment each other so nicely. Ugh....I love this stuff!!

This got me and my itchy dry sensitive skin through the winter. I really was impressed with how this moisturized and soothed my skin. It is wonderful for shaving too. Gives you a nice smooth shave with super soft skin. I also like the scent.

I bought this on a whim, since I have dry skin and figured this would at least be less drying than regular soap. And lo and behold, it's now my favourite thing to cleanse with. It's moisturizing and cleans well, and I actually like the texture of it a lot. I can shave with it just as well as shaving cream, and my skin feels wonderful after a shower. It's no miracle oil, but it's definitely the most moisturizing cleansing product I've used!

This is my new go-to for leg shaving. Just a dab spreads out and slathers the whole leg and makes the razor really glide. Nicely moisturizing to boot, and smells great. Upgraded to the big bottle after my deluxe sample ran out, worth it!

I love this product. It has a very subtle scent that doesn't fight with my perfume. I noticed in reviews of this product people said that when mixed with water, that is smelled bad like a wet dog. The only explanation for this would be some component in these peoples water. This shower oil helps keep my skin hydrated in the winter and on the days that I want to skip body lotion my skin feels great, no dryness or itching.

This smells great and does it's job. It is moisturizing but not any more so than other oil products. You still should apply lotion afterwards but this does help seal in the water from the shower. Theres not a great lather but I would expect this for an oil based product. I would repurchase.

I'm in love with this! I use body wash and then use a dime-sized amount (if that) on my arms, focusing on my elbows. I have seen an improvement and my elbows aren't as dry. I LOVE the smell and it has softened my skin.
I agree to other reviews, product does have a nice luxurious feel, but it just doesn't lather enough (which I prefer). I probably will try another product.
This is the only shower stuff I like. Smells wonderful, leaves my skin soft. I buy this repeatedly. It works as shaving cream too.

This product makes me want to shower 10x a day! The texture, the smell, just the quality of this shower oil is so luxurious! It has helped my dry winter skin and has helped an itching situation I've developed due to pregnancy (inexplicable itching all over.) I will repurchase again and again. I got the large pump size and love the value and convenience.

I have never been willing to spend this much $$ on a body wash. NEVER. I received a travel size in a free gift at some point and I decided I would give it a try. I have a couple spots of eczema on my arms and they were flaring up so I figured this might help. It is a miracle worker and the performance of the shower oil made me splurge and buy the large size. It smells wonderful. I love that it is an oil at first and then turns into a very soft lather. I alternate using my hands or a shower pouf. It feels very luxurious and prevents my skin from feeling tight and itchy when I get out of the shower. Well worth the money. I will continue to buy.

My skin gets so dry in the winter, and the reviews for this cleansing shower oil were so positive, I thought this might be the answer to my problems. But, I was underwhelmed by results. I haven't tried it as a shaving oil. Maybe it's better for that.  As a moisturizer, it doesn't do much. My skin was no worse because of it, but I definitely have to apply a body butter after the shower, or my skin is scaly and itchy.  The scent is almost non-existent. I don't really care about that, but it might be important to some people.

Was introduced to this through the L'Occitane 500 beauty insider gift. I love how it aids in my super smooth shave. I don't necessarily think it does an effective job for deodorant aspect of cleaning. The smell isn't great, but it doesn't last very long after my shower. I just purchased the larger size.
Smells great and leaves skin feeling soft without being greasy. Noticed the difference in my skin from the first time i used this product.

I have thyroid disease and in the winter my skin is like sandpaper. This wash was amazing on my skin, softened it right up even my parched feet. I received a sample in a bonus kit and after using it came right back and ordered a regular size. This will be my favorite wash from now on.

I finally got to try this body cleanser. I do like it but I don't love it. I don't think there is anything special or unique about it. The fragrance is nice and subtle, not too perfumey, pairs lovely with my Kiehl's almond body lotion. This shower oil foams nicely with my loofah. It is not oily and does not leave a residue on the skin. Compared to other shower body products, the only difference I can point out is that its liquidy consistensy disolves quickly, and you don't need to use too much to lather it up.

I was using a different body wash, but with winter I needed something more moisturizing and found a mostly full bottle of this in my bathroom drawer.  I'm never going back to anything else. This smells absolutely delicious, and it's *heavenly* on my skin. I still use body cream, but my skin's *so* soft after I get out of the shower. I'm on my second bottle now and will totally be buying more when I run out.  Best thing I've ever used as a body cleanser.
I was looking for a great smelling shower gel. I am not disappointed! Love everything about this product. I will buy this again. My skin felt very soft after the shower.

It is nice for shaving, very creamy, and I like the smell. However, I have noticed that the effect really doesn't last after rinsing. I find myself still needing to use a dry oil for softening the skin after a shower. There are several good dry oils out there that do the trick. I am giving this three stars because while it's nice to have while bathing, for me it isn't moisturizing on a long enough basis to merit spending extra money on this.
It feels and smells Amaizing...love it!

reviews.review_title: Gentle, non irritating and smells wonderful!
reviews.review_text: I have extremely sensitive skin and recently eczema. Even sensitive soaps would dry my skin causing an eczema outbreak. This oil is non-drying and smells incredible.
I use this with the almond supple skin oil, and it's perfect. My skin is soft all the time.

I was on the fence about buying an oil in general since my skin tends to be temperamental in this Texas weather. So for reassurance, I asked my boyfriend to tag along with me and give me his opinion so I could decide if I wanted to take the plunge on buying an oil.  So first of all I did not go in planning on buying this, but once we got in there and smelled it, there was no weighing options. I had to buy it based off of smell alone. I even bought the big 16.9oz bottle for my boyfriend! (...he likes to smell good too but uses way too much product sometimes :-) ) After we left the store, I went straight to the shower to try it out, and it was instantly transformative on my skin! My skin tends to get very tight right after a shower, and with this oil it didn't. I used this before I shaved and it made my legs so smooth for about almost two days which rocks!  As for the smell, it smells like candy almonds, and on my body chemistry it tends to lean on the sweeter side, but on my boyfriend it tends to turn more musky. He already has had compliments from guys (!) that his cologne smells good, but he'll tell them that it's a shower oil instead.  Worth the money in my opinion, and I will definitely be buying this again when I am done.
This oil has transformed my shower time! Its awesome and clearly worth the hype & money.

I strictly use this when shaving my legs. And it is most defiantely the smoothest shave ever. Plus I have very dry skin, and I love that this shower oil keeps my skin hydrated! I cant help but reccomend to anyone who is looking to find soft, smooth, silky skin!!

A while ago my husband and I moved from a more humid climate to a less humid one and when we did our skin had a lot to say about it. After realizing that our old shower products weren't doing the job anymore and searching through a number of new ones that all made moisturizing claims we landed on this one.  L'Occitane Cleansing And Softening Shower Oil With Almond Oil is just different. It has a really pleasant but subtle smell that's appropriate for both sexes and it the most moisturizing body cleanser I've found. It IS pricey, but not as pricey as some other less effective shower creams/gels I've tried, and it's worth it. It leaves skin feeling clean, soft and comfortable.  It does lather, but not like a more detergent based shower gel/cream so you really do have to use it with a sponge or loofah to get the most mileage out of it. Once you've tried it and know you love it the larger 16oz pump is well worth the money.  This is a fantastic, and in my experience, somewhat unique product. Well worth a go.
Instead of soap, cleans, but no dry feeling afterward, aroma is heavenly. Will definitely reorder!

This stuff is GREAT. The scent is fantastic, and it leaves your skin smooooth. I've been using this followed by Huile Souplesse, and in spite of a tough winter my skin looks and feels great. I'm hooked!

This is a great shower oil, ESPECIALLY for winter months! My skin was well hydrated without needing lotion. My husband loves using it on his beard.  It doesn't lather well in a shower puff, I'd use it in my hands to keep from wasting.

It's crazy how well this stuff works. It scent (sweet almonds) lasts hours after you shower which is great because it smells amazing. It's so moisturizing and rich, ultimately leading to baby soft skin. I was worried at first when I used it in the shower because after pouring it into my palm it seemed a bit too thick and oily which I thought would leave a residue on my skin, but no way. After getting out of the shower my skin was so soft and cleansed, you could even skip lotion or body butter with it. The only thing is it takes a while to really get a good lather but it's definitely worth the hype regardless. It's literally an all-in-one product for all skin type.
Can't live without it. It smells so great, it feels amazing, so soft, does not dry your skin. And feel so smooth!!! Love this brand!
This didn't lather up enough for me. I would not buy again. The smell was nice though.

reviews.review_title: A Must Have for Soft Skin!
reviews.review_text: I bought this shower oil after reading all the positive reviews it got for being moisturizing and being able to use it as a shave gel and am not disappointed! I am so in love with this shower oil, I will only be buying this from now on (which says a lot because I am always trying new products). This oil gives my skin an incredible softness both in the shower and afterwards without any feelings of greasiness. It also gives my skin this incredible glow to it that actually makes me look a little more tan. I can use it for shaving as well (I have coarse hair). It's a nice thick lather, without a huge amount of bubbles everywhere. And I am completely in love with the smell! I thought that it would smell more almond, but it has a little bit of a floral scent that is just enough to make me feel feminine without that horrible old lady gardenia smell.
If you would like soft skin this winter I highly recommend this product. It has a light pleasant scent and leaves my skin ultra soft after showering!

This stuff is seriously amazing! I originally got it about a year ago as a deluxe sample and I found it a few weeks ago and started using it. I then fell so in love that I went to sephora and bought the large bottle! I am totally against anything that gives me a greasy feeling but this doesn't at all. Usually I will exfoliate while I condition my hair and then once i rinse out my conditioner I lather this on and rinse at the very end of my shower. It leaves me SO moisturized and my skin has never smelled so AMAZING! You need this product in your life!

Yes, it's pricey but considering that you can skip the lotion... Seriously, my skin is unbearably dry in the winter and with this shower oil i saw the difference immediately. The smell is to die for too!
This is a great Cleasing Shower Oil! My skin is very soft, moisturized and fragrant

reviews.review_title: Cleansing & Softening Shower Oil With Almond Oil
reviews.review_text: My fave emollient fluid cleanser which changes into a milky emulsion when mixed with water. Great 2-in-1 cleanser/makeup remover for dry to very dry skin. I can skip moisturizer in summer or layer lotion in colder, drier weather for super soft skin. Love the large 16.9 oz size with pump!
Very moisturizing, leave my skin really soft and with a light scent. Love it. I will repurchase. A lil pricy but worth it.

I was a bit skeptical on using this product since I thought it would just wash away in the drain. This product actually creates a nice, thick film in the shower - good enough for shaving my legs. I've used it for shaving under my arms, and since I am prone to ingrown hairs, this product actually did me good! I love the scent and with Winter, this product is a blessing since I have sensitive skin!

This is rich, supple and very moisturizing. The smell is very sweet and intoxicating. Surprisingly it lathers very well. Rinses clean and the divine scent lingers. Worth every penny, especially if the larger bottle is purchased since the size doubles but not the price.

I am obsessed with this stuff. I got a sample last summer and never looked back. I spend a lot of time in the sun in the summer and my skin gets pretty dry, but addiing this shower oil to my routine kept my summer skin so moisturized that I found myself reaching for the lotion less often. It has also been so wonderful for my winter skin that I had to recommend it my niece who is spending her second winter ever in a cold climate. She bought it without even sampling it and reported back to me that it is the best thing she's found for keeping her skin moisturized when it is freezing outside.  I'm embarrassed to say that I have tried a couple of similar shower oils (mostly drugstore brands), and they don't even come close to this one. This is a one-of-a-kind product. It may be a little pricey, but my skin is so soft that I know it's worth the investment.

I am not a fan of body wash I prefer bar soaps but I absolutely LOVE this stuff! I pair it with the supple body oil and it has been nothing short of amazing on my skin. These are pricey but well worth it. If you can get a sample, try that out first before buying to see if you like it. I got a sample from e-bay. Smells and feels great.

I absolutely LOVE this product! I received a deluxe sample of it a few months ago, and once it ran out, I just had to buy the full size. This is so creamy and wonderful, and leaves my skin unbelievably soft. It smells so rich and delicious, too. I can't get enough of this stuff!

I've reviewed this product before, and it is still the same perfect product, though this time I found a double-sized pump bottle in store (should last me a year and a half, at least!). I add a several drops of this shower oil to my scrubbie along with my body wash and it hydrates my skin.  Also, this is my number one shave cream. It doesn't lather, and it doesn't need to. It perfectly hydrates my skin, and I barely need to use lotion after shaving.

I moved to a high altitude last year and finally decided to invest in high quality moisturizing skincare. I bought this product and I absolutely love it! I don't know if I ever want to go without it again. It's even better when I combine it with the after shower almond oil of the same brand. Together they have made my skin smell absolutely wonderful and very silky to the touch!

Let me start by saying that I love body oils, mainly because I am on the lazy side when it comes to applying body lotion (specially in the cold winter months). The thing is, I do not like the oily, sticky feeling that some oils can leave behind.  That being said, wearing “L'Occitane Cleansing And Softening Shower Oil With Almond Oil” seems like a win-win situation for me. I get the moisture I need, without the extra oily feeling, so even on my rushed or lazy days, I do not have to worry about dry skin.  It does have a nutty smell, but I love the way it smells and I personally do not find it overpowering. Also, the smell does not stay on the skin very long, so it will not interfere with other scents if you choose to wear perfume or lotion after applying this oil.  Lastly, the way it gently lathers makes it perfect for shaving, but do not expect a shaving cream type foam, because that is not the case. Hope this helps. Happy shopping!!!
This stuff is great! smells good and leaves my skin so soft!
The scent is amazing. I agree with all other reviews according to this. I even don't want to use any other shower gel. Great quality)
I love the scent of the almond oil shower gel, that is why I purchase it :-)
I love this silky smooth oil. It's gentle on my skin and feels so wonderful. Definitely buying it again.

I just recently picked this up and can not imagine Not using this in the shower! It cleanses so well and feels wonderful. My skin adores it and the smell is beautiful. It rinses so cleanly but leaves such soft skin! Gotta Love That!

I love the silky texture of this oil and would recommend it for face, body, hair etc. (I use it mainly as a cleansing oil). However, I was disappointed by the scent. Rather than the gentle almond fragrance described, I find it perfumey and a bit over powering. I am sensitive to fragrances so perhaps others won't find it so offensive.

I love this! Sephora is out of the large refill size-every time I look.However, I continue to buy the $25 size because I love it so much. I shower with it daily & I don't feel any oily residue. It soaks in and when I dry off, enough remains to make my legs & arms moisturized, not greasy! No lotion needed--easy! Also, it smells wonderful!!

reviews.review_title: smells good until it mixes with water
reviews.review_text: I love the way this shower oil smells...until it mixes with water. Once it mixes with water, it smells like a wet dog. It doesn't lather up (this does not bother me) and is softening to my skin. But at $24 a bottle, I don't want the smell of wet dog in my shower.
Love the way this feels in the shower. Scent is ok, not my favorite.
This is the only shower oil my husband uses. Softens and has a great smell. Perfect stocking stuffer!
This has quickly become my go-to in the shower. If you are expecting fluffy lather, this makes more of a creamy foam. The payoff is soft and hydrated skin.

reviews.review_title: Doge says So supple, much amaze, wow!
reviews.review_text: I bought a bottle a few months ago, and now I'm on my second one! This stuff smells delicious, and I am oh so picky about the products I use. I always look through the ingredients of my products before I buy them to make sure they don't contain harsh ingredients or preservatives. It DOES foam but you need a loofa to help make it lather with water, or else you'll be rubbing the shower oil between your hands for quite some time before you see progress! Although this says oil, when it lathers, it will not feel oily at all, and it rinses off just like any other 'soapy' body soap. And after you shower, you're body feels noticeably softer than before! During the summers, I don't even need to use any body lotion or oil/moisturizer after I shower because this is moisturizing enough. During the winters, I'll use some aloe vera with vita E oil that I make at home to just add a touch of moisturizing to it. Seriously, a wonderful product and I hope they don't change the ingredients nor discontinue this!

This is an amazing shower gel. Yes, it's an oil, but it does not leave oil in your shower. The fragrance is pleasant enough, so I tried the rest of the line -- too strong for me -- had to return. But this stuff is amazing -- highly recommend.

reviews.review_title: Smells delicious but does not foam as promised
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this shower oil so much because it smells delicious and its almond oil which is very nurturing to your skin. However it did not foam at all and I ended up using another body wash after it. I returned it.

It smells great! I like to use an oil at the end of my shower especially in the winter. This oil keeps my skin from feeling so dry after my shower. It doesn't foam like soap does but it has a nice lather.

This is a fantastic product. Lathers just slightly. Rinses clean, and leaves your skin gently moisturized, and smelling sweet. Not overpowering. Doesn't strip your skin of oils. Great for sensitive skin. I can't live without. I keep a mini bottle in the shower & refill.

I received a sample of this wonderful product and immediately fell head over heals! It had a nice soft scent which doesn't bother my allergies. (Always a plus. :)). My skin immediately felt softer and moisturized. A small amount goes far so buy it and enjoy soft skin!!  Many blessings...

reviews.review_title: Love the scent, love the moisturizing
