reviews.review_text: I got this as a sample and absolutely loved the scent. I reordered because it really does moisturize and smooth. Any product that keeps my skin feeling and looking this soft and smooth all day is a keeper.

I first received this as a sample, and I wasn't completely sold at first. But now that I've used it for a while, I love it! Especially as a shave gel. I am allergic to a lot of scented beauty products, and I'm so happy to finally find something that smells awesome, and doesn't leave me itchy after I use it. Personally I've never experienced any wet dog smell. I've purchased a full size, and if I continue to love it as much as I do now, will definitely repurchase.

I agree with most of the reviews here. It is hydrating and the smell is amazing to me (I personally haven't picked up on the wet dog smell but then, I have a lot of dogs so maybe I'm immune...?) but the later... It isn't as rich as I would like. I feel I have to use more than I'd want to to get everywhere. But still, love it and love the smell.

I have never purchased a shower oil that is this amazing! It leaves your skin silky & smooth with no greasy residue. I purchased it after receiving it as a sample. Great for our bone chilling, skin drying Michigan winters! That and a great scent to boot!!

reviews.review_title: Love it until it gets wet
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with the Almond Supple Skin Oil, which smells the same as this one. However, there is a note in this one that doesn't work for me - like a previous reviewer stated, once the oil gets wet and I start to lather it up a bit, it suddenly smells like wet dog. This doesn't happen with the Supple Skin Oil, only with the shower oil. If that scent note weren't in the product, I'd happily buy this again, but since it is, I regret to say that this is one item I won't be adding to my regular rotation.

Purchased this product because I have very dry skin year round. This is very light and not greasy. Have used it as a soap and after using a shower gel. It works great either way. Really keeps me hydrated.

It smells amazing untill you actually wet and lather it on, then it smells like wet dog to me. It just stinks litterally in my oppinion and it didnt lather well at all. It does work as a regular body oil however but its a little pricey for that. Glad I didnt pay full price, I bought the $8 one but im still disapointed that it didnt lather for me or smell good wet.

Received this in the VIB gift bag a while back and ended up using this while on a vacation. I was pleasantly surprised that it went from a runny liquid to foamy in my hands. A little goes a long way. The scent is delicious and not overpowering. I will definitely purchase this.
Love the smell!! Goes Quick!!

reviews.review_title: Smells almond-y and a little like plastic
reviews.review_text: I think the title says it all. I really wanted to like it! It does give a lovely rich lather, but I can't get past the faintly plastic smell.

I only purchased this (2.5 oz size) to qualify for free shipping. But I am SO glad I did! I love the delicate scent and luxurious feel. It feels so soft and soothing, yet still cleansing. And it's so neat how it turns from oily to soapy! It's pretty moisturizing, but some days I still need a light lotion afterwards. I don't know if it's a typo, but L'Occitane's site offers this size for $0.50 more than Sephora's price. Yet another reason to love Sephora ;)
This is amazing body cleanser. It really suds up nice and smells awesome! Very moisturizing

I definitely need oil sometimes for my very dry skin. I loved how this one smells as well as how it feels. It doesn't leave me feeling greasy and it is kind of foamy. Definitely a favorite among the different kinds I have tried.
I have been using this the last couple of years for shaving as I am allergic to shaving creams. It's a close shave and leaves legs soft

I really like this product..I have very dry skin and have notice that it helps my dry skin very much making it soft to the touch. Thank you for giving me a sample to use or I would have never known I could have this soft of skin.. without the ashy look I tend to get on my leggs.

I'd hoped this would be more moisturizing than it is (I do have dry skin) but as others have aptly noted it does smell wonderful and lathers nicely. 4 stars because I still need body moisturizer after using it.

The smell is amazing! I can't explain it, but it's subtle and fabulous! Even my boyfriend loves the smell. The oil turns creamy and lathers the second it touches your skin, so no need to worry about slipping on an oily shower floor. A little goes a long way and it makes me feel so clean and refreshed! I can't say enough good things about this shower oil!

I have been using this wonderful product for about 6 years. I would not be able to take a shower without it!! It leaves my skin so soft. I am also using most of the products that contain almond oil. I would highly recommend this line to anyone who wants soft, supply skin.

I really enjoyed this cleanser. I have dry skin and the oil is nice- as my skin doesn't feel 'tight' or really dry after the shower and I don't have oily skin after use either. The scent is pretty mellow. I do get a hint of rosemary but over all more of an oil smell-very unisex to me. I have used it to shave and I don't have rave reviews it did the job just fine. All in all I probably would buy this again.

I have, perhaps, the worlds most sensitive skin when it comes to shaving. I had all but given up on ever being able to shave my underarms without some sort of irritation/inflammation disaster, and believe me, I tried it all. Homeopathic, every item available at Sephora, men's creams and funky gels and oils and serums-- everything.... Nothing worked. Then I received a free sample of this with another purchase and decided to give it a shot. I read that it could be used for shaving, figured everything else had been a wash and I might as well try it and, well... it was amazing! I can wear tank tops and swimsuits and not have to worry about horrifying locals when I reach up to fix my hair! No more painful bumps or itchy skin! I am a true believer, and love this product. I keep a little one around for traveling and a big one in the shower.  The main key is that when you use this (for shaving or otherwise) is to not be too stingy. Use enough that you get a rich, thick foamy oil and it does wonder for shaving and problem dry areas on skin. And good news! The scent is light enough that if you are sensitive to smelly lotions and oils (like me) this won't bother you at all. Anyway, try the small one and give it a shot! It's a little bit epic! :)

I absolutely love this cleansing oil and all the products in the Almond line. I love how it lathers, and the scent is wonderful. It always makes me feel so pampered. I use this as my shaving cream, and I don't even need a lotion afterwords. A small amount goes a long way, so it's worth the price!

I wanted to like this, but it didn't foam up at all for me. Plus the smell was awful... Thankfully it was a sample so I didn't feel bad throwing it out.  I did give it three stars because I think that it did hydrate my skin better than some shower gels do and definitely more than bar soaps, so if you have very dry skin this might be a good fit, if the smell and lack of lather aren't a problem with you.  To each their own :)

This has a nice subtle fragrance and is great to use for shaving my legs or as a softening bath oil. My skin feels silky after I soak in the tub with it. That being said I don't like to use it as an actual cleanser because it doesn't really lather up so I don't feel like its actually cleaning me... Which is probably weird on my part, but i like lather, therefore i knocked a star off the overall rating.

Incredible! The scent seemed strong in the bottle, and I was afraid of getting my shower oily, so I saved my sample bottle for vacation. Turns out, the fresh scent doesn't linger beyond your showering enjoyment, and it leaves no oily residue on bath surfaces or skin. The incredible part: It leaves skin so soft and hydrated, infused with almond oil but not oily to the touch! I'm sensitive to many cleansers, and have been using the same natural shower gel for 20+ years. L'Occitane is impressive enough to make me switch brands, if only I could afford to make it my daily wash. I'll have to settle for keeping it as an occasional indulgence, but I'm definitely buying the full size.

I bought this for a trip to AZ where the air is much drier than I am used to. I am so happy I did. I dont know if it hydrated my skin but the smell made me so happy that I do not care. I immediately bought some for my mother...she loves it too!

i just wish it were a bit more lathery / bubbly...i find that I need a lot more than usual in order to get some bubbles! but I love the smell and it makes me soft. The small one leaks, so if you bring it anywhere use a plastic bag!

This shower oil is very moisturizing. You can smell a light almond scent after you've showered and toweled down, but not enough to nauseate you. A little goes a long way.  Although it advertises as perfect for shaving, I'd save your dollars and buy your shaving cream at the drug store. Use the shower oil for its original intent - cleansing.

Purchased a travel size for a vacation and loved this shower oil. I was leary of using an oil and worried about it being too slippery in the shower but no issues there. It helped soothe my skin for the days when the sun and heat was too much. It has a nice light scent that is not overbearing and did not clash with my perfume. Great to use on legs prior to shaving. Got home and purchased the full size. Keeps my dry skin at bay.

Beats soap. Beats shower gel. You don't even need a 'poof'. Oil turns into a luxurious lather in your hand as you rub into your body, softening it which lasts way after your shower and smelling oh so sensual. Do not need lotion after this. Buying full size.

I've used this product for many years. I've gotten lazy a few times and tried something cheaper or easier to locate. It's not worth it. I stock up now so I don't run out. My dry skin knows immediately when I try something different. I don't like the price, but I don't like uncomfortable skin even more.

I got this as a sample. It's amazing. Love it! It's warm, moisturizing, sensual and the smell is to die for! Has the consistency of honey, then turns into a light lather. I am buying this. So luxurious!
As soon as you pour this out of the bottle you will see the difference. Instant moisture and silky feel to your skin. Truly amazing.

reviews.review_title: skin softening and great to shave with
reviews.review_text: I'm so glad I received a sample of this. I didn't know about this product before and I'm so happy to have tried it. It is very nice in the shower, and wonderful to shave with. My skin is so soft and smooth. Nice light scent. Definitely a staple for me now. Thanks Sephora!

I received a sample of this and was hesitant because I've never used any shower oil before. But after smelling it, I was in love. It makes my skin feel soo soft and it smells amazing! But the smell is not to overpowering and does not linger. Once you get out of the shower you can't really smell it anymore, but your skin will be super smooth. And it had helped with the bumps I get on the back of my arms. It is on the pricer side but I think it is worth the money because you only need a small amount.

I tried this after getting a sample. I was worried that it would overwhelm my perfume, but it doesn't at all! It is so luxurious and smells so good. Once you get out of the shower, you barely smell it, but you feel fresh. Plus, it has kept my shoulders & elbows soft in the winter and kept those annoying little bumps that pop up on the back of my arms at bay.
Awesome to shave with!!

I have used this as a shaving oil on and off for a of couple years. I don't know why I ever go back to regular shaving gel/cream. The oil moisturizes and is great on my sensitive skin. The scent is light and pleasant.

One of the few products that is my beauty staple. Absolutely love this stuff. Gives me an amazing, close shave, and leaves the skin feeling soft and moisturized with just a hint of a delicious almond smell.

I got a sunburn and usually peel, but this shower oil combined with almond oil lotion kept me from peeling. In order to get it to lather up, I add water in my hand and then wipe it onto my sea sponge. It didn't lather when I squirted it directly onto my sea sponge.

Love this stuff. Yes, it's pricey but my skin has never felt softer. It doesn't lather much, if at all but that doesn't mean it's not cleansing or moisturizing. I can see how people can burn through a bottle if they're trying to get it to foam up and lather. It is all I use to shave and since then, I no longer have a problem with ingrown hairs. Better than any shaving cream I've ever used.

I bought this product thinking that it would create a smoother shave and make my legs feel super soft and look moisturized. It did none of that. I tried for about a week and saw no differences. In fact, I was so curious about why I didn't notice a difference that, one time, I decided to use this product on one leg and just soap (what I normally use to shave) on the other leg when I shaved. My legs felt exactly the same in the shower and out of the shower. It also didnt give me a closer shave because the hair that grew back out felt the same, looked the same and was the same length on each leg. I was disappointed and returned. In my opinion, if regular soap can make my legs feel the same as this...then I will save my money. It didn't smell that great either :/ and I never got a great lather out of it no matter how much I used of the product, or how much water I used to later it up.
This product does not lather well and did not moisturize my skin like it claims. However, it did smell pretty good.
I used this product a few years ago to help with dry skin in the winter. It is truly moisturizing, unlike many body washes that claim to be.

this is such a luxurious product to use. rich thick lather, gorgeous fragrance, skin feels so silky. Wish it was a little less exensive, but I will still purchase it again when I get low. It only takes a little for a shower.

I love this oil for shaving...I have never used anything else that have gotten my legs as smooth. I do use it as a body wash in the wintertime, as it's very softening. However, in the summer, I find that I need to use something more cleansing, like a regular body wash.

I absolutely love how this shower oil smells, but I'm disappointed with its consistency and the results. It doesn't make my skin feel any different and I have yet to make a proper lather with it. It doesn't transform into a foam. I tried using more than I would usually with a shower gel, and it still barely went on. I got this as a sample size and won't be buying the full size. Very disappointed.

this is incredible stuff. I use it with a body sponge (not the net kind) and it makes tons of creamy lather and leaves skin soft. the smell is light and delicate and delicious, yeah, I'm gonna buy more!
My skin feels so smooth now!!

I have used this Almond shower oil for years and despite the price I buy it regularly . It's so soothing and moisturizing and I love the scent. The L'Occitane almond line of products are wonderful but very expensive. They are definitely a splurge for oneself .
I use it to shave my legs. It smells like sweet almond. Love it!
I received this in a sampler. It is AMAZING! Feels so good and smells great, too. Highly recommend!
I can't use lotions of any kind on my legs and this works perfectly. I use it in the shower and my legs are perfectly moisturized.

I was looking to get away from fruity and floral shower gels and this is completely different. The shower gel turns into a lather when you mix with water in your hands and you get this intoxicating scent all over. Not to mention it is an incredible shave gel. You will be smooth and smelling delicious.
Mostirizing non irritating .

not only does this product smell delicious... it leaves my skin feeling clean and soft. i use it mainly to shave my legs. it doesn't leave a greasy feeling and also doesn't leave any oily film in the bath after showering.
Helps with red bumps when shaving

Love this stuff! It hydrates and leaves skin feeling so soft. I use it as a body wash and to shave. I have very dry skin and can not say enough about the hydrating properties of this shower oil. I love it!

reviews.review_title: Nice product, but muse use so much
reviews.review_text: The product is nice, makes your skin feel moisturized, but not very clean, and you have to use so much to get a lather that it doesn't last very long.
Feels great, smells fabulous! Wish it moisturized a little more, but great overall. Makes for a luxurious shower experience.

I'm about half way through my bottle and so far I love it. The scent is nice, and doesn't linger too much once you get out of the shower. I don't notice the wet dog smell that everyone else seems to be commenting on - it just smells like almonds to me. My skin is staying a lot more hydrated/soft since I've switched to this from the bath and body works shower gels. Just wish it wasn't as expensive.

I really like this product; I got it as a sample and was unsure how to use it and was concerned that it would make me break out on my body since it's an oil and I can't use very oily things. I really like the scent, it is a soft, sweet almond smell and I personally like it. If you've never tried the product before, you may want to go in-store and smell it before you buy it just to make sure you like it first. I have used it after exfoliating scrubs in the shower to add a layer of silky moisture, but I find that it works best for shaving; it does not leave me with itchy razor bumps, nor is it too oily. It provides the perfect amount of oil so that I can shave and it makes my skin super soft. Thumbs up from me - I'll be going to my local store to buy some!
I love how good this smells. It is not overwhelming or strong. It is a light scent and luxurious.

I bought this because I read in a magazine that it is good for shaving and would leave my skin soft. Not true. Crazy expensive, I can get something cheaper that works better at my local supermarket. I think the worst part is the smell. Almost a wet dog smell that lingers after you're out of the shower. Don't waste your money

reviews.review_title: Like it, not sure I love it
reviews.review_text: Lately, I've started to take baths more frequently to help with muscle aches. I was using a bubble bath, but my skin was definitely getting drier and drier, so I bought this with the hopes of restoring some moisture. It's worked for me, it's helped my skin get softer. I put a little in the bath as the water's running, and it definitely foams, just not quite as much as a bubble bath would. I use it in the shower too, but not with as much regularity. I don't think I'll repurchase this, though. I don't really like the smell (sweet and almond-y), and the smell does stay on my skin for a while. I'll be looking out for a similar product with a different scent.
Made my skin itch & it smelled like a household cleaner.
Nice luxurious shower oil which moisturizes, but I don't think it cleans thoroughly and a separate scrub is needed more frequently.

I have horribly sensitive skin, can't use anything with fragrance on my body or scalp and have to douse myself with lotion frequently. I love this oil, it doesn't make me itchy or breakout and keeps me moisturized even though it's light- not greasy!
It is simply the best. My BFF used to work for them in Marketing, and put me on to this elixir. I've been a faithful customer ever since. Buy it, use it, love it.
Love this product. Smells great and a little goes a long way.
I haven't used anything else to shave with since I found this product. Great on sensitive skin.

i have extremely dry skin, especially in the winter and was hoping switching my shower gel to a shower oil would help. unfortunately, i was not impressed with this product. it feels nice, rich, and luxurious when you use it in the shower. but once you're out of the shower, the moisture kind of disappears. i think this may work really nicely for people with normal skin, but seriously dry skin i'd say look elsewhere. for me it was a bit of a waste of money, i will use it up til i've finished it (which won't take long at all, i've had it for about a full week and i'm already 1/4 finished with it) but won't be repurchasing. instead i think i will look toward a dry oil.
i love it! this is a must in my beauty routine.year long.soothing,hydrating,the lovely scent.
I love this scent! Foamy enough, hydraulic, leaves my scintilla smooth. Will purchase again
Smells great, cleans well with a nice lather, and leaves skiing smooth...what more could you ask for?!
This product make taking a bath wonderful because it is soothing to the skin and after the bath your skin feels wonderful and look great
totally awesome. super hydrating. smells so noms!
this product made my skin smooth, I could shave with it, I didn't itch or have to apply more lotion after the shower; I would buy again.

I only used this shower oil once and never used it ever again! It smells absolutely horrible!! And it doesn't lather/foam much at all! I probably got like two bubbles when I used it! So I ended up bringing it to the gym and just left it in the shower for someone else to use. What a waste of money!
Makes my legs smooth

I really like the smell, though it does seem quite sweet. It does a good job of restoring some of the moisture lost in my hot winter showers. Coverage is best when using a shower pouf or wash cloth - you use less this way. I was surprised at how well it foamed up-being an oil and all. The only star deduction is for price - I realize it's a brand name, but you don't get very much for what you pay.
Non drying leaves skin soft .
I love how this makes my skin feel, soft, silky. Lathers well. My only complain is that for some reason, it has a slight wet dog smell to it once you start washing a bit that I can't get past.
I LOVE this. Not only does it have a nice lather in the shower, it is the BEST for shaving.

This is the most luxurious cleansing treat for a shower! It seems counter-intuitive to cleanse with an oil, but this product turns to a milky foam when combined with water. I poor about a 1/2 teaspoon into my loofah, wet it and rub the sponge together in my hands before washing. The foam, the smell, everything is delicious! It rinses clean and doesn't leave any residue behind.. Just super-soft skin. I like using the Milk Concentrate as a moisturizer afterward to stay soft all day and layer the yummy scent. It's wonderful!

Smells so good! And it cleans while leaving skin moisturized. The oil turns into a light foam when it contacts water. This cleans your skin without drying it out, preserving the hyperbaric barrier.  Absolutely love it!
Love the non greasy feeling, soft and smooth. Wasn't sure what to expect, I use it with a loofa sponge. Nice soft smell. Will buy the refill when this is empty.
I loved this shower oil. It cleansed and moisturized, while being natural and smelling great. I left it in the gym shower and I am still bummed!
I used this for shaving...it's awesome and smells great. Plus, I love that it isn't full of chemicals.

This is the absolute best shower oil. It cleanses nicely but at the same time leaves skin feeling amazingly soft. Smells really good. I liked the scent so much I bought the lotion in the same scent so I could wear it layered. Love this stuff, worth every penny of the price.
i did not care for the smell and it was not as moisturizing as i expected

I love the smell of almond oil and this body wash is wonderful. Its not an overpowering scent but feminine and light. It is just the right amount of moisturizing so when I step out of the shower my skin isnt parched.
It's been tough here in NJ this winter. But with this in the shower, I feel like I'm at a spa vacation.

Nice shower oil: not greasy, pleasent smell. My only gripe is you have to use a lot of it, especial if you are using it to shave in the shower. I only had my bottle for 2 weeks and it's more than half gone.

Winter is really harsh on my skin, so I need something to help retain some moisture...this more than fits the bill. I've seen major improvements to my skin since I started using this oil. It going on sooo smoothly!!! It's a little formy too. After I rinse off my skin feels amazingly smooth and soft, not to mention it smell so good!!! A win/win!!!

reviews.review_title: One of the best bath products out there
reviews.review_text: Moisturizing, luxurious and beautifully scented. Works great for cleansing and shaving. It's the only shower product I've found that leaves my skin soft, supple and soothed without feeling overly-oily.
I first learned about this from a beauty advisor at a store and have purchased it when I run out. Very hydrating and smells amazing!!!

reviews.review_title: one of my favorite for my dry skin
reviews.review_text: Oh my God, this product is now my favorite!!! LOVE IT. Not only the smell is incredible and perfect but it makes my skin softer. I use it as soap and for shaving. Got it first as a sample and I immediately fell in love with it. And you only need a little bit. You must buy this product! Im gonna try the rest of Occitane family :)

I have very dry skin & always look for a body wash that does not dry my skin out even more. This is perfect! It does not leave your skin feeling greasy, just clean and feeling moisturized. Definitely recommend this product. I just wish it came in a bigger bottle!

I first received a sample of this in one of my Sephora orders. It was small and i was'nt sure how a shower oil really worked, but after reading some really great reviews I decided to try it.  For me this is an awesome product, I have super dry skin on my arms and living in Florida with some water quality issues my skin only got worse. After one use I was in love. My skin felt super soft and smooth and I love the smell. It's a really nice light scent.  I was so excited with the results I got from the shower gel, I tried the oil too. If you've got dry skin, this is a must have. It works wonders and again smells awesome.
Definitely doesn't dry out your skin like most body cleansers. Smells great and a little goes a long way!!

I would give this 5 stars for moisturizing and 1 star for the scent. At first I liked the scent but it quickly becomes too much. As much as I liked how it feels I had to give away to someone who doesn't mind the scent as much as I do.

As much as I enjoy the other benefits of L'Occitane Cleansing & Soothing Shower Gel, one of the main reasons it appeals to me the the fragrance. Hard to describe ... sort of like oatmeal on a cold day, or fresh hay in the barn, or perhaps a mix of grains and grasses that promote wellness and good, earthy sense. The shampoo has just the right amount of foaming action, but is not foamy like some cheap products. It feels great all over the body, and rinses clean. The dispenser size is a good value, but the refill is a great value! It comes in a larger pour container, and fills the daily shampoo container as needed, helping reduce the overall cost. (Now, how many products can say that?) Quality, great fragrance that is absolutely not perfumed, and long-lasting cleaning and refreshing power -- whether for a morning shower or an after-workout clean-up. Here it is, and I for one am glad! You will be, too.
This is the answer to my prayers to soothe dry itchy winter skin. It has a nice light scent. Leaves skin feeling so soft. I only wish it lathered just a little more. But very happy otherwise.
Love this shower oil!!! My skin feels so soft and smells so good!!!!

reviews.review_title: Forget shower gels-THIS IS THE BEST!
reviews.review_text: I tried a sample and fell in love. I then purchased a bottle that will last a long time, as you need to use very little This smells wonderful, foams up nicely and leaves my skin moisturized--NOT OILY!
This shower oil has the best aroma and does a great job leaving skin soft.
I have only been using this product for two weeks and its already one of my favorites. I love the scent and its great for shaving sensitive skin.

Yes, it is more expensive than some other brands, but I find it is worth it in the long run because it does Not have triclosan, dyes or parabens. My skin is sensitive and can even be oily in certain areas but this shower oil is moisturizing, cleansing and leaves my skin supple, soft, baby skin...does not break my skin out, does not make me oilier...I think this has given me that look of an inner glow under my skin that I haven't had since I was in my late teens, early twenties. Don't fear it because it says oil. Your skin will say, thank you, after the first use and you will love the way your skin feels. Love it!
Dry itchy allergic skin no more ! Great scent and soothing.

I first received a sample and loved it, which prompted me to buy the 8 oz size. Now that's almost gone and I just ordered the 16 oz refill. It's wonderful! We are having unusually cold weather here in the desert and thus, dealing with much more indoor heat than normal, which was making my skin dry and itchy. This is helping to save it. It definitely does foam if used with a pouf. Not crazy mountains of foam, but enough to still give you the clean feeling that lather gives. Smells delicious too!

I got this as a sample and feel in love. It's perfect for a shower or long hot bath. It makes your skin feel silky doesn't dry you out at all. The only thing I will say is at first I loved the smell but now after using it everyday not so much but it's still a wonderfully treat to take a shower.

Got this as a sample & had to order. It's smooth, silky and I love the scent. Not flowery or fruity, yet a little sweet and alluring. Only reason I didn't give 5 stars is that I wish it was a little more moisturizing. It's not really oil but isn't real sudsy. I love it though.
I enjoy bathing with this shower oil because my skin shows an improvement in tone as well as I like its cleansing and hydrating ability.
This oil is amazing! I was a little worried about it being too slick, but it was perfect! I love the subtle scent, and my skin is soft for hours!

I got this as a sample and loved it enough to buy the full-sized bottle. In the winter, many soaps and body washes make my skin feel dry, tight, and itchy. But this shower oil leaves my skin feeling both clean and perfectly balanced. It leaves a thin veil of moisture and a nice, light fragrance on my skin. The best part is that it does not leave my shower slick like other bath oils can. Love the light almond scent. Can't rave about this product enough!

This stuff is not really foamy like it says in the description, but to me that doesn't really matter b/c the product performs so well! It smells great, doesn't leave you really oily, feels good going on & is amazing for shaving your legs!! It leaves your legs so soft, helps your razor glide smoothly & prevents bumps. This is my go-to for shaving now, I love it!
It smells great and leaves your skin smooth, not oily at all. Great for winter time. Definitely buying again.

i bought this based on a recommendation and i used it for shaving and a shower gel but i wasnt overly impressed with using it for either. i would rather buy a better shower oil or shaving cream separately

I adore this shower oil. It has a light scent and makes my skin so soft. I tried a trick where I only put it on one arm and my husband could clearly tell a difference. A little pricey, but so worth it!

reviews.review_title: Smells great and does make skin smooth
reviews.review_text: This wash does make my skin soft and it smells lovely. I didn't find it foamy like its desription. I will keep using the wash in the winter to stave dry skin. Its likely I will go back to using Fresh lemon sugar body wash in the summer. I didn't try using it for shaving yet. I gave it 3 stars because its OK, didn't WOW me for the price.

reviews.review_title: Love! So much better than regular body wash
reviews.review_text: I tried this as a sample and absolutely loved it. But I have to explain, because normally I don't care one way or the other about body wash. I did a ton of cooking (and dishes) on the weekend of Christmas and an entire week later my hands were still awful - dry, flaky, itchy, raw. I had been layering lotion all week and it wasn't even helping. I used this in the shower (now a week later) and the next morning my hands were totally silky and soft. I couldn't believe it! I ordered right away. Doesn't lather very much and does smell a little like oil, but neither of these things bothered me, especially with the results! Might not be necessary in the warmer months, but a must-have in the winter. Worth the extra $$
This is great to pamper yourself in the shower with. It lathers nicely and glides on softly. The scent is delicate and very soothing. I don't find it too moisturizing though.

Lovely scent (though light) and a very unique texture. I love the oil to foam formula. (It's more of a light mousse foam rather than a bubbly foam.) I think this is decadent and I quite like it, but a little does NOT go a long way. For the price, I think that it doesn't last long enough. Additionally, I am disappointed by its lack of moisturizing power this winter. While it doesn't leave my skin feeling tight or squeaky right away when I get out of the shower, I feel the itchy tightness a few hours later. I expected it to be a bit more moisturizing since it wasn't so foamy. Four stars because I would love to receive it as a gift some time and would certainly use it, but I don't feel it's a good bang for your buck type of product.
I do like this body wash! I love the smell and as others mentioned it is great to shave legs with. I gave it only 4 stars because you do need to use quite a bit to get a nice lather.

I LOVE the smell of this! The smell stays with your skin after you rinse and dry off. The description says this oil foams, but i dont find this to be true. Thats the only reason i gave this 4/5 stars. I wish it would suds and foam a little more, I like to use this for shaving my legs.

I was looking for a hydrating shower gel and I have found the perfect one with this! It is hydrating, cleansing and smells divine. You don't need much and it first takes some getting use to as it starts as an oil and then foams to a cleanser. I would highly recemmend this product and will definitelty be re-ordering this. A ABSOLUTE must for your shower!!

reviews.review_title: The Best A Woman Can Have
reviews.review_text: I have had many shower gels, oils, scrubs, whatever it is I have bought it. This product makes you feel like a sensual woman. It cleanses but leaves an oil and scent to your skin that makes you want to keep smelling yourself. I love it and I use nothing else now. I recommend to any woman that loves to pamper herself...cause come on..we are ALL worth it.

I never normally write reviews but thought I must let people know that this is a wonderful product. I'm normally not very fussy when it comes to products and am normally a walmart deal finder but after getting a free sample of this a while back I decided I needed to splurge and buy this. With two little ones ages 2 and 8 bath time is the only time I have for my self and with this product I feel like a princess every time I jump into the shower. The smell is wonderful and it lathers and cleanses wonderfully. I'm of mixed ancestry African American and Caucasian and my skin tends to get very dry in the winter but this product leaves me skin feeling silky, smooth, and hydrated.

Marzipan meets vanilla is how I would describe the smell. It's so addictive to me. I got a sample from L'occitane a while back and I decided to purchase a full sized product from Sephora. I love how soft my skin is for at least 6 hours in the winter after I shower with this (for my skin, this is a LONG time) and how the scent lingers all day at work. It doesn't lather like regular shower gels, since it's a shower oil, so don't be alarmed. I just pour a little in my hand instead of on a pouf. I still have some of the massage oil sample and I would also recommend that if, like me, you need a lot more oil for your skin in the winter. It smells amazing like the shower oil, and it helps extend the moisturizing quality of the product.
I like the moisturizing aspect, but it does not bubble up and the fragrance is not great
This is truly a moisturizing body cleanser. It's not too oily and it leaves your skin very smooth and soft.
Goes on like an oil but develops a lather. Wonderful for shaving as well! Leaves skin moisturized and with light scent. Feels like a daily indulgence
Very nice oil that doesn't leave any residue. I use it to shave my legs and really helps with the dry irritated skin that winter brings. Everything from this line is really worth it.
What a great shower oil! Smells so yummy and it's nice and thick.

First off I'm partial to this brand for many reasons. It's a little peace of heaven for your skin. If you get dry and itchy like I do in the winter months this will solve your problem. It's got a nice light scent and a little goes a long way. Your skin will thank you for it...enjoy!
smells wonderful, does't dry out your skin, and it cleans well!

I really like this cleansing oil. It took a little while for me to get use to the low lather. When I put it on my puff, it didn't foam up like my usual body wash. My skin is left incredibly soft and lightly scented. Love it!

I received this in a sample size & i never ever have used a shower oil before. This L'Occitane product blew me away. I just looked it up on Sephora's site and I wasn't surprised to find out it was out of stock. This shower oil is pretty amazing especially in the winter months.It lathers, smells incrediable and my skin was buttery soft when i got out of the shower. I definately would buy this product. Oh, also a huge plus is it did not leave my shower slippery or with an oily film like many of those oil & sea salt scrubs do. Awesome product!

reviews.review_title: Great for winter skin, except for the smell
reviews.review_text: I love almond anything and have even used straight almond oil on my feet and hands in the winter. This product has a strong, medicine-like odor that I do not find pleasing, and it lingers in the bathroom. However, it makes my skin feel great and a lot less itchy in the winter air, which is the most important. I don't think I would use it much in warmer months. I also wish there would be a little more lather.
I love the smell of this product!

I like the idea of a shower oil, this product is very nicely scented although I feel it's a little light and wish it was a little stonger. I love how this warms up on contact with your skin, it gives a very theraputic feeling. It doesn't foam up as much as I would prefer but it's an oil so I don't expect it to get very foamy. I like using it as a shaving oil, in the winter after shaving my legs feel a little itchy and dry (even though I moistuize regularly), but that doesn't happen when using this oil as my shaving 'cream'. I feel like this product wont be neccessary for me in the summer months, but a nice treat for me to buy myself for the winter.

I got this in my last order as a sample and I LOVE it. I am about to buy a full bottle bc it smells so nice and it gives your body a great feel. I like to use it after shaving my legs it makes them really smooth feeling.
Love this so soothing you really feel you are pampering your skin and the scent is intoxicating. I recevied this as a sample but, immediately purchased the full size!

I got this as a sample and was hoping this would replace my having to put baby oil on after I shower. But my skin doesn't feel any more or less moisturized then when I use my drug store brand soap. I won't be purchasing a full size of this and will continue using baby oil before I get out of the shower.
I can't say enough about this. It's expensive, but it is so lush--wonderful for shaving legs, esp. (and I'm a die-hard soap fan)--smells great, and a little goes a long way. I'm definitely a convert.
Omg ladies & gents, this product is EVERYTHING! You will be obsessed. It leaves your skin hydrated and it smells divine!!! Can't get enough!

Wonderful to use followed by the almond oil all over the body. Foams nicely, hydrating, smells wonderful but not too strong. I have even used it in the bath (a capful) and my skin was smooth and kept that almond scent all night :)

I received a deluxe sample of this and will be buying the full size as soon as I am out. I love this stuff! I work in a Dermatology office and this stuff is great for itchy, dry winter skin! Very impressed!

I received this as a deluxe sample in the In The Glow bonus gift a couple weeks ago. I cannot say enough about it. The scent is really subtle yet delicious. At first I didn't think it lathered well, but I tried it with my shower puff and it made all the difference. It cleanses really well and makes your skin baby soft. I will definitely be purchasing the full size version once I run out. Also, a little goes a long way, so even though it is pricey it will last a long time! Highly recommend!!

I bought this after reading a review. I was a little worried because it's called oil and I thought it might be greasy. But it's wonderful. It smells good and leaves me silky smooth, especially my legs. I love to lather up.

reviews.review_title: Love this for a luxurious shower experience
reviews.review_text: I just started using this and it is already cold weather season where I live. I mention this because my overwhelming reaction was that this has a warmth to it that makes me forget how drafty my old bathroom is! The aroma is subtle but incredibly calming and delicious. I imagine that I will love this in the Summer months also.

I wasn't really sure what to expect from this product but my skin gets incredibly dry in the winter so I thought a shower oil would help more than a shower gel. As far as moisture goes it's pretty average, and I must have gotten a dud because I got no suds. The smell is super sweet; almost too sweet. It rinses off nicely- no residue.  This shower oil was just okay- it didn't wow me so it's not worth the price in my opinion.

I got a sample of this stuff and I really liked it. However, I'm not sure it's worth $24...I have super dry skin so I loved that this was a moisturizing oil but still foamed like a shower gel. This makes my skin feel so soft especially in winter. A little pricey but worth the feeling of softness in winter,
This is my second purchase. I probably won't buy it again because of the price for the size of the product. You don't need a lot and it lathers and feels nice.
Smells amazing leave skin feeling smooth And clean. Love this

reviews.review_title: Dry skin releif in the shower ends itchiness!
reviews.review_text: Received this as a sample a week ago and found my go-to body wash. I have dry skin and aversion to applying moisturizers so this emollient wash is a godsend. A warm (not hot) shower using this golden fluid eliminates the need for extra lotions and potions and keeps me itch free all day.  I only wish it came in a large pump bottle so I wouldn't waste so much.

I like to use this shower oil as a replacement for my shaving gels. It helps sooth my skin as I shave and leaves my legs soft to the touch. I usually apply a bit of this in the palm of my hand and rub it into my skin, because this oil quickly sinks into the skin I add a bit of water (palm size) and it creates a nice rich lather on top of my skin. I really love the outcome. My skin is very sensitive and it hasn't broken out with this product. I am not a fan of the scent so I wouldn't use this as my everyday body wash.

I thought this would be more moisturizing. It felt like any benefits from the oil were washed away with the cleansing properties. I was hoping this could replace using lotion after the shower, but my skin was still very dry, as if I had used regular soap. This is a great gentle body cleanser, though.

I usually really love almond scented ANYTHING but something about this smells off to me. It reminded me of the smell of hair dye. I also wasn't particularly impressed with how it left my skin feeling, as it felt like I used nothing.

I absolutely love this shower oil. I have extremely dry skin (eczema), so I was extremely skeptical about the hydrating powers of this product, but I was blown away by how great it made my skin feel after I used it! It comes out as an oil, as the name states, but it becomes a great-smelling foam when you put it on your wet skin. The smell is not overpowering and is actually unisex. Once you're finished using it, your skin is so smooth and soft. One thing from the description that I sort of disagree with is the suggestion that you can use the gel for shaving. I guess if you're out of your regular shaving cream, you could use it, but I would not suggest it, especially since it's rather pricey. For cleansing and hydrating, however, this stuff is perfect! Go out and buy this!

I've tried all kinds of body washes and I usually have soft skin but it can be a little tight and itchy after my shower. My skin isn't prone to outbreaks or anything crazy but I can have reactions especially in some 'sensitive' areas from certain perfumes or dyes which this has none of. It starts as an oil but it won't be slippery or make your tub an oil slick.  The only negative could ever come up with is I would like it to have a pump top (the bigger version does) because it's hard to close if you have a handful of oil or pouf.  I LOOOOVE this shower oil. It foams up beautifully, smells incredible, washes away cleanly without any residue. It is expensive but a little goes a long way. My bf commented about the softness and 'touchability' of my skin. He likes the smell so much I've caught him using it too! It's perfect to shave with too, it doesn't lather to much to gunk up your razor but it glides so smoothly. I would recommend this to ANYONE!!

I received this as a sample, and after using it twice I decided I can't go without it now so I ordered the full size bottle today. I am addicted to the smell and using it in the shower just makes me feel awesome. It feels so nice! You won't be disappointed.  I am gonna try it for shaving as suggested too next time. :)

I got this as a free sample with an order, and after using it once I had to go buy the full size. It's smells great and moisturizes my skin beautifully. It's not greasy at all and rinses clean. I've been using it for a week and a half and my skin feels and looks better already.  All you do is put a nickle to quarter amount in your palm and massage it into your skin. No shower puff needed. It has the faintest amount of lather, just enough to get your skin clean without stripping it. I highly recommend this product.

This is hands down my favorite body wash!!! It smells AMAZING!! My husband even likes using it!! It leaves your skin feeling velvet soft, without being too greasy!! The scent lasts on your skin throughout the day too!!

reviews.review_title: Softest my skin has been in years
reviews.review_text: I'll be very honest; at first, I was disappointed with this product. I'm giving it five stars though because, once I learned how to use it, I was amazed at the results and found that none of my initial problems with it were long-term. Here's my (very thorough) take:  I bought this because I wanted something more moisturizing. I started using this in Shanghai in the middle of the summer. Shanghai's summers are INSANELY humid and hot. Switching from soap to oil is not a bad idea in and of itself, but switching from soap to oil in the middle of the summer is a terrible idea. On especially hot days, the fact that I was showering with oil meant that I was smelling like fried food. This was disappointing too because the product truly does have a pleasant smell. It's true; it smells like an almond cookie.  *However,* the fried-food smell went away before too long, and I think it's because I started using the product differently. Here's how I've used it and found a lot of success:  Massage onto skin with your bare hands. (This will mean you'll go through the bottle faster; I think a bottle lasts me about three months.) Then, use a cloth or a bath puff to build up the lather and to exfoliate. This is VERY IMPORTANT because, when you switch from soap, your skin will still be used to the drying effects of the soap and will be producing a lot of oil for a while, to which you will now be adding even more. If you are not careful to exfoliate once you stop using soap, you will probably have a few weeks of breakouts. Just a warning, but this doesn't HAVE to be a problem if you exfoliate. Getting away from soap seems to be better in the long run though, since soap is so stripping, and stripping is aging. Just remember that; it's worth figuring out how to use this and getting through any adjustment period.  The lather with this product is really minimal, so if you apply it directly to a bath accessory rather than your body, you aren't necessarily going to get clean; you need to make sure the product gets on your skin. For best effects, apply to your skin as you stand away from the spray in the shower; otherwise, it will rinse off immediately, you will waste a lot of it, and, again, you won't get clean.  After you rubbed it on and scrubbed with a sponge or a bath puff or whatever it is that you use, *then* rinse it off.  People debate about the smell. I have a super-sensitive nose, but, yes, I do smell the almond oil on myself after getting out of the shower (others might not). The fragrance barely lasts though, so if you want to emanate a fragrance, use perfume.  You won't be greasy at ALL, but you will be amazingly moisturized. In fact, on a lot of days, I don't even have to put lotion on my legs after shaving. I'd prefer a product with more of a fragrance too, but nothing I've tried beats the moisturizing effects of this. It's awesome to be so soft without having to use any lotion (saves money and time!).  I will keep using it. However, if, next summer, I find that I'm smelling like fried food again (even after learning how to use it properly), then I'll save this as a winter-only product.  Hope that helps!
This shower oil is so amazing that I might be showering a little too often just so I can use it! This is my new favourite product, and I'm not surprised that it's sold out.
Awesome smell. Love this product. It is moisturizing without being greasy.
This cleaning oil washed right off. I was hoping for a nice smooth slightly oily finish. Not at all. It felt oily, went on as oil. Then it kind of got soapy and rinsed off. Aroma and all.
This bottle will last a year, you only need a very small amount to lather and you'll smell delicious afterwards too !  The price on this one is great . Get it before it goes up.
This is a great product! Very moisturizing

usually after reading rave reviews products seem to fall a bit short for me. And i am not a huge fan of almond smells but thought even if it hydrated a little bit i could stand it. I actually figured it wld leave a oiliness to my skin like some oil body scrubs do. But i was wrong, and boy am i glad!! First off the smell isn't like almond paste, it was fresh and light... but lingering! Second, it felt great as it melted into my skin and spread nicely when used with my body clarisonic brush. I toweled off and it wasn't oily but after i put my usual body oil on... WOW! it's been 4 house and my skin is luminous! and my always dry hands and cuticles... soft and smooth! Worth every PENNY!!!!
Smells good leaves your skin supple and soft and clean
this product doesnt foam much, but smells really good and leaves skin very soft. I use it when I want to shave my legs!
I usually get the oil for use after the shower, but I thought I would try to cleansing oil. The smell is FANTASTIC and it leaves my dry skin very soft. When your husband notices, something is right!

Great almond smell, but doesn't last, so it won't ruin your perfume. So moisturizing, and the best thing ever to shave your legs with. You only need a tiny bit, so it lasts for a long time. Well worth the money!
I love this cleanser. It leaves my skin silky smooth. It smells of almond and is wonderful to shave with. I am on my 7th bottle and just adore this product.
I sometimes get patches of dry skin, and this makes my skin feel nice and moist. Will continue to buy.

It smells pretty , leave skin soft, but is just not spectacular, Yve Rocher makes a better product with its Amande' line of bath products for not even half the cost. I got this because I love almond products, but its just not that amazing.

I originally purchased this shower oil in the travel size, but bought the regular size when that was used up. I like that it completely dissolves deodorant and makes shaving smoother. It does soothe dry skin and leave it very soft and comfortable. What I don't like is that it doesn't smell at all like almonds to me (it's not a bad smell, it's just not of almonds), and it's very expensive. A little bit goes a long way, but still...$24 is a bit steep for 8.5oz.This is a good product but I will probably try for something cheaper & with a scent I like better next time.

reviews.review_title: Best shower oil on the planet!
reviews.review_text: Everything about this product is amazing except the price. It smells great, works great for moisturizing, does not irritate my skin, great for shaving, and the list goes on....

I just turned 40 and have started paying a lot more attention to my skin so wanted to find something that is easy to use to add more moisture to my skin. This stuff is awesome! I love the way it feels, it feels kind of like an oil but then when you rub it in with water it lathers. And it smells so good too, I get migraines so I'm really sensitive to strong smells but this is nice and light and smells very natural. I plan on using this forever, I'm so glad I found it! I use the same brand of oil after my shower and my skin is so soft now.
L'Occitane found away to transform my dry skin into touchable silkiness . Thanks, L'Occitane !!!

My skin get so dry in the winter it is a battle to keep it moisturized. This past winter I got a travel size to try after hearing wonderful things about this product. One shower was all it took! You can almost go without any lotion after the shower it is so soothing and luxurious. I can't tolerate the strong smelling washes and this one is barely there; easy on your nose.

This is the ultimate multi-tasker. It is amazing as a body wash -- it starts out as a silky oil, but builds into a rich lather that leaves my skin so soft. I've used a few drops in the bath for a luxurious soak, and love that it moisturizes without leaving an oily residue on my skin. But the very best use is for shaving. I've been using this to shave for years, and it is perfection -- no irritation, no nicks, it doesn't dry out my skin like other shaving creams/gels, and a little goes a long way. Plus, the light scent is fantastic. Couldn't ask for more!

I am extremely sensitive to fragrances and typically always choose unscented products but this was a gift so I gave it a shot. I'm glad I did. This fragrance is amazing! It is soft, slightly sweet, and ultra luxurious. I always feel like I'm treating myself to something wonderful.  The consistency is very similar to olive oil but it thickens to a creamy texture when you rub it into your skin. It feels great. I have sensitive skin and this doesn't strip my skin like most other cleansers.  An additional benefit...I had surgery about a year ago which left me with a large and exceptionally sensitive scar (aka I can't rub it or even have strong water pressure on it). I wear a lot of sunscreen which can lead to build up that is quite difficult to clean off without scrubbing/ rubbing. This cleanser is perfect for this!! I put quite a bit on my scar as soon as I hop in the shower. I leave it on while I wash my hair and the rest of my body. I put my water pressure on low and gently aim the water at my scar. The cleansing oil immediately comes off and takes all residue/ dirt with it. It's gentle and wonderful. This is literally the only product that cleans my scar so effectively and gently. I cannot recommend this enough.

It doesnt smell like almonds. But it has a very plesant scent. it does have a great foam to it once you figure out how...It is NOT greasy AT ALL. Great size and price...it's very moisterizing...i will buy this product again

I have been using this for about a year . My skin has become more radiate and better feeling. I love how you can improve your skin in the shower. I recommend this to everyone whose skin could use a jolt!
Only oil I have ever used in shower. Makes my skin feel very soft.
Made my skin a little softer. I have very sensitive skin. I had no problems, it didn't dry me out and the smell is great. Lathers well.

Delightful fragrance.. more than almond, is that a bit of citrus, coconut ? The frangrance is delightfully complex. Coats the skin with protection. I don't see any foam to speak of -- but I don't care about that. It's a keeper.

reviews.review_title: Not what I expected, but still is amazing!
reviews.review_text: This body cleanser is not what I expected. It isn't thick, it's very thin and runny. When you start to rub it on your body it becomes thicker feeling and it smells very good! It almost feels warm as you rub it into your skin. It is very moisturizing and is a great cleanser to use when shaving! I think that L'Occitane products work amazing and are well worth the money.

I absolutely love this product. The smell is amazing. I love the way my skin feels while using it. So smooth and the smell lasts for hours. There is no better cleanser/moisturizer than this. L'Occitane makes fabulous products. Love them all!!
This product smelled amazing and foamed up to a nice, moisturizing lather.
This is the best thing I have ever found for dry skin. I have had to limit my showers due to excessively dry skin. Not any more! Smells great and feels wonderful!

An awesome shower oil! I won't use it for shaving since it is a bit pricey, but it leaves my skin quite smooth even without a moisturizer. It's very easy on the skin as it's all natural, and that can really help on the dry days with my psoriasis. Paired with the milk concentrate, these make a formidable duo for absolutely amazing skin. Personally, I love the smell as well, although some don't. I'm giving this 5/5 because it's cheaper than the lotion, and it a tiny amount goes a long way with this one.
I was really looking forward to trying this; however, mine smelled kind of plastic-y ...I was really looking forward to the almond smell!
the cleanser is foamy and has a nice smell, great for shaving your legs. I only gave 4 stars because it is pricey

I love this. The warm, not super sweet almond smell, the richness it forms when it hits wet skin, and the fact that a little goes a long way. I use it when I'm shaving my legs and it is moisturizing and delightful. No irritation, no nicks and totally worth it.
This shower oil smells wonderful. It lathers in to a creamy lather that leaves skin feeling smooth and moisturized, not oily.
I really like it. It is very soft and gentle and soothing
Dont particularly like the scent, but the product is great for dry skin!

I use this product for shaving and have been really satisfied with it. I find that I get fewer cuts/burns with this product. A little bit of it goes a long way. The only thing I dislike about it is the scent. I cannot really describe it, but I do not like it. I prefer fruity or floral scents.
Ideal for shaving less irritation. This product smells great very moisturizing. Doesnt leave any undesirable oily like . residue
While I did not find the product foamy it does leave skin super soft and scented

I use this for cleansing and my skin has never felt soft; the softness lasts all day. I've not noticed a change in the scent as some users have mentioned and still find it pleasant. The foaming claim is a bit misleading because it barely works up a lather so you have to use a lot for a full-body cleanse. I mix it with a bit of unscented body wash and find this to be a much better experience.

reviews.review_title: Doesn't get any better than this!
reviews.review_text: Tried a sample and decided I need to have more. So purchased massive amounts (mega size bottles not from Sephora) Love this stuff for shaving...works great with L'Occitane Almond Paste Scrub. I hope when I run out, Sephora will have the super size in stock.

I received a sample of this at store location. I usually don't use anything to shave - just water and shower gel or soap - but I gave this a try. The next day I went back and bought a bottle. It has that wonderful L'Occitane almond scent and gets thick and almost foamy when you smooth it over your legs in the shower. I got a close shave and soft, nice smelling skin.
leaves my skin so soft
I love this product. It smells divine, and the ingredients are pure as can be. Very moisturizing and luxurious!

The shower oil is so luxurious. It smells amazing, like almonds, honey, milk and vanilla. The oil is great for shaving legs - normal shave creams leave my legs itchy and dry - and your skin smells great all day.

It doesn't get any better than this product! I have spent more money than I like trying to find an amazing product that delivers on it's cliams. Well, Im so happy to know I've finally found it. Nothing else compares. Every shower feels like a luxury with this on hand. My skin is so clean, moisturized, soft and supple Thank you, L'Occitane!.

I can't say That this product is horrible. What I will say is I will not be purchasing this item again. The smell is a little off putting after a while. Kind of like medicine. On the plus side my skin is no where as dry of flaky as it would be around this time. I'm not sure if it's because of this product or the fact that I moisturize with grape seed oil/vitamin e oil. Anyway I'm happy for small miracles.

This is an excellent travel size and nice for gift giving. It is soothing, has a gentle almond scent, and leaves no greasy after feeling.

I was expecting it to foam a little better, and be a bit more moisturizing. I still need to add some lotion to fix my dry/itchy body skin. Also, I do not particularly find the product scent that heavenly. It is a pleasant smell though.
A lovely shower oil. Not too smelly and really moisturizes, especially in winter.
This is by far super to use - leaves your skin beautifully soft. I highly recommend. Would love if was sold in a 16oz as this is a must have.
leaves your skin super soft, great to shave with, and smells great!

This stuff SAVES my skin in the winter. It smells delicious and calming. Pricey, but I can't live without it. Before this product came into my life, my skin would itch constantly. It was miserable. I still need to use lotion after my shower, but that's okay. I highly HIGHLY recommend this is your skin is dry like mine. Also, it does not leave a film in your tub, the oil turns to a milky-ish texture once wet, so it does not become slippery

reviews.review_title: L'Occitane Shower Oil with Almond Oil

i love this shower oil.. it leaves my skin so smooth.. I use it for shaving also..

reviews.review_title: A little does not go a long way
reviews.review_text: I really, really like this shower oil, and the smell is nice and mild, but I wish I didn't have to use so much in one shower. I'm trying to conserve it because I really like it, but a quarter-size on a loofah just doesn't go as far as I'd like it to (or as far as I'm used to other shower gels going). Despite this issue, I need to check the price on the full-size one, because I will definitely buy again.

Sometimes almond can be heavy, but this is a pleasant fragrance. The only drawback is that although absorbent it still takes time to soak in because it is an oil, so use at night or when you have time in the morning.
absolutely wonderful in the wintertime! keeps skin from drying out! i love the smell and it is great for shaving!
fragrance isn't over-powering and does indeed lather nicely

Loved this product. I suffer from dry skin all year round, and keratosis pilaris on my uper arms. This product smelled great, and helpt to treat my pilaris. You can't even feel the bumps on my arms after one use! Love this product! Most likely will be buying the oil moisturizer to use with.

I have been using this product for about a year and I love it. I don't use it in the shower; I actually use it for long hot baths when I have had a stressful day. It only takes a little and it smells wonderful!
This is exactly what i was looking for, wonderful scent, shave and wash oil for these cold winter days.

Absolutely...love this! It bubbles up so well, has a light scent that's enough to smell but not overpowering. In addition, after soaking in it, my skin feels super duper soft and smooth, no dry after-feel. Think it's a bit over-priced, but a little goes a long way for this bath oil.

I've reviewed this stuff before, but now I've been using it for a few years and I feel like I have a new perspective on it.  It's a little expensive for me when I buy this and also the body oil that pairs with it. So I only buy it if I have a gift card to cover the price, which isn't usually a problem because my family knows I like Sephora! I get really dry skin during stress and cold or dry weather - red rash, cracking, and itching. If I include this with my body wash, or better yet - rub a small amount on wet skin by hand, my skin is happy. If my skin is only a little dry, then it feels like normal after using this shower oil . If it is cracked and rashy, then a couple of days of this make it clear up pretty well.  This is the only product that seems to have made a difference in my dry skin, and I would be lost with out it. (paired with the body oil from the same company I use as a lotion during the worst of times). I will continue to buy this product until it is (hopefully never) discontinued.

This stuff is beautiful. It is definitely an oil, and the lather is really delicate rather than foamy, but a tiny bit goes a long way and it doesn't leave any kind of a residue on your skin. It's very lightly scented, not too gourmand or overly sweet.  For me, it totally cleared up my winter dry skin, where every lotion I tried had failed, and it did so without leaving me greasy or breaking me out. I will keep buying this as long as L'Occitane keeps selling it!
This is the best if you want silky baby skin. Plus the smell is great. My skin felt so nourished after using this product. I just wish it were a larger size.

I've been looking for a shower cleanser with a subtle but good scent that was moisturizing. This is it! The scent is lovely, not overpowering, and it rocks for shaving. I use the entire line and so far love it all. Great company as well. I will continue to buy. Btw you can get the super large size at the L'Occitane stores twice a year (should be there now).

I was given a sample of this from the Staff at Sephora to try & it was perfect. It leaves my skin feel silky & smooth & moisturized. I have since ordered a large bottle & have encouraged my friends to use it as well. Great product.

I love, love, love this product. This is a soap and shower oil in one. I've been using this every day and my skin is soft, even-toned and glowing!  A tip for users -- when you get out of the shower, DON'T dry yourself. Don't even pat yourself dry. Your skin should be dripping wet. Put on your favorite moisturizer and let your skin dry completely. Doing this every day will make your skin super soft and healthy.
Love the cleansing & soothing shower oil. Its my new favorite for winter. I feel so moisturized!

I love this oil. Having been blessed with lizard skin, i'm hardpressed to find a truly moisturizing product to save me during the winter. Well, my knight in shining armour has turned up in this tiny little bottle. It leaves my skin silky and luxurious but not oily feeling.

I bought the sample size just to see what I thought, and I really like it. It lathers well and has a warm almonds smell, and it feels very luxurious in the shower on a cold winter day. Would definitely buy full size.

reviews.review_title: Finally a cure for my Winter Dry Skin
reviews.review_text: I love this Shower Oil. It has a really good lather to it, soft and creamy. I use it with a scrunchie puff, and it's wonderful. It has a very subtle sent, and keeps my usual winter dry skin under control. My legs especially were always white and flaky and now they are smooth and moisturized. I highly recommend this. I'm kind of lazy and never tend to remember to cream, but with this, I don't need to.
I love this shower oil before shaving or applying bronzing lotion. The smell is light enough and there's no oily residue.
This shower oil is amazing. Leaves skin soft and the smell is not overpowering.

I had been looking for something that was an oil but would also be good at cleansing and I think I found it! This oil has enough suds to leave a clean feeling but also leaves my skin smooth and very lightly scented. As soon as I can afford to, I will purchase it again. Very good for the dry winter months.
I love this shower oil! It keeps your skin nice and moist, and has a great smell. I have used this oil for years.
Very nice scent and not oily or greasy at all. Perfect for the winter months

The way that the oil foams up when you lather it on is incredible. It feels very luxurious. I did find it wasn't as enduringly moisturizing as I would have liked. Overall, it smells great, feels wonderful and is fun to use

I really like the liquid, silky texture. Not oily as you might think, it leaves your feel feeling silky and not greasy. The light almond scent is also nice, subtle and no overly sweet. I seemed to have run through my supply pretty quickly which is a bummer considering the price.
Love this product for shaving and for cleansing in the dry winter months. Very moisturizing and helps razors glide smoothly. Highly recommend!

I'm not crazy in love with the scent as I am with many other L'Occitane products; however, it really is a nice alternative to cleansing in the shower - especially in the winter! Shaving is hard enough on my skin in the winter. This makes shaving painless and leaves my legs super soft.
This shower oil is amazing! It and leaves the skin fragrant and ultra-soft for hours. A bit pricey, but totally worth the splurge if you want to treat yourself.
This is a wonderful light, moisturizing oil with a very delicate fragrance. It makes my skin incredibly soft but not slippery. It is great stuff!

I like this for my dry areas (legs and arms), but I have oilier skin on my back, so I haven't tried to use it there yet. Nice smell though and I use the Clarins Body Oil after and this helps tame that smell.
Love IT!!! Smells good. Feels wonderful.
This product is on my top 10 list for sure! It give major hydration and smells amazing.
It smells wonderful and feels good on my skin. Does not lather up well, but I can live with that.

At first, I had a hard time wrapping my mind around a shower oil. I thought it would be oily and I wondered if I would slip and fall in the shower. However, the shower oil lathers into a light, soft foam and rinses off clean. It's a pricey but I like it!

reviews.review_title: I have never written a review....
reviews.review_text: and I feel compelled to comment on this product. Dry skin plagues me as I am aging. A sales rep suggested this. The smell was not pleasing on first whiff but I bought a travel size to try just in case it worked for dryness. The smell has not only grown on me but I now love the smell, as does my husband. The product is incredibly pleasant to use, moistens skin great, is the BEST shaving product I have ever used and does NOT leave the shower oily or slippery. Without leaving a buttery or oily feel my skin no longer feels dry nor flaky. I ordered large size in multiples for all the bathrooms. It is a great product.

I love the smell, but I like products that lather. I know lather is not the mark of a product, but this one seems to be more dense in oil than cleanser, and I feel like I have to use a lot to get the clean I need.

I am using the supple oil which look very similer to this shower oil but smaller bottle size. I thought this is the larger packing of it.. anyhow I like the whower oil as well now. it works for my dry skin.

I love this shower oil. The smell is divine and the texture is wonderful- silky but not actually oily. Leaves you feeling soft & pampered. I plan on investing in the 'Amande' cream as well. I shaved off one star b.c I wish it were a tiny bit sudsier.
Great product Keeps your skin smooth Smells great I am a fan
In addition to making my skin soft, this product has a wonderful fragrance! Very pleasant and not overpowering.

This shower oil is fantastic! It lathered up nicely, and a little went a long way. It left my skin lightly scented with almond oil, and my skin feels very soft. I highly recommend this to anyone wanting a great shower gel.
I like most of their products. It lathers up nicely and a little goes a long way.
I 've found out that L'Occitane makes gr-8 products for bath skin etc... Love it in the shower.nice scent,is smooth,cleans well,leaves skin soft.Will be purschasing again!
This stuff is wonderful. With the heat now on, being able to wash with a shower oil is amazing. You would never know it is an oil. Feels marvelous!

reviews.review_title: Great for sensitive skin - no oily residue
reviews.review_text: My mother-in-law directed me to this after I told her that I love scalding hot showers but have dry skin (go figure). I love it. It doesn't make a greasy mess in the shower, is thick enough to not leak out of your hand when trying to apply, and smells wonderful. I raved about it so much that my sisters now use it as well. Gives you a spa quality feeling for a reasonable price and a little goes a decent way.
Worked better than expected! Legs and arms are very soft and the smell is just heavenly!!

My skin feels so nice and smooth after I use this. It's very silky but it's not greasy or too oily. It's great for shaving legs etc. I love the smell, it's soft and subtle. It doesn't really lather up for me, but it leaves me feeling clean. I love the packaging. It looks very elegant and it makes a nice stocking stuffer (the smaller size).
Great to use for shaving legs or just to moisturize your skin...amazing smell....so worth the money and you only need to use a little because it goes a long way.
Even my husband uses this. I love the way it doesn't over-oil your skin. I use it on my arms and legs in the winter and to shave all year long. It would be great if they made it in larger sizes.
Got the traveling size for a trip. Absolutely fell in love with it. Moisturizing and leaves a nice scent. Will buy again when im out of shower gel
Bought this before for the winter. Lasted almost 2 winters.

This is the best scent of any soap, lotion, perfume, etc... The almond smells SOO good. I love using this product although it doesn't create a foam, I guess it's not supposed to. Makes my skin feel great anyways, and the smell is amazing.
I bought this to use as my travel body shampoo. Its not too oily and leaves your skin silky smooth. Smells great too.

I'm lazy but I want soft skin, so finding a body wash with enough moisturizing mojo to replace lotion has been an obsession of mine. I haven't found that magic elixir yet, but this one comes awfully close, and it's definitely the most luxurious.  My only reservation is the price: 24 bucks is a lot of money to pay for something that's getting rinsed off in the end, so if you're curious about it, you might try the travel size first.
Love this product, hydrates your skin and is lots of fun in the shower, smells like heaven. Great for shaving too!
Feels silky and a little goes a long way. Nice finish to a shower.
Soft skin. sweet smell. Great for shaving or just washing. I loved this soo soo much, it's a pity my mom managed to spill the entire bottle. Grrr.
I love how this smells and how it made my skin feel. I wish the fragrance would last longer on my skin and that it had more of a lather, but I would definitely purchase again.

this oil is a good product, , great fragrance,but it doesn't bubble that much, nor does the oil seem to stay on the skin, I was hoping for something that I could substitute for moisturizing. I probably would not buy again

I've purchased this once before and actually bit the bullet to spend the bucks to buy it again. It is expensive, but it is totally worth it!  The light almond scent and the oil to bubbles formulation make this perfect for the shower. I love how it keeps my skin soft and makes my morning shower smell so nice!
I've ordered another small bottle. The smell is soft & delicious, there isn't a residue on my skin.
I love it! gets me clean and soft

I am hooked. I have very dry skin and this shower oil really nourishes and moisturizes my skin. I can even skip applying lotion when I am in a hurry and not have cracked, dry skin. Lovely light scent and great for shaving legs. Worth the price. A little goes a long ways
Moisturizing, but not too oily. And, it does foam. Great for skin softening in the shower.

This is the reason I purchased this product, I love almond scented products. THis shower oil, foams which was interesting to me. I have not had any adverse reactions which wonderful and it leaves my skin soft. Great shaving product as well.
I love this product, it makes my skin feel so soft but not greasy. I also like the way it heats up in my hands when I lather it up...very luxurious and it smells wonderful.

I purchased the smaller size just to test it out. But I am loving this product. I find that pouring it into my palm and then massaging it into my skin works better than using a puff or loofah. It doesn't foam up too much but rinses off without an oily feel. It leaves your skin very soft. I love the almond smell to it, its very calming. I also use this oil instead of shaving cream. Once I run out of the small bottle I will definitely repurchase the bigger size. This will be great for the fall/winter time!
Great smell, but I felt I had to use a lot of this product per shower- so not worth the price for me. Also I didn't find it any more moisturizing than my regular soap.
This oil smells sooo good and lathers well as you rub it. But not sure about the cleansing with this product.

This is a great shower oil. It really moisturizes my skin. The fragrance, as with all this brand's products, is heavenly. The only reason that I gave it 4 stars is that it doesn't lather like I want it to. However, it is a shower oil!
LOVE IT. I just wish that it came in a bigger size. the one I got smells so good& lathers up nice. The size is just too small. other than that its nice especially in summer
I love the smell and how it works soothing my skin. I will definitely buy again.
bit pricey but I always splurge on this one.... I love it....silky feel to skin and great smell if you ahve a bit of extra cash i woudl say buy it
