I love this product. It just glistens over your skin in the shower and keeps that smooth hydrated feel all day. It is great to use when you need a quick leg shave too! Thank you Sephora for recomending to me during a store visit.
Softly scented and leaves you soft feeling. Not greasy.

The absolute only way to shave - super smooth, leaves no residue. Personally I don't like the almond smell too much (only reason for 4 stars) but it does smell honest and natural and washes away easily and I don't smell it on me afterwards. I never go without. A little goes a long way, so even though it's not cheap, it lasts a long time. Worth it.

I got the small bottle to try out. Not only does a little go a long way and the bottle seems to be lasting forever - but my skin is so soft and smooth after showering with this. I think I will explore using cleansing oils from now on. I stopped using sulfate based shampoos and it did wonders for my hair, so I have been looking to stop using sulfate based cleansers alltogether. Now I just need to find some sort of hand soap that isn't sulfate based.
My skin is uber sensitive. This is the best body wash ever, and has quite a bit of lather for being so gentle <3

I probably have THE most dry skin ever. I am 57 and this is a great product. I have tried other brands and this is by far the best. I have also bought the oil and body cream. The oil is really great for skin that gets crepey.

i truly love this product. i take issue with the product description a lavish, foaming shower oil because in my mind, that makes me think the foam should be really lavish and foamy. and it's not. it's just light sudsy foam. but i love the scent, and it gets me clean without making me dry and scaly, and that is an awesome thing. wish they made a larger size with a pump dispenser.
Wonderful product!! I will never be without it now..

Okay, I've never been a devout L'Occitane girl, and this product didn't change that. I enjoy their products, but nothing to date has made me fall in love. The oil is rich, the smell is nice, the lather is - meh. For the price, I'll stick with my moisturizing bar soap and save the dough for something else..

I love this product. I have tried other products from L'Occitane so I knew I was getting good quality item. This shower oil smells wonderful and leaves my skin sofy and silky. I plan on ordering more!!
There are lots of bath oils and such out there but I love the smell of this one. I got it to use while shaving since my legs are very sensitive after I shave and this oil helps with that.

I love the almond scent several of the L'Occitane products have! This shower oil was great on my overly dry skin, but I noticed the ingredients listed glycerin as one of its top 3 ingredients, so I knew right away that it would not be good to use it in my nether-regions (glycerin breaks down into sugar which causes yeast infections; that's why you don't want to use a personal lubricant with glycerin as one of the top 3 ingredients such as KY or Astroglide...). I think having that almost scent down there would be great. Maybe if it didn't have the glycerin issue...
I really do like this shower oil. It emulsifies well, and doesn't strip the moisture from my skin. Not a huge fan of the scent, which comes off as sour to me.
Great for dry skin- love it on legs and arms.
I thought this was nice and had a nice scent to it. I didn't see anything out of the ordinary from it though, but I enjoyed the fragrance.

reviews.review_title: MY GOD I LOVE THIS PRODUCT
reviews.review_text: every women in the world should own this product its wonderful

reviews.review_title: I DON'T WANT TO SMELL LIKE OLIVE OIL!!!
reviews.review_text: I am not happy with my purchase of this product. 1. It smells horrible - just like pure olive oil - I smell not one hint of almond oil in this stuff. 2. It takes an exorbitant amount of this product to take a shower with and feel clean. I just hate it. So sorry I bought it - a total waste of money.

reviews.review_title: How have I not used this before?
reviews.review_text: Not only is the shower oil hydrating to my skin, it smells wonderful too! I purchased the travel size while I was waiting in line to pay for some other things and once I used it I knew I had to have more and ordered online!

i was looking for something different than a typical body wash and saw that this had gotten good reviews, so i decided to give it a try. it smells amazing and when you first put it on your skin it feels warm and then produces a light lather. my skin feels soft and smooth after i get out of the shower. i would have given this 5 stars, but i hate the packaging. once you get to the halfway point of the bottle, it has a tendency to come out a little slower..squeezing the bottle with wet hands only results in the bolttle going flying. is the bottle was more sqeezable or if it came with a hand pump it would be perfect!
smells great and helps the skin on your legs look fab. does not leave a greasy residue on skin or tub. wish it came in a larger size.
I first tried this on a trip to the beach 5 years ago and have been using it ever since. Its perfect to use all year long.

I have always used body wash with a scrunchy in the shower, but I have been converted. I now just pour a little of this oil in my hand to use all over. It's not for deep cleaning, but a light wash off that leaves your skin so smooth and silky!!!
This is a natural subtle product that makes your skin feel amazing after using. Definitely recommend it. A little can go a long way. I will buy this product again once I run out.

reviews.review_title: MY GOD I LOVE THIS PRODUCT
reviews.review_text: LOCCITANE CLEANSING &SOOTHING SHOWER OIL WITH ALMOND OIL IS THE BEST DISCOVERY MADE IN THE BEAUTY WORLD YOU HAVE TO TRY IT ALONG WITHE THE SOFTENING AND FIRMING OIL YOU WILL SEAR YOU HAVE WENT TO HEAVEN IT 'S THE GREATEST!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

I picked up a small $8 bottle at the checkout line during a recent Sephora shopping spree, and it is one of my new favorites! Great for shaving. Starts out kind of thick and then turns into a nice milky lather and leaves a soft but not oily or greasy feel on skin. Will definitely purchase again.

My skin always gets so dried out in the shower and, let's be honest, I'm usually too lazy or in too much of a rush to use moisturizer when I get out. This has solved my problems. It has a lovely light almond scent and does a great job! :)
The oil foams up nicely and has a great scent. The texture is very creamy and rich when lathered. Goes great paired with the supple oil.
Great shower product....don't let the name fool you, it is not a greasy product. Makes skin soft, supple and moisturized. Nice clean smell too.
I love this oil. It is very thick but yet you can wash it off and it is made for the shower! I use this stuff everytime I don't have time to put on vitamin E oil after my shower.
Never tried L'Occitane before. This is a good start. Smell good. Great for shaving, legs feel smoother than ever before. I have dry legs, by the way.j
Love this as a bubble bath product, and very gentle on my dry winter skin. Love it!
I love the smell and texture of this oil. It isn't as moisturizing as I'd hoped and it also doesn't foam up at all. All in all, it is ok, but not worth the money.

I am hooked on this stuff. It goes on kind of thick and then as soon as you add water it turns into a milky oil cleanser. Amazing smell and just makes you feel really great. I will never stop using this product.

I've used every shower oil sold and this one is the absolute best as far as keeping the skin moisturized all day. The bonus is that it is also a cleanser - eliminating a step for me as I usually cleanse with one product and use an oil afterwards.
It doesn't make me feel very clean after I use it, so It isn't a good shower gel.

I have had my eye on this item for a long time and decided to go ahead and take the plunge after seeing all the wonderful reviews. It does smell nice, feels good (warming) on the skin and moisturizes nicely. It also turns into a nice almost milky consistency when added with water in the shower. BUT you do have to use quite a bit to put on your whole body, it doesn't really lather up much and I find the price expensive for what you get. Although I am glad I tried it and do like the product, I will not be purchasing it again due to it being too costly since it doesn't last very long.
i love this item , it leaves my skin soft and moisterized . I will be buying more in the future !  thanks :)

I purchased this product, in the past, with the intention of using it for a daily cleanser. It did not serve that purpose well, as I found it not as cleansing and foamy as I like. But, I purchased it this time for a particular purpose. My skin was extremely dry and delicate from being exposed to the dry indoor heat all winter. I also went through an illness that left my skin extra dry and sensitive. The L'Occitane Shower Oil QUICKLY corrected all of those skin issues. It doesn't strip the skin's natural oils but it doesn't leave an oily residue on the skin (or in the shower) either. It is low foaming but effective. The scent is very pleasant.

This product is smooth and gentle, yet I feel like you have to use quite a bit to work into a lather. It works better with your hands than with a loofah. For the price, I feel a bit like I am wasting since I have to use more than I'd like to. I thought it would have more of an almond or amaretto scent, but it smells more like slightly sweet olive oil than anything else. It works well for shaving, although it is obviously not as thick as a regular shaving cream. All in all, this is a nice luxurious body wash to give as a gift or save for a rainy day, but it does not perform better than a drugstore shower oil of lower cost.  I have oily skin, so I don't use it on my face or neck. I still feel like I need to use a moisturizer afterward on my feet, elbows and knees. It rinses clean and doesn't leave much of a residue.
Never before have I used every last drop of a product like this one. The smell and feel are silky, sexy.

This shower oil feels luxurious. It smells very nice without being overpowering. It lathered well and I am so glad I took a chance on this one. Will definitely buy it again. So far am very pleased with all the products from L'Occitane I have used!
The scent is very soothing and sweet but not as foamy as I would like it to be and still feels like I need to moisturize after.

I bought this shower oil specifically for shaving. But I think it’s a very nice to use all over your body as it is non-drying. But I still feel the need for lotion or oil after. The scent is very nice.

LOVE THIS!! I'd seen this before, but never tried it until I saw this small try me size. It comes out like an oil and with soap lathers up like a soap. My hands were SOOOOO soft and moisturized after washing them with this - I want it shower sized! Beautiful light Almosnd scent.
Wonderful for dry skin-If you take hot baths or showers that strips mouisture out this will replenish~ the almond oil scent is so yummy too!
smells clean and wonderful like sweet almond and leaves my skin silky soft

i love this shower oil....its so good for who has dry skin and pregnant in the same time.The bigger my belly gets the itchy-er it is.By using this shower oil i get clean skin,moisturized skin and itchy free skin and also so soft .The smell its awesome , I like it so much that after i take o shower i just put antiperspirant and no perfume just to enjoy the smell of it.I also use the Almond Oil with it.Together the do wonders for my pregnant belly and itchy skin.If you are looking for a good in shower moisturizer that really works than you found it.
Love the almond scent, and the soothing, non-drying wash. Pairs beautifully with the L'Occitane almond skin oil, which I have used for years.

I've always had good luck in buying L'Occitane products. This shower oil is no exception. It helps hydrate your skin while you use it; just be aware that it doesn't suds it as much as your regular soaps do.

My absolute luxury item! I love this shower oil, it is the best thing for shaving legs, and it lathers up really nice and leaves my skin supple. I usually save it for shaving though since it's so pricey!!

I've used this product for about 5 years now. It has everything you'd want for a luxurious shower experience. The Smell is addicting, it softens skin and can be used as a shaving lubricant. My legs are soft and moisturized and the bottle lasts for months. Love L'Occitane products and this is a top 5 for me!

reviews.review_title: Not the best product in the line
reviews.review_text: Out of all the L'Occitane Almond line, this is definitely my least favorite. I just dislike the smell of this product very much. The smell is so different from the fantastic Almond Supple Skin Oil and the Almond Milk Concentrate, so don't think this product will have the same smell...

My skin feels like silk when I use this! I love the scent and it develops a light lather so I feel really clean. Even though it is an oil, I don't feel greasy after using it and it's great for shaving.

A shower oil that foams and lathers? I didn't believe it until I tried it and now I'm hooked. It is absolutely fantastic and leaves me feeling clean and moisturized - but not oily. How cool! Love this stuff!
I bought this priduct last month and really hated the smell. It really smells like bile. I ended up using it only to give myself pedicures. Will not be purchasing this again!!!!

I have read where a lot of people had said there is no sudsing so how can you be clean? Well, I use a bath spongie ( like at B&B) and a little goes a long way. I have extremely dry skin and this has done wonders! After rinsing I go back ( with just my hands) and rub just a little more on my skin and then ever so gently rinse that off. I use it to shave my leggs. FANTASTIC!!!
Wow, this stuff is fantastic. The mild fragrance is lovely. It's the best thing ever for shaving your legs. LOVE IT!!!

It seriously helps the winter dry skin. I didn't know how I would feel about the absence of a lather, but you don't have to use much, as it spreads well. It is an oil that when you rub your hands together creates a lotion that foams just a little, but bellieve me you are clean and smell wonderful! It will always be my winter wash.

This smells fantastic, and leaves my skin smooth. I have super dry, itchy skin, especially in winter. This doesn't leave my skin as irritated as most body washes do. I still put on lotion or oil afterward, but that's expected.  My only complaint is that it takes a lot of product to achieve a lather. Because of that, I'd say it's overpriced. Don't know if I'll buy it again, even though I do love the scent.

I use this when my skin feels a bit dry/thirsty, especially in the winter. I wasn't sure what a shower oil would be like or that it would clean skin, but it does. It leaves skin feeling clean and moisturized. It also smells fantastic. I love the almond products from L'occitane in part because of the scent.
I use this every Fall and Winter! I have normal to oily skin normally, but during the cold seasons get extremely dry especially on my legs and arms. This has been a wonderful solution! A must have!!

I was really excited to try this shower oil because I love almond sent and all of the reviews were good. Unfortunately, I do not agree with most of the reviews. I don't think it smells good. It reminds me of a faint medicine smell.
Finally a product that I can use in the winter that prevents dry, itchy skin.

Don't be scared by the word oil. When you put some ona shower puff it turns into a bubbly lather. Your skin is left with a nice soft feeling - there isn't an oily residue. A little goes a long way, so while this is expensive, it will last. The scent is very nice - think amaretto.

This is a great product to put on after you bathe yourself (with almond soap) in the shower as it leaves skin soft and smooth after rinsing.  I use this with the almond guest soap and the Almond Milk Lotion.  Great for shaving legs and underarms as it makes your skin soft and smooth!
You would not believe how excellent this shower oil is! What I primarily use it for is with a manicure brush to scrub my nails and cuticles each day.
I LOVE this shower oil. The smell is terrific and I have no need for lotion on my legs after using this product. You just cannot go wrong with any of the L'Occitane products as far as I am concerned!

Ive been using this for 2 weeks. Definitely improved my skin. I got it for winter time and its perfect. I have dry unhealthy skin this time of year and need loads of lotion. I use this every morning now and my skin feels NATURALLY soft and moisturized and healthy, not oily. Moisturizing after is FINALLY optional Honestly Ive never felt my skin feel this good. It makes your skin incredibly smooth and soft.  Smell is nice and soft, unisex. As is the bottle. My boyfriend could use this and his roommates wouldn't make fun of him.  It is not a typical lather, its a nice cleansing milky consistency. Wash and rinse as usual and go. Im proned to sweating, oily skin, and also sensitive arms and back. Oily or scented washes always make me break out on my arms and back. This product keeps me feeling clean and has caused no breakouts whatsoever.  I read some reviews that this product makes them feel oil coated on their skin. I havent experienced that, I havent had any problems with oily skin or oily coating after. I've experinced a wonderful and moisturizing skin treatment. I would say if you feel coated use a more lathering cleanser once a week or every other week. This wash is definitely worth using.  The only downside is that with my loofah the bottle goes quickly. Im going to try a sponge. That said, if I dont overdo it, the bottle should last me all winter, PERFECT. I dont like the price, but if I can stretch the quantity by using a better sponge, I will be buying this always. New favorite bath product. I love it so much Im buying a whole lot more from L'Occitane, Im sold.
I love to wash with this in the winter. Non-drying. Makes your body feel smooth, smooth, smooth!

The body wash has almond oil in it and keeps you moisturized. It's none drying and has a light almondy scent that I think is unisex. My brother and dad use this was with no problem. I tend to buy it once winter has established itself.

I always have to moisturize after my shower but with this shower oil, moisturizer is optional. Amazing! Also the scent is light and not overpowering at all. It doesn't foam up as much as a regular shower gel but the small amount of lather does last enough to wash your whole body.
This is a nice cleanser with a pleasant almond scent. Not sure if I will repurchase, but I do enjoy it.
Shower oil w/almond oil is amazing. You think that it's not getting you clean because it's so silky. But, it is. And your skin is so soft after you get out of the shower. And it smells so good.

A lovely clerk in the Sephora store where I shop, introduced me to this product, so I decided to try it. I was pleasantly surprised! I like the feel of the cleansing oil on my body and don't feel dried out after, as often happens in the winter. I will buy more when I use up this bottle - an alternative to a shower gel that is sudsy.

The bottle is very cute. +1! :)  This shower oil is very soothing. It has a very faint pleasant smell that isn't overpowering.  I use it mostly for shaving though- it's the best shaving product ever! My skin gets so smooth and doesn't break out in bumps or get irritated. My boyfriend even commented on how smooth my skin was... miracle!  It only takes a little bit of oil to get the job done- I can see the bottle lasting for awhile. If you like beauty oils/washes this is a great purchase.

It issuperior to any shower cleanser I have ever used. It is rich and thick like honey in an jar. The smell is excellent. I have not used it enough to see if it stands up to the ads but it will be eagerly used up to the last drop.

Was nervous that the oil would literally slip through my fingers, falling into the shower and wasting too much product. I didn't understand how an oil, being thin, could serve as such a great body cleanser.  This product's unique viscosity was the first thing that I noticed... it was simple to spread across the body. As soon as I added water, it became not foamy, but MILKY- in a very nice way. Rinses clean and leaves me smooth.  As soon as I step out of the shower, I normally FEEL like I need my moisturizer- especially if I've just shaven. With this, I feel comfortable post-shower, and can apply moisturizer at my leisure. Actually, I think I will save money on body lotion, as I need to use less after showering with this oil.  Did I mention it smells AWESOME??? I will never use a shower gel as long as I can get my hands on this awesome, oil-turned-cleansing-milk!

reviews.review_title: No more dry skin itch! The solution is here!
reviews.review_text: I purchased this hoping that if I used this instead of soap, my poor skin would stop driving me crazy with the itching. It did not disappoint. This is going to be my wintertime go-to body cleanser. There is just a wee bit of lather so you at least feel like you're getting clean. I couldn't be happier with it. If I had to pick something, it would only be that I would prefer a different scent.

reviews.review_title: Where has this been all of my life?
reviews.review_text: I have used many L'Occitane products, and so I am shocked that I hadn't purchased this shower oil until now. I am in love with it!  You only need a little bit out of the bottle to achieve a rich lather.  The smell is very calming and clean. I never thought of almonds as feminine and enticing.  And best of all, this oil is great to use while shaving. I will go so far as to say that I look forward to my next shave. It made the annoying experience actually pleasurable!  My legs feel so soft and refreshed. I wasn't running for the lotion after my shower!

reviews.review_title: I found the secret to making it foamy!!
reviews.review_text: I picked this up last year when the winter dried my skin out intolerably. So I now use it, but it never seemed to foam right and I either used too much or too little. However, I picked up a regular bath sponge recently and it was PERFECT, just the right amount of lather with only a little of the oil.  I love how this leaves my skin soft, glowing and smelling of sweet almond. Most importantly, it doesn't irritate my sensitive skin and keeps it in a nicely balance moisturized state without feeling greasy or filmy.

This is such a great shower gel!!! It smells so nice but is not an overpowering smell. This makes my skin so soft. I can tell a big difference in how my skin feels when I run out. If you are looking for a luxurious sophisticate shower gel, look no further- this is the one for you!!

I have very, very dry skin, especially in the winter. I read about this and thought I would give it a try last winter. I did not have any more dry flakes on my legs! Dries out your skin sooo much less than soap or any other shower product I've ever used. I would definitely recommend for dry skin. I read other reviews about the smell, but I like the smell.
Nicely foaming, pretty moisturizing, but the scent is a little off, not quite what I expected. The almond scent is hard to pick up, it smells a little earthy/musky/umami instead.
Smells fresh, and the almond scent is not overpowering. A little goes a long way, and it is a truly elegant!
I will buy this again. It goes a long way...I don't think I will ever shave with anything else!

This is divine...the scent is somehow light and lush at the same time, and it feels so good going on. You don't use a loofa with this...the oil will disappear. Just smooth it on with your hands. If you love it as much as I do, you can make it last throughout the day if you use Milk Concentrate. I noticed on a Sunday afternoon, after one application in the a.m. on the day before, my skin had a glow. Amazing stuff, truly. Also, the best part is they make all of their stuff in trial sizes so you can see if it's a good fit before making a real commitment. I just wish one bottle lasted longer than 2 weeks...maybe I'm using too much:-) Can't help it, though...
THE very best shower oil ever made... I absoluteley love the smell and feel of this wonderful foaming oil! Use it when shaving for the smoothest legs ever!!

I expect it to lather up and keep my skin nice and moisturized after use but:  1. It barely lathers (unless you use a boat load) 2. Smell is REALLY overpowering 3. Doesn't leave your skin moisturized at all... no trace of a light oil fee  Will not be purchasing this again.

I get really dry itchy skin in the winter, and this is the only shower wash that actually keeps the moisture in my skin. It smells wonderful too. It is pricey for the amount, but totally worth it when you're suffering in the cold.
Very nice, your body, your skin feels wonderful.

I have been uing this product for the past few years and absolutly love it.Perfect for shaving your legs. Leaves your skin silky smooth. I find that I do not need to apply another product for hydrating after use.

Amazing product for shaving on dry, irritated skin. I used it on my legs, and ohhhlalaa legs without any burning or discomfort. Skin felt amazing. I have been through years of itching and dryness and discomfort. But this is the answar.

I have searched the planet, but haven't found anything that even comes close. In fact, as far as I can tell there are about three shower oils in this world, all sold here at Sephora. While I haven't tried the others, due to the high costs, this one is wonderful. When you think oil, you think of something heavy and greasy, but it isn't so. On wet skin it sort of lathers and is great for shaving, too. It has a light, not overpowering fragrance and is simply bliss. If I could I'd pour it over me and roll around in it!

Love this shower oil and it ACTUALLY IS warming on contact! most who claim so i dont feel it or its a weird warm sensatiopn like icy hot but this was yummy! It is a very lush warm sensation. I pour into palms rub together and then apply to body. My husband loves the smell as do i!

I first tried this last winter for extreme dry skin and it did wonders. I was afraid to use it in the summer because of the oil and fear of breakouts but that has not been the case. So wonderful and moisturizing. the best for shaving legs ever.
Love the scent. Not to foaming, need's a little kick there. May purchase again, not too sure as of yet.I have only been using now for a few days.

I have a relatively limited experience with shower gels, and this was my first researched purchase. So worth it. I went without it for a month, stupidly, while I tried to go organic. My skin hated me for it. I have very dry skin (and KP), so moisture is a high priority of mine. PLUS it is fantastic for shaving, too, which means I get to knock out two tasks with one product. It smells pretty neutral to me, which I am grateful for; I can only handle so many mingling of scents in the shower before I get a sneezing attack.  My only complaint is that I wish the bottles were bigger so that I wasn't creating so much waste.
This product really helped my dry, uneven skin and tone on my upper arms and chest. I now have moisturized, smooth, glowing skin. I mix it with my regular shower gel to make it last longer.

I do like this oil, though I do think I prefer the body oil on its own. Initially this has that same great scent, but there's another fragrance beneath it that I don't particularly like- probably something to do with the foaming. Speaking of foaming, the shower oil does foam up a *little* and warm up in your hands as you apply it. It works very well for shaving and it definitely leaves your skin hydrated- if you don't have particularly dry skin you may not even need to moisturize after showering with this. I think it's great!
This leaves a light almond scent to your skin and its better than shaving cream to shave your legs! The best stuff ever!, i'm hooked for life!... :)
Very unique, foam fast, leave your skin feeling very soft.
just perfect, not too soapy not too oily

Best shower product I have ever used, is actually moisturizing. The smell is fantastic, and does not irritate my sensitive skin. Great for shaving, and in the summer I don't need much lotion after my shower when I use this stuff. Highly recommended.
asmells really nice, but my family is a fan of the Verbena...
Great product! Wonderfully rich in emolients! Perfect for dry skin! Pampering!
This shower gel warms up when you put it on in the shower. And the smell is so good you feel like your at a Spa . I will buy this shower gel over and over . I also give this out as gifts .
This oil is a wonderful moisturizer and smells fantastic. I use it witih the After Shower oil as well, and my skin is like buttah!
It doesn't lather very well. The consistency and smell is lovely. It also leaves you scented long after the shower. Feels luxurious, but I'd like a little more lather.
Love it... but my first bottle didn't last me as long as I would have liked...
That in a nutshell is my comment...This is a moisturizing cleanser that nearly eliminates the need to moisturize after your shower. Nice fragrance too.
Smells heavenly and hydrates the body in an unbelievable way! Leaves skin soft, clean and smelling beautiful. I use it every day.
I enjoy using the shower oil. It's warming when in your hands, it has a delicate fragrance which doesn't mess up any of your perfumes, and it does soak into the skin easily while cleaning you.

I was skeptical to try shower oil. I've always used gel based shower products... but the oil is fantastic. It smells fabulous, but instantly your skin is hydrated and softened. I love this stuff for winter because it really helps parched skin.
I love how this oil heats up a little as you put it on!! It is great to shave with too. Leaves your skin feeling so healthy and soft.

At first I was weirded out by using a shower oil instead of a shower gel. I have to say though that I will never go back to shower gel. This L'Occitane shower oil is heaven in a bottle! It has a warm feeling when it goes onto the skin and turns into a thick lathering foam. It has made my skin feel softer and smell amazing. My roommates borrowed some and they fell in love with it as well!
I love this shower oil. I can't tolerate most perfumes and scented body products.The Amande line is wonderful. It smells delicious and softens and moiturizes. I love L'Occitane products.
I am so pleased to share with everyone, this produce is so good and I will tell all my friends to ues it.

My daughter recommended this product and I love everything about it. The fragrance is wonderful and it moisturizes and cleans my body perfectly. The fact that I can also use it as a shaving cream is an added bonus, reducing the clutter in my shower.

great stuff!very moisturizing u can use it to shave your legs. it does not lather because it doesnt have the added chemicals that make that happen(sometimes u miss a little lather though). smells great and light. highly recommended by me,my bf is obsessed.a little expensive though....
I've used this product before but I needed it more now! It is simply the best for winter dry skin. I feel like a silken-clad human after the shower.
Did not like at all.. The smell was off, nothing like almond. Did not like the consistency either, heavy than as soon as in contact with water it just disappeared. I return it.
I love the smell and the feel of your skin after using this product . My only dislike is that it doesn't foam up easily.

This is a light smelling, foaming oil that you use in the shower. I love it. Put some on a shower sponge or a pouf and it foams up and cleans your skin while leaving behind soft and sweet smelling skin. Made my winter skin feel better from the first use. I love this stuff!
I love this shower oil - it feels and smells fabulous. Great for shaving!

Its like the fountain of youth !!!! It is rich and think and smooth, and the smell is out of this world. It makes shaving easier, and it washes off super clean. not greasy at all. it is just yummy, cant live without it

This shower oil doesn't seem like it would get your skin clean because, well, it's OIL and it doesn't lather a lot. But I do come out of the shower feeling not just cleaner but also pampered and moisturized. I love that I don't need to put on lotion after using this in the shower. It softens my skin so much. I love the fabulous scent, too!

I tend to have dry skin (because of my lack of H2O intake).. so when i came across this I could not pass it up. I have to say that I am in love!!! it truly is moisturizing! I use it to shave also, and my legs are nick free and soft for sin ;-) I'd say my only complaint is that I have started to get some early 20's breakouts, and i have to use a different more exfoliating wash on my back. But otherwise this product comes highly recommended from me!
This shower oil was given to me one holiday several years ago, and I have used it ever since. It keeps your skin hydrated and smelling wonderfully fresh and clean.

reviews.review_title: Does not dry out your skin
reviews.review_text: Excellent shower oil that foams while you are washing. Also love the scent which you can smell. Not true of cheaper brands. Leaves your skin feeling soft and clean.

I am a fan of L'occitane but had never tried this. It left my skin very soft and moisturized. I was hesitant to try this because since it is an oil, I was afraid it would make my acrylic tub slippery. It did not. I woudl recommend this very highly to anyone.

This will be the third time I am buying this product. I cannot find a shower oil anywhere else, to save my life. This one is great. Goes on like oil, but foams enough to feel like you've washed. You only need a few drops. Last time I bought it I noticed it started mysteriously getting lower every time I showered. I thought it was my imagination, but remembered the first time it lasted months. I found out my 20-year-old son had been using it. That otta say something!

This Shower Oil is absolutely fabulous! VERY hydrating. Very interesting texture, begins as an oil then into a soft lather. Lovely fragrance. Leaves the shower without that oil sliime in the bottom! LOVE it! Highly recommended! Leaves skin soooo soft and smooth, no dry scaley skin! Buy it!

Not only does this shower gel make your skin smell like almonds all day and night, but it turns your skin into a baby's bum! My skin was so soft the first time I bought it last year. Now i will never be without it. I highly recommend it! Tip: This stuff works well when shaving....no more messy shaving cream and your skin is so smooth you won't even have to use moisturizer.
Love L'Occitane! This shower oil/gel is amazing! The scent is delicious and it's terrific if you have thirsty skin! Great lather, too!
Very gentle with wonderful fragrance-even my husband loves it! Doesn't irritate my skin like lots of other products. This one is a keeper, as long as it's being made, we'll keep buying!

I love this shower oil. It's one of my favs. I like the way it smells and feels. I find it to be very moisturizing and who cares that it doesn't foam. Most foam is caused by surfactant chemicals and who needs that?
Very hydrating... I really love it.

reviews.review_title: Shower oil that smells amazing and hydrates
reviews.review_text: I was introduced to this product by my roommate. I wanted to know why the bathroom smelled so amazing after she got out of the shower! This shower oil not only leaves your skin so soft you don't need lotion, but you can go without perfume on casual days. And as a bonus, it is the best shaving lotion ever!
It doesn't foam, as it claims it does. Doesn't smell great. Dissappointing.

I can't believe there is actually a shower oil that keeps my soft ALL day long - literally. I mean, I shower with the stuff in the morning, and when I go to bed, I'm still silky soft? And with NO additional lotion? C'mon, now. This stuff is a keeper, as long as L'Occitane keeps making it.

reviews.review_title: Fabulous - All Time Favorite of Mine!
reviews.review_text: I am pretty picky about the products I really, REALLY love. This shower oil is fantastic! Smells WONDERFUL and is very moisturizing. It is something that I purchase over and over again - only a few products make it to that status for me, as there is always something new & better to try. I have purchased other, similar products and keep going back to this one!

I was very excited to use this product since i was a great review on TV and also on the Sephora website. I felt is was OK. I like the Almond Oil better. I will not purchase this product again but i will definitely buy the Almond Oil again.

Soothing, soft scented, minimally sudsy, without the gargantuan oil-slick sticky feeling of other bath / shower oils. Eureka! Divine. It is the nicest winter dry skin combatant I've found yet in the shower oil division. I was pleased that the oils were absorbed by my skin and not by my clothing! No staining from oil residue, as has been the case with others, on clothing.
Most excellent cleanser! My skin feels softer than ever before and it never gets dry like it does with other body wash. Oh and the wonderful subtle almond scent, I just love it!

I tried the Amande Shower Oil first as a sample and when it ran out, I HAD to have more. For any woman who wants to pamper herself, the aroma of this oil gives just the kinda of luxurious relaxation that a shower should include. i'm the kind of person who feels that a shower should be all about loving your body and its every part, so why should we not love the scents we invigorate our skin with? And, also, as an oil, it adds to the silky satiny effect. It also works well in a loofa for maximum lather. I am such a huge fan that I even bought an extra 8oz. bottle for my sister for her birthday.

After reading all of the great reviews on this product, I was hoping to love it too.  Pros- Nice buttery, nutty fragrance Moisturizing Great for shaving  Cons- Does not lather Can't use with a bath poof  This product would probably be great for certain skin conditions (i.e.- sunburn/windburn/late pregancy tummy stretching) but for everyday use, I wouldn't suggest it. I will be using the remainder of mine to hydrate after exfoliating/mud treatments.

reviews.review_title: A must for dry winter skin
reviews.review_text: Never have I used a bath and body product that I saw such dramatic results with the first use! I struggle with sensitive, dry itchy skin year round, but the Chicago winter is especially bad. I asked for a sample of this after trying the shea butter foot cream and loving that. This shower oil is different because when it comes out, you think that you are showering with what you would fry chicken. It however creates a foam that leaves your skin so soft and smooth!! It does not produce tons of lather, but nothing that is good for your skin does. I will never be without this during the winter. I am interested to see how this does in hot summer months, but then I could see keeping this as a shave gel for those months, as well as after swimming with chlorine. Love love love this!! Sephora, please carry the bigger bottle!!
Finally a product that does what it says. My skin gets so dry & itchy in the winter. This gives good coverage without leaving me feeling greasy & love the fact that I can use in shower.

This is one of the many L'Occitane products that is lost in the shuffle of shea butter, which is what everyone wants. Don't let the name fool you, I would call this a highly moisturizing shower cleanser that soaps up like a shower gel and cleans like one but leaves the skin very hydrated because of the almond oil. It's INCREDIBLE and the smell is so soothing and has a nurturing sense about it. Give it a try. Sephora has the best return policy EVER, but I know you'll love it. P.S. It's awesome for shaving in the shower. If I could I'd give it 6 stars.
We live in MN and get pretty dry skin. Using this in the shower help both me and my husband. The smell and feel of this is wonderful. I am ordering my second bottle. You won't be disappointed.

Amazing product. Goes on as an oil at first but then as you rub it into your skin it's like heaven. The scent is light but really is soothing. Highly recommended, even if the price tag scares you, try it. It's worth every penny.
Used ion the shower, this is the best shave emollient there is. Makes shaving a smooth process and leaves my legs feeling the same. Very pleasing fragrance, too.
I use this with the cream for extra soft skin.
Excellent product. Leaves dry skin soft. Has a light, pleasant scent. Also has body oil and lotion in same scent.

I've reviewed this product before, but I gotta say it again now that winter is upon us... Anyone who suffers from dry, itchy skin especially during winter months, has GOT to try L'Occitane's Amande Shower Oil. It's the only thing I've found that actually works. Suds up in the shower, rinse off, and itching from dry skin is pretty much a thing of the past. And it doesn't leave your skin oily. Love it!!

I have used this product for years. I started using it as a shaving oil, the lather is just thick enough and makes for a perfectly smooth shave. Recently I have started using this as my body wash as well. I love the smell and my skin is left soft and smooth.
I own this product and i got it to go alone with my Amande body cream. I like its smell and texture. I use it without sponge. Makes a perfect duo with body cream.
Leaves my skin feeling so soft and moisturized. Love the clean scent.

Great idea and product. At first I didn't want to buy this because I'm not a big fan of almond scents but I wanted to try it anyway. To my pleasant surprise, it is not overpowering on fragrance and gives the skin the most subtle natural light scent all day (and certainly not something that interferes with perfume). It foams right away, is the best thing I've ever shaved with, and leaves my skin soft and moisturized all day.
excellent no negatives at all
I use this shower soap for shaving and it works great without foaming. The name is deceptive, it is not an oil. It has a light smell too.
This shower oil is ideal for shaving and the scent is very luxurious!
I love this and will continue to use for ever. Even sent to my sister for a 'happy gift'.

Amande Shower Oil leaves my skin feeling smooth as satin after my shower. I was out of Amande Shower Oil for 8 days and noticed the difference in the feel of my skin when I stepped out of the shower. I also used more body cream during the time I was out of Amande and my skin still was not as smooth and supple. I will not be running out again!

Nice light, natural fragrance, very smooth and soothing, not oily or greasy feeling at all. Blot dry after shower and you feel very moisturinzed. I use the Amande milk concentrate every day over legs and arms, and this is a very nice addition! Both are well worth the cost.
Smells heavenly. Leaves the skin smooth and silky, lightly moisturized. I do have dry skin, so don't know about other skin types; but for those with dry skin, this is a must.
this stuff is great. smells wonderful. leaves skin feeling great. good for shaving.

I have very dry skin and don't always have time to moisturize in the monring. When I bought the Amande Shower Oil I loved it instantly. It doesn't get you as moisturized an a heavy duty lotion but if you are in a hurry it's gives you enough to get you through the day. It's a cleanser and moisturizer so it does two jobs at once. It has a great smell too. I ordered my second bottle before the first one ran out so I wouldn't have to go without for even one day.
very good for DRY skin. Almond scent lasts all day. Will purchase again in future
I like the scent, I do not love it. Unfortunately I was hoping it wasn't strong. It does leave your skin soft.
This really helps my dry skin and leaves it feeling silky and soft

combine this with the body oil that goes with this and you will get the perfect shave! the shower oil is gentle and is great for people with sensitive skin. i don't have to use much of it, so it lasts a very long time. makes your skin feel soft and smooth. the scent is nice and light, so it can be layered with other scents.
This product is more then just cleansed, it has the firming and smoothing effect as well. One stone 3 birds
Love this. You can use this in combination with the Amande moisturizer and it will keep you skin very smooth.
I've tried a lot of shower gels, creams and lotions, but this one is the best for me. It foams up and is moisturizing. It's not a cure for dry skin but it sure helps.
Loved the Amande Shower Oil. Great smell and makes skins feel wonderful. But still pricey.

So surprised that I did not like it. I usually love almond scented oils, although it can be an unusual scent, so I wasn't concerned when people commented on not liking the smell. Well, it doesn't smell like almond oil to me, more like old play dough or silly putty.. . something I used to smell at my kids preschool. If it was just the smell that disappointed, I would trade it in for a new one just to see if it had gone rancid. But I use eucerin calming body wash, which has a an odd smell which doesn't stay but makes my skin feel much softer for a quarter the price.

This shower oil is definitely an oil - but it lathers well enough if you work really well at it. The important thing is that you rub it in well, even if it doesn't lather, and the longer you can leave it on in the shower, the softer your skin will feel.  I love this as a shaving oil, though it is a little tougher to see where I still need to shave - I go by touch instead. And the smell of the oil is great - sweet, natural, clean, almond-y and a little bit earthy. it goes really well with my ojon palm oil shower items.

I hesitated to make this purchase since it was much less expensive than my usual product. It far exceeded my expectations. This product is wonderful for dry, desert baked skin that suffers in a low humidity climate. Cheap at twice the price!
I have used this product for a numer of years and find it to surpass all other shower oils.

this product smells like almonds + sweet marzipan YUMM!!! it leaves a delicate scent on the skin and feels so luxuriously soft.. i don't need for a moisturizer when i use this product! also, closest shave i've ever gotten. much better than regular shaving creams. just wish it were a tad cheaper but it's still well worth the money!

This is by far the best shower gel oil for your skin !!!! You think it is going to be super oily, but amazingly it is just soo smooth and yummy. Super hydrating and the lets not forget the smell, out of this world, WONDERFUL...

I bought this oil for myself as a job well done gift, otherwise I would never have paid over 20 bucks for a shower item. I might be buying it again! I used this to shave my legs, underarms, and bikini area, and WOW! I was a little worried when the oil didn't particularly foam (didn't have my shower scrunchie). As I'm used to using shaving cream or gel, it was hard for me to see where I'd shaved and where still needed it. But, the skin around my bikini area was definitely well protected, all the hairs were softened, and my skin was very happy.  I have extremely dry legs (sometimes to the point of scaling and dry rash )Usually, my legs beg for lotion after a shower. When I shave my legs, they scream for it. When I used this to shave my legs, I had to remind myself toput on lotion. It's that good. The smell is interesting - definitely almond - not quite vanilla but warm like it, and not too strong that you wouldn't wear perfume.

reviews.review_title: Softness with a hint of almond
reviews.review_text: I have used this for the last few years after using it at my brother's home. It leaves your skin soft and smooth and also provides a wonderful soft scent of almond. Definitely a keeper!
EXCELLENT PRODUCT - SCENT IS WONDERFUL AND FEELS SMOOTH AND SILKY WHEN USED WHILE SHOWERING. LOVE IT !!
Ever since I've used the fresh sugar body scrub I haven't needed to use this, however, it is a good product. It really softens the skin and is great for shaving.
Best shaving base I have ever tried.

reviews.review_title: I'm stuck on Amande Shower Oil
reviews.review_text: I love the soothing Vanilla smell and how is makes my skin feel. My legs are dry and I always feel like I'm making dryer when I shave. This shower oil work great as a soothing bubble bath and oil rich shaving cream. My legs feel wonderful. The only problem is- I use it right up and need more.

reviews.review_title: L'Occitane almond products are tres superbe!
reviews.review_text: I love this product especially. I started using it one winter for dry, flaky skin but liked it so much that I use it all year round now - on thighs, knees, elbows, total arm. I put it on in the shower, rub in, and pretty much leave on . .. nice.

reviews.review_title: Great scent and is a good skin softener
reviews.review_text: I am on my second bottle of this great bath oil. I have found it softens my skin when I add a few drops to my regular body wash and is also good for softening the hairs on my legs for shaving and the scent is great.
Great smell & softens skin. I have normal/oily skin, not sure how well it will work with very dry skin.

reviews.review_title: The best that I have ever used
reviews.review_text: This product is worth it's weight in gold. If you have dry flaky legs this will take care of that product. I will only use this in my shower to cleanse and shave.

reviews.review_title: Heaven in a bottle for skin
reviews.review_text: I love this shower oil! I try to use it as often as i can, but i notice that it goes quickly. Thats the only reason i gave it 4 stars, and not 5. This makes my skin SO soft and luxurious all day long and gives a faint hint of sweet almond scent that accompanies any perfume you wear without overpowering it. Overall, this oil is feminine and will make you feel like a delicate and sexy woman all day long.

I balked at the price. $20+ for shower oil seemed ridiculous. But I will continue to buy it. The scent is wonderful, and it helps with my dry skin. I don't often have time for baths, so this makes my showers a little more luxurious. A worthy splurge.

I absolutely love this oil. It glides on almost like a cream with little lather and has a soft almond smell. I frequently use mine as a shave cream...I have dry legs (practically parched in the winter months) and this is so soothing and moisturizing. Just pat dry after the shower, layer on your normal moisturizer and you'll be soft and moisturized for the entire day. As an extra almond treat for those super-dry days, smooth on a little of L'Occitane's Supple Skin Oil...it's heaven.

Couldnt get it to lather up at all (well maybe 2 bubbles thats it). The smell I thought was nice but it really stunk once I was using it and the smell lingered in the bathroom for 2 days afterward and my whole family had a hard time with the smell so I know it wasnt just me. Didnt do the job when it came to moisturizing the skin either. Sorry L'occitane you get a F on this formula!!

I love this stuff! My skin gets dry and itchy, especially during the winter. For years and years I've tried using all different moisturizing soaps, but nothing helped. The L'Occitane Amande Shower Oil is absolutely perfect. Wash with it as you would any other soap, rinse, dry off, get dressed, you're done. It doesn't leave an oily film on your skin, yet after you towel dry, the dry skin is greatly and magically alleviated. It smells good in the shower and has a very, very light scent (almost un-noticable) after you are dry. I agree with the other reviewer who said she'd buy this stuff by the 5 gallon bucket if it were available that way. I would too! I hope they continue to make this stuff forever!

reviews.review_title: Best body cleanser for dry sensitive skin
reviews.review_text: I have extremely dry skin on my body and any shower gel / cream / oil with any fragrance irritates my skin. Since I discovered L'occitane Amande Shower oil I can't use anything else. It soothes my dry skin and leaves me feeling fresh and clean with a delicate scent. Top off with Amande Milk Concentrate and your skin will feel supple and delicious. Use with a shower ball thingy and it lathers nicely. Great for shaving, too! I got my current bottle around Christmas and it's still half full.
Although pricey, this oil moisturizes in the shower and works for a while afterward. It is a pleasant indulgence. I do have dry skin, especially in winter, and this made me much more comfortable.
One of the best products known to womankind!
I absolutely love this shower oil. Use it to shave with and it will leave your skin feeling smooth and silky. The price is worth it lbecause it lasts a really long time.
It's moisturizing, yes, but to me it takes an awful lot of product to make me feel clean all over. Also, could just be me, but I'm put off by the scent, which doesn't smell like almond to me at all.
I will never use soap again. Be sure to get a sponge to apply it with becaause a washcloth or those scrunchy things don;t work with it at all.

This is one of the only things I have ever returned to Sephora. I heard that it was very moisturizing, and since I have dry skin, I thought I would give it a try. I used it three times and was not at all impressed. It was a fairly thick oil so I did think it would work well, but it wasn't any different from using a plain ol' bar of soap.

This shower oil is fantastic for dry skin. I have dry skin on my torso, arms and legs and often itch especially during winter months. When I bath or shower I use this prior to shaving and then again before I get out of the water. My skin has never felt better and I no longer itch.

This shower oil is divine ladies and gents. It works so well I have my husband addicted to it. Your skin is absolutely smooth and soft and it smell so good! It also works awesome with the hand and body cream, just FYI. My husband LOVES how soft my skin is from these products.

I really like this shower oil. I've just started college in a part of the country that has real winters and my normal body wash wasn't cutting it for my newly dry skin. This does the trick! And it smells wonderful. So the only reason that I didn't give it 5 stars was that it's kind of a small bottle for how much I need to use to get a little bit of lather. I guess I could use less, but it's hard to know if it's actually getting from the sponge to my body without any lather!
I got a sample in the store, then had to buy the whole bottle. This is perfect for shaving, it leaves skin so conditioned, lotion isn't needed after. Also the scent is perfect.

reviews.review_title: great for dry skin in winter!
reviews.review_text: this is the BEST body cleanser I've found for my dry skin, especially in the winter! you have to put it directly on your skin though for maximum effect, not onto a sponge or washcloth. I also like that the smell is light, if it were stronger I don't think I'd like it but it's sweet and subtle. a little pricey but well worth it!

i have dry, sensitive skin. this is a perfect cleanser, the smell is delicious, and the bottle is beautiful. it's luxurious, hydrating, and the moisture really lasts. my boyfriend raves about how soft my skin is.

is how my skin feels after showering with this product! And it has a nice scent too - nothing too strong or perfumy. Have been searching for something to help my dry skin that doesn't have a strong odor. Doesn't lather a lot but does enough to see that it's working. I also bought the amande lotion to use with this as well!
L'Occitane's Amande Shower Oil is amazing. Being a shower oil, it really foams up like you wouldn't believe. I feel clean, soft, smooth and hydrated after using this product. Very, very nice.
This is the best shower cleanser ever. I use it every day. It smells great and I also use it for shaving.
This product is seriously great for dry skin. I've been using it for a LONG time, a must try. Not recommended for oily skin~ however dry skin and suntanned legs, it is fabulous. Simple and effective.
effective shower gel - but not as moisturizing as an oil - smells wonderful

Lathers nice, smells good, didn't leave a residue on my shower. I have VERY dry skin. This left my skin very soft but I did need help on the drier parts like my elbows and legs. Hopefully in the summer I can get away with just this. The bottle lasted a pretty good while also. Works better than any other body wash/oil I have tried, and I've tried a lot!!!!

I really like the soft, subtle almond smell. The product does not foam as much as I expected and in my case it works better when applied by hand. The Oil did not lather on a shower puff or washcloth. My skin usually needs extra attention in the winter, but since I've started using this Shower Oil, I can skip the lotion. I will keep buying it but would not consider using it as a shaving aid, only a cleanser.
Shower oil is very moisturizing with an amazing scent. Love, love, love the smell. It just does not lather like other shower gels. Not sure if I will purchase again!!
their description is accurate
This shower oil is wonderful for shaving your legs in the shower! It helps you obtain a close shave and moisturizes at the same time. Ever since I have discovered this, I can't live without it!
This is the best product ever for shaving. Leaves my legs silky smooth! Scent is lovely too!!
This shower oil form L'Occitane is the best, if you have dry skin shower with this and you will have a new best friend,, just down right good stuff,,, and smells wonderful,,,,

I love this product! It has a soft sweet fragrance that is subtle and lasting. I tend to alternate this with L'Occitane Grapeseed Shower Oil or Korres Jasmine showergel. I feel like this is a perfect moisturizing cleansing product for pampering yourself in the shower. After scrubbing in the shower with this, my skin feels silky soft with a yummy scent. Trust me gals, the guys and most importantly, YOU, will love this product on you.  Cheers! <3, Misticrystal aka Jess
This smells great, is very moisturizing and cleanses well. It isn't havey and doesn't leave a residue out of the shower, but does keep you soft and very lightly scented.

L'Occitane Amande Shower Oil is truly a miracle product for those of us who suffer from dry skin in the winter. I bought this after seeing it in a magazine (Lucky), and I hoped against hope that it would help relieve the dry itchiness that is my usual winter condition. This product was everything I hoped and then some! It smells fantastic. And it's runny like oil when you first dispense it, but then you rub it into wet skin, and it lathers up like a body wash. After you rinse it off, it leaves a light film of oil that sinks into your skin and hydrates it all day long. My boyfriend even commented about how smooth and soft my skin is lately. I put it on as the last step before I get out of the shower every morning. My only complaint is that this stuff doesn't come in a 5 gallon vat because I'd totally buy it in bulk! I highly recommend this product to all women everywhere.
I love the smell, it's light and fresh. This is not really an oil though...it's more of a non-drying body wash.
Smells great. I like it but I obviously didn't read the description carefully, as I was looking for oil, not SOAP and oil.
This is by far the best shower oil that I've ever used. It 's not too oiliy, yet it's so effective year round.

I am becoming a big fan of L'Occitane, and the Amande shower oil is no exception. Great, thick lather, the smell is mild, not bad - but best of all, the lasting moisturizing effect replaces lotion. So, you can skip applying lotion after your shower!
This stuff smells wonderful but doesn't really leave my skin all that moisturized.
I love this stuff. The scent is very light. It leaves my skin super soft, and I use it to shave my legs too. This will be a necessity in my shower from here on out.

I had heard so many fabulous reviews about this product that I had to try it. It is my new favorite. It really softens my skin, and it smells nice and subtle. I use it to shave my legs too and it works wonders.
Other than I wished it lathered up a bit more; this stuff is great! Smells great and is a superb substitute for shaving gel. Great before bed because the scent is very soothing.

i like the smell, a bit sweeter than i prefer, but ok. the big benifit of this stuff for me is how wonderfully moisturising it is, i put it on, shave, and dont have to apply lotion after if i choose, and i live in the desert, so that says alot. if your looking for a smooth close shave, this is the way to go.
wonderful warm shower oil that lathers when it makes contact with water. it leaves a silky layer of moisture on your skin. if you like almond scent, this has a light scent that isn't overwhelming.
The shower oil smells great and softens skin. It is moisturizing and the bottle lasts a long time.
I really liked this shower gel...not too silky but leaves a nice, smooth finish. Smells great, too.

This is actually an oil that produces a soft lather upon contact with a loofah or washcloth. It smells divine and makes my skin so soft, I can skip body lotion afterwards! I leave it on in the shower while I wash my face and brush my teeth to get that extra moisture surge. Beautiful.

I have super dry skin in the winter months and take a daily shower which needless to say doesn't help much but this super silky product is a life save if you have really dry patches i loove to use a bit of the l'occtaine hand creme in them in combo those 2 products are miracle worker both are worth the price
Leaves your skin soft and silky after showering. You won't even need to use lotion when you get out of the shower or bath. Has a delightful yet not overpowering scent.

If you like a bigger lather, you may want to use this product with a loofah. The scent is amazing, and if you like it you may also enjoy the Supple Skin Oil. I have very dry skin, and it leaves my feeling less tight after the shower. I still need a moisturizer, but it makes my skin less dry-feeling than if I were using a regular soap. I have also heard good things about using the product as a shave oil.
Fabulous stuff... oily and moisturizing, a subtle almond scent, tends to feel very warm like massage oil. Be sure to shake it often to keep the ingredients from separating.

reviews.review_title: The answer to dry winter skin
reviews.review_text: I get really dry skin in the winter time, and of course it's on my back where I can't reach to put lotion (and no roommate or hubby to do it for me). So, a fabulous man at my local Sephora handed me this bottle, and my itchy, dry skin got some relief. This way, I get moisturized without any outside help, and it smells wonderfully mild and calming... not perfumey.
this soap is sooo yummy! i wanted to eat it! I love almond! it felt so good on my skin and left the perfect amount of scent! highly recommended!
One of my favorite products...it's very moisturizing for my dry skin and helps keep my skin hydrated even though I love to soak in a very hot tub. It also smells great!
This shower oil is the best I have ever used. It leave my skin soooo smooth and soft. I even use it to shave my legs. I won't use anything else.

I love love love this shower oil. After using the the shea butter soap I always finish with the shower oil. It smells good and it leaves my skin moisturized. I can go with out lotion after using this product. I also like it because it is very lite. Just put it on while in the shower, rinse and go. WHo could ask for more?
leaves your skin so soft and smelling good

The manager at one of my local Sephoras recommended this to me and it is by far the best product I have ever found for shaving. I have extremely dry skin and in the summer, I don't even need lotion after I shave. It has the texture of a bath oil, but has a little bit of a foam to it. I haven't found a better product for shaving, it's amazing!

If you want exceptionally smooth legs, use this to shave. I did it the other day and was shoked at the silkiness of my legs...during and after. I didn't even use moisturizer after the shower....and I was in Tahoe where the air dries your skin out like you wouldn't believe. It is so cool...it actually heats up when you rub it on your skin. What a fun and useful product.
